Estar en un hotel, claro es por un mejor alojamiento, mas comodo y agradable, sin embargo, que mala suerte tenemos con las habitaciones en este hotel, primero con la 101. los aires condiconados no funcionan bien quizas por falta gas. aunque me ensenaron otras 3 habitaciones y me cambiaron para la 201. Fue un poquito mejor, y me dejaron un ventilador mas, pero que ruido de la noche. No podimos dormir bien. Ademas la red wifi es un poco debil. Y Aunque el hotel se encuentra cerca de la playa pero el camino para acceder al hotel esta bajo de la reconstruccion, pues tambien un poco incoviniente.  Que mala suerte. How unlucky we were with the hotel, firstly with the room 101, of which the AC didnt work well for being lack of gas. Although the receptionist showed us other 3 rooms, it seemed to be the same problem. So when we changed to room 201 that I felt a bitter better , they leaved us with a fan. But the fan was very noisy at night, and we couldnt sleep well. Another that we are not satisfied is the cleaness, we left the room at 9am to go out with the sign "make up the room", and we came back at 1pm, the room was not made up yet. Although the positon of the hotel is quite near the beach, but they are repairing the road to the hotel, and it was rather inconvinient. NhÆ°ng cÅ©ng Ok', "Breakfast was pretty poor, it's very early and literally cabbage or omelette with bread, no veggie side bits but plenty of miscellaneous meats. The superior rooms don't have any windows, so more like a standard double but the bathroom is lovely, the bed is very comfortable and the pool was great as we had it to ourselves!! Worth it if you need some space from the crowds of tourists.", "I've been a regular here and mentioned before that the studio apartment that I usually took was not equipped with cooking facilities, despite having a kitchen. This time, I was upgraded to the one-room apartment and saw that the hotel had supplied me with all the bells and whistles of a proper kitchen. Unfortunately, this was a short and extremely busy trip and I was unable to make use of the facilities, but kudos to the hotel for doing that, and a shout out for Ms Ly, the Sales Manager, who has been great every time I've stayed there.", "I've stayed here several times already and I like it. The staff are nice and the room (I usually get the studio apartment is nice and spacious. Would be better if they had floor mats! The trouble is usually with some of the other guests who insist on shouting to each other through open doors, and behaving badly at the breakfast buffet (which is poor, by the way).", "The hotel was beautiful! Very new, clean and modern feel. The concierge at the front desk, I believe her name was Diem, was very nice and very helpful and spoke good English. Our reservation included free breakfast which was nothing crazy but still good. We didn't get a chance to use the rooftop pool unfortunately, but we did go up to check it out and it was a nice cool temperature with a nice view on the backside where the lounge chairs were. The beach is a short walk away, about 3 blocks / 5 mins. We were also recommended the funky monkey island tour which was a blast, also highly recommend. Wish our stay in nha trang was longer but if I get the chance to return will definitely stay at this hotel again. It was also a great price.  :)", 'I had the apartment, which was very well furnished and had a nice balcony. The kitchen cabinets were very nice and it had a full-sized fridge as well.But the kitchen had no kitchenware and I was unable to cook, and this was one of the reasons I booked the apartment in the first place. Also, the bathroom dis not have a floor mat and, when I asked for one, I was given what looked like a piece torn from an old pillowcase. Apparently, the hotel has no floor mats...Breakfast was limited in choice, and replenishments were sometimes slow; this was not helped by discourteous guests who actually filled up their plates with piles of food and took them up to their rooms.Housekeeping was also erratic and I think the hotel is also not in possession of any vacuum cleaners.The staff, however, were generally very nice.', "I am really happy about my stay here at the hotel. The location is great! It is off the Nguyen Thi Minh Khai street, which can be impacted sometimes but it offers more than you will ask for. You can walk to the beach, enjoy the convenient access to local stores, coffee shop, street foods without the traffic. You can easily flag a taxi down. Taxi drivers here are overall friendly and don't mind the short trips and not try to rip you off at all. Take advantage of it! My group has elders and toddler, so it requires some special accommodations. Thanks to the staffs we have a wonderful stay in Nha Trang.  Just want to shout out to Quyet, the security guard, and Linh and Vi, the receptionists. They always offers suggestions and accomodate as much as possible. The hotel is just open few months so I hope the staff will keep up the good work in the future."]

reviews: ['tá»‘t', 'BÃ£i biá»ƒn Ä‘áº§y rÃ¡c vÃ  Ä‘Ã¡, biá»ƒn ko táº¯m dcBá»ƒ bÆ¡i Ä‘Ã£ láº¥p 1 bá»ƒ!Xung quanh ko cÃ³ dá»‹ch vá»¥ Äƒn uá»‘ng vui chÆ¡iQuÃ£ng Ä‘Æ°á»ng di chuyá»ƒn quÃ¡ xa', 'PhÃ²ng mÃ¬nh chá»n lÃ  bugalo view biá»ƒn. PhÃ²ng Ä‘áº¹p tiá»‡n nghi nhÆ°ng cÃ³ kiáº¿n. NÆ¡i Ä‘Ã¢y cÃ³ nhiá»u gÃ³c hÃ¬nh Ä‘áº¹p. Chá»‰ duy nháº¥t má»™t Ä‘iá»u lÃ  bÃ£i biá»ƒn trÆ°á»›c khi nÆ°á»›c lÃªn Ä‘áº¹p. Khi nÆ°á»›c rÃºt lá»™ nhiá»u cá»c nuÃ´i ngao. BÃ£i biá»ƒn khÃ´ng táº¯m Ä‘Æ°á»£c.', 'KhÃ¡ lÃ  ok vá»›i cÃ¡c dá»‹ch vá»¥ Ä‘i kÃ¨m, giÃ¡ há»£p lÃ½. Tuy nhiÃªn bá»¯a Äƒn cáº§n Ä‘a dáº¡ng hÆ¡n vÃ  mang hÆ°Æ¡ng vá»‹ Ä‘á»‹a phÆ°Æ¡ng', "Bungalow was a nice option to get away from the party. Facilities were good and right by the beach.  Beach wasn't the cleanest, didnt really want to swim in the ocean. Further round the bay in the town the water was much nicer.Staff were very helpful, and free daily activities were great, if you can get up early enough.Food was tasty, plenty of options, and the specials each night were good. Maybe a little pricey.Paint thinner for alcohol, but did the job. Music wasnt the greatest, and was go from 8am.Nice place for a party getaway, not so much the quiet couples retreat.", 'Very loud music/karaoke  at night till at least 1 am.  Music very loud at day as well, with constant "drinking games". You have to wear a bracelet, where you deposit money to buy food and drinks there, which is very expensive. You cant swim at the beach, so you\'re advised to swim in the pool. The pool is very dirty and unclean. Staff a bit rude as well. Just an expensive, loud, dirty party hostel AVOID!', 'The only thing is the time it takes to get there but I had great company so it was no problem. Had a blinder of a weekend was just my style, football, pool cliff jumping and drink.', 'Wow did I have a blast here, beautiful place if you like to party. Alex and Dan really made this place special! You are on your own private beach with a pool and spa, lots of sports and activities to do. Awesome food + drinks and cool fun people. Really worth the trek to get out of the busy cities and just relax and have a good time for a few days. Sad to leave this place and looking forward to the day I go back.Also worth it to splurge on the private villas as they are gorgeous and the AC is key!Pro tip: make the shuttle to Nha Trang free and it will encourage a lot more people to come out. But thanks for keeping it cheap either way.', 'Good location, right at the beach. Low key design and set up.  Stayed in the beach bungalow so it was decent.Staff is helpful and friendly.Food is terrible and Breakfast is a joke. Lots of back packer so it can be loud in the evening.', 'If you want to party, this is the place. Itâ€™s in the middle of no where, so you stay on the resort the whole time. Food is good! Beach was so dirty and not swimable. No AC in rooms. But was a good place to party and meet people.', 'If you enter the â€˜hotelâ€™ you will find a couple of buses stranded drunk backpackers. We booked the hostel because of itâ€™s great reviews. Yes the beach bungalow in the end are nice. But not nicer than you would expect in Vietnam for â‚¬45,- a night. Tye bed was comfortable and the view nice. Thatâ€™s it. If youâ€™d ask me not nearly enough for that money. We had two face towels to dry ourselves, no toiletries and no water in the room. Nobody told us where to get water. The hostel is secluded so youâ€™ll have to go with the expensive set dinner wich was tasteless and huge. No tables where you can enjoy private dinner only tug in benches where you join The drunks. The music and entertainment goes on untill deep at night. And in the morning we where woken by the loud tv of the locals next door at 6AM. When we left we returned our wristband (pay method) and they only returned our 50.000 vnd. We found we had left 240.000 vnd on the band. Total scam. Breakfast is a scam and staff very unkind and rude', 'This is a place u can spend few days to be here and just because of the nice hospitality and party setting every night , but one of the thing u need to understand is a bit noisy at night due to the travelers is coming to party at night and most of the time u can enjoy the pool and some outdoor activity like go to beach and  teaching the local kids English (this is the special arrange for the hotel they do some help to the village and let the traveler come have a chance get in touch to the Vietnamese, i found this is very health balance spot no just business but also can helping the local people to live healthy and protect the environment such as clean up the beach and teaching the kids English and Swim etc, u can sign up if u wants to join them for the events), that is what i experience from this hostel, i found it very meaningful trip and very beautiful environment and food there, the team is so helpful and  they try to make the atmosphere full of fun for the travelers !', 'This place is quite Far away (100 km from the closest airport). The beach is dirty as they donâ€™t seem to clean it. It very rocky with too many corals so you canâ€™t swim. It has a pool that doesnâ€™t look too clean. The worst is the crowds: lots of young backpackers drinking, smoking and lazying around the whole day and partying at night. They donâ€™t seem to be the brightest people either. Overall not a good place to stay. There are resorts nearby with much nicer beaches', 'It was a lovely stay. The staff made us feel like a part of a little family, extremely helpful all the time. However, pretty dead on Sundays and Mondays AND there is a huge issue with flies (bugs). There is a lot of them, and they get on the food they serve at the bar,which gave me and my friend food poisoning. Management team should do someting about it (protect food, donâ€™t leave it on display for hours without covering it, or just in general control the pests). Also, the beach was quite dirty. Overall, a lot of potential for this place but also a few problems that need to be solved.', 'We stayed in a private room which was clean and overall a very nice place to be. However the combination of no windows (there are wooden slats instead of glass) and no mosquito nets meant we did get eaten!The food was overpriced and not great but the activities were free and plentiful.', 'I got put in a room with a group of girls (english) that had the room completly trashed ! Dirty underwear on the floor and other cotton hear stick... when i arrived the bed i was meant to have was covered in clothes and 2 of the girls were doing their make up on it. I got another bed but with a very little appologise. The sotuation was a bot embarrassing.The room next door was empty amd clean... i left a day earlier as most of the people there were curing their constant hangover by staying under the shade. Lovely place tho, great spa facilities, i had a massage and a scrub,  food is europeanised and i had  Vietnamese envie. I was really looking forward this place and it turns out to be a total miss for me.', "An oasis of the beaten path, we were very impressed by the food and facilities of Ninhvana. It is a bit of a party hostel, so you may not get a great night's sleep, but the staff do well to create a fun environment!", 'Hard to get to if miss the 1 shuttle. Food overpriced and bad. The staff were good tho. Do not come here if on a budget', '××œ×•×Ÿ ×©×××•×¨ ×œ×”×™×•×ª ×‘×¨××” ×’×‘×•×”×” ×œ×¤×—×•×ª ×›×š × ×™×¨××” . ××‘×œ ×§×©×” ×œ×™ ×œ×ª××¨ ×©××™×Ÿ ×¡×‘×•×Ÿ ×•×©××¤×•.  ××™×Ÿ ××¤×©×¨×•×ª ×œ×”×›×™×Ÿ ×§×¤×” . ×‘×ª××•× ×•×ª ×”×›×œ ×™×¤×” . ×‘××¦×™××•×ª ×××•×“ ×××›×–×‘ ×›×™ ×–×” × ×™×¨××” ×©×œ× ×××© ××›×¤×ª ×œ××©×”×• ××™×š × ×™×¨××” ×”×—×“×¨. ××¨×•×—×ª ×‘×•×§×¨ ×××•×“ ×××›×–×‘×ª ××• ×©××ª×” ××©×œ× ××§×¡×˜×¨×”. ××•×× × ×™×© ×©× ×—×“×¨×™× ×©×œ 16 ××™×˜×•×ª ×‘6 ×“×•×œ×¨ ×œ×™×œ×” ×•××– ××” ×©××§×‘×œ×™× ×–×” ××¦×•×™×Ÿ . ××‘×œ ×¢× ×“×•×¨×©×™× 50 ×“×•×œ×¨ ×–×” ×œ× ×”×•×’×Ÿ . ×××•×“ ×××•×›×–×‘.  ×•×›× ×¨××” ×©×œ× ××’×™×¢ ×œ×©× ×©×•×‘.']

Breakfast is a scam and staff very unkind and rude', 'This is a place u can spend few days to be here and just because of the nice hospitality and party setting every night , but one of the thing u need to understand is a bit noisy at night due to the travelers is coming to party at night and most of the time u can enjoy the pool and some outdoor activity like go to beach and  teaching the local kids English (this is the special arrange for the hotel they do some help to the village and let the traveler come have a chance get in touch to the Vietnamese, i found this is very health balance spot no just business but also can helping the local people to live healthy and protect the environment such as clean up the beach and teaching the kids English and Swim etc, u can sign up if u wants to join them for the events), that is what i experience from this hostel, i found it very meaningful trip and very beautiful environment and food there, the team is so helpful and  they try to make the atmosphere full of fun for the travelers !', 'This place is quite Far away (100 km from the closest airport). The beach is dirty as they donâ€™t seem to clean it. It very rocky with too many corals so you canâ€™t swim. It has a pool that doesnâ€™t look too clean. Overall not a good place to stay. There are resorts nearby with much nicer beaches', 'It was a lovely stay. The staff made us feel like a part of a little family, extremely helpful all the time. Management team should do someting about it (protect food, donâ€™t leave it on display for hours without covering it, or just in general control the pests). Also, the beach was quite dirty. I got another bed but with a very little appologise. address: BÃ£i Biá»ƒn Ã”ng Lang, Ã”ng Lang, ÄaÌ‰o PhuÌ QuÃ´Ìc, Viá»‡t Nam
reviews: ['Luc dau den khach san, toi co hoi kho chiu vi viec chung toi dat 2 phong nhung ben phia khach san khong update dong bo nen chi co 1 phong trong. Dang khen la nhan vien than thien, dang hoang, xu li tinh huong tot va sap xep on thoa cho o cho chung toi.Khach san biet lap, yen tinh, khong gian thoang dang voi vuon cay xanh mat. Bai bien sach va trong, co vong/ ghe ngoi hong gio bien. Bua sang tuy don gian nhung tot.', 'Noi nay phu hop cho khach nuoc ngoai va khach co nhu cau nghi duong vi kha xa trung tam, di lai kho khan va con vai nhuoc diem la he thong nuoc nong hau nhu ko co trong nhung ngay troi mua, an uong ko da dang', 'Vá»‹ trÃ­ Ä‘áº¹p Ä‘á»“ Äƒn ngon', 'Co so vat chat te (Phong khong co TV, dien thoai, phong tam ho ra vuon). Vi tri rat xa trung tam. Nhieu muoi, ngu phai mac man. Diem cong la nha hang nau an ngon.', 'Abc', "The room we got was literally 6 steps from the beach - that alone you cannot beat.  The most important part is that it was not crowded.  My girlfriend and I traveled to several other beaches on the island and ALL of them were so crowded you couldn't think with loud techno music blasting from sun up til sun down.  We ended up just enjoying our private beach with no crowds and obnoxious techno music blasting.  The Coco Palm sits on the west side of the island and you get to see the sun set every night.  They do a seafood bbq with fresh caught seafood with very reasonable prices.  If you want to switch it up and eat somewhere else you can walk down the street to several other options.  The karaoke was very entertaining and both the women singing are truly talented.  Loved our stay and very happy we went with Coco Palm instead of some big box resort with 1000s of other people.", 'Great Great Staff , very helpfull and nice , we had an motorbike accident before arriving at this resort  and the staff help us a lot with all we need and support during our stayThe room is spacious and clean The beach is nice but very narrow , still, there is sunbed available for the guest for free , and rented to other tourist ( so it can be hard to have a available sunbed )The breakfast is really nice (buffet) and a lot of choice The restaurant is limited menu: snacks ( hamburger and so) so for a good meal it is really much better to walk up street and go eat at one of the numerous restaurant outside the tesort So , we spent 3 days with great pleasure at coco palm resort would come back for sure', 'We spend 5 days at this great hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the location is perfect and the food from the restaurant was also very good. We rented scooter from the hotel which was very good also.    Perfectly clean as well... simply just a great place.', "We loved our time at this resort - the staff are incredible and go out of their way to serve. It's beach front with loungers available for free. While the restaurant is pricy for what you get there is heaps of food a 10 minute walk or quick bicycle away (they have bicycles available for free as well). We definitely hope to return.", "The location for Coco Palm is outstanding, on a quiet beach with a growing number of alternative restaurants in the area. The staff were friendly, making us feel very welcome. Rooms are clean and well maintained, we initially had an issue with our (solar) water heater but this was resolved efficiently by the maintenance chap who was always busy around the resort. My only criticism would be that the staff need more guidance at dealing with larger numbers of people. Once a few people are in the restaurant there are issues which don't reflect the staff attitude, just numbers and training.", 'I just love it. It was exactly what I expected for a self-retreat: beautiful garden, nice beach, comfortable atmosphere, gentle staff, quiet and peaceful. Very recommended for a refreshed holiday.Will be back and stay longer.', 'If you are looking for a peace and quite place, this is the best choice. If you would like to spend your time with sun, sea and sand, this is the good place. The view from the restaurant is amazing. I recommend this place for people who would like to find something quite and escape from the city.', "The resort is small and cozy that's far from the Duong Dong center and it's quite place for people who would like to escape from the noisy. If you are looking for a place to relax after busy working days, I recommend this place. The staffs were friendly and helpful, the beach and the garden are fantastic.", 'Here is a very very nice beach resort with affordable price. Clean beach, relax environment, with someone you loved....nothing is worth than stay here with them. The staff very hospitality and passion to help everything we need, even they help me to get my laundry cloths back at the same day afternoon. I love this resort and I will choose this resort again when I come back next time.', 'Excellent location, steps away from beach, calm waters. Staff was exceptional and breakfast was fantastic.  Rooms quite comfortable, and clean. Will return!!', "We spent two weeks at this resort and wished we could have stayed longer.  We travel a lot and had in fact just been to the Maldives for a month (both private and public Islands) before going to the Coco Palm Beach Resort.  We wish we had swapped the holidays ie 2 weeks in Maldives 4 weeks Coco Palm.  The staff, accomodation, and food were in a different class, not to mention the location.  We were treated like kings and I have to say we enjoyed every minute of it.  If we can we will be returning, but this time for a month.  Can't say any more.  Thoroughly recommended.", 'Our family of five with three kids under 8 enjoyed our four-night stay here. Itâ€™s a quiet and peaceful location right on the beach, which was worth the extra money. The service was wonderfulâ€”all the workers were very kind and helpful. The breakfast was plentiful with a good selection for different tastes. The fruit drinks and iced coffee were the best weâ€™ve had in Vietnam. Restaurant prices were higher, which is to be expected on Phu Quoc, but the food was all great quality, well prepared and still a bargain compared to western prices. The only downside was that there were no family rooms available, so we booked two separate rooms that were next to each other.', 'We were only booked for 5 nights but decided to stay for 14 even though we had to share a 1 room bungalow as a family of 4 without a baby cod for our infant boy. The atmosphere and feeling of calm here is everything we were looking for. The resort is located in what is best described as a jungle garden with a variety of palm tress, plants and a little lake with fish ind the middle. There is only 15 bungalows spread out in this garden, all within 30 seconds walk to the pristine beach that is equipped with comfortable sun chairs that are free of charges for the guest at the resort. The beach is 100 % sand and not a single rock in the water which is very calm most of the time. Great when you have small kids. Our 4 year old could safely play in the water while we watched her from the beach.We missed a baby cod at the resort, which should be easy for them to acquire. Food was great and staff was Wonderfull with our children that they played with every day. Our greatest recommendation!', 'The room and the bathroom were clean. No television, so if you need this kind of entertainment, this hotel is not for you. It is quiet and nice, a good place to relax, to swim in the sea, to walk on the beach, and to chill a bit.']

It is modern, very clean and the grounds are beautiful. It is right on the beach and you can watch the amazing sunsets. The breakfast area is right at the beach too, it's such a nice way to start the day. The staff are super, especially Binh on reception. He is so friendly. He went above and beyond to ensure my stay was perfect. I was able to check in early and check out late for no extra cost. He also helped my friend when her bike broke down far from the resort. He deserves a raise because he does the jobs of about three people at once! :) I had a standard double room but it had a sea view from one window, I could lie in bed and look at the waves (room no.18) . I will definitely be back :)", 'The was cleaniness.  The place was good for children who wants to spend their all day playing with sand on the beach. During the covid time, the place was very quiet, so there was no restaurant but we can find a nearby restaurant for breakfast and lunch next door.', "Family suite was nice and really clean. The only downside was really hard bed in small room.Restaurant in resort is closed and there is no breakfast due to covid. Also the beach area is not serviced.If you want place in center close to all restaurants then i recommend this place.If you look for nice sea and tranquility then i'd look in different parts of Phu Quoc.", 'Thank You So Much for such a pleasant stayI was Free upgraded to a pool view bungalow, which was so awesome, room was cosy, decent, facilities were new. The girl With a short hair at the reception was so kind to give us some mangos from their garden lolI would love to travel to Phu Quoc every year just to stay here.', 'This is the most affordable property that has both a private beach and infinity pool! Though the beach in front of the resort is kinda rocky, you can just walk 3min to Blue beach bar nearby for a cocktail at sunset! (happy hour 50% off all drinks! ) There are many restaurants and bars nearby too.  Breakfast has various kinds of food! much better than expected. Staffs are friendly and attentive. Room is tiny but since you can easily spend the whole day out in their quiet pool, no need for big room anyway !', 'We stayed in two types of accommodation at Vida Loca, one being the more expensive wooden bungalows as they call them. We stayed in Number 29. They are very compact shall we say and the double bed in the bedroom section is only accessible from one side, consequently someone has to climb over the other at some point should they need the bathroom.There is no mirror in the bathroom which is a bit of a pain. The outdoor furniture should you want to sit out on the small terrace is not comfortable at all.The half barrel property as we called it was very clean and well equipped with a good cold fridge.However, we did have an unwelcome resident in the form of a rat, which ran out of the bedroom across the lounge area and took refuge behind the units. (The other half was asleep at this point). I reported the incident the morning after and the staff came round and removed the units and the rascal had checked out for the day. I worked out the culprit was gaining access under the entry door', 'Accommodation was perfect for the beach. All facilities were of good quality e.g fridge, air con, fan. Warm shower, overall good service provided from all staff members. I would recommend to others. The only issue that I would mention is me and my partner booked our transportation to Sihanoukville from the hotel and had a mishap on the way. We wasnâ€™t informed that the last boats from Sihanoukville was 4:00pm while our bus wouldnâ€™t get to Sihanoukville till 5:00. Even though we got the earliest bus which stated we would arrive at 3:00pm. We ended up having to pay $60 dollars for a private car from Ha Tien to make it on time for our boat to koh rong from Sihanoukville. Just be aware when booking.', 'Enjoyed the tiny house vibe and the quiet pool during the days - breakfast was great!', "This resort is perfect if you plan on staying poolside/on the beach all day long which is exactly what we did. The hotel itself is still under construction (we could see them fitting rooms with beds etc.) however it didn't affect our stay at all. The room itself was too small to do anything in but wasn't an issue for us since we spent no time in it.The main downside is the staff in our opinion and if fixed would make it one of the best properties:-We asked for towels 3 times to shower and got then an hour later- Night staff wasnt willing to give us a knife/fork for some reason and told us to look in the empty bar ourself- They take your passport upon checkin and forgot to give us on checkout. We had to ask when we remembered for it and all they could do is laugh and say oops sorry we forgot.All things aside its an amazing new property with a clean beach and beautiful infinitt pool AND for the price is unbeatable.", 'The room (one of the standard rooms) was described as big enough for two adults and two children, but actually the room was only big enough for one double bed.Other than that false advertising the room was ok, good value, and in a great location. The pool was lovely, you had breakfast pretty much on the beach, and the bar was pretty decent. My only other (minor) gripe was playing trance music at breakfast...if the volume was a little lower it would have been more pleasant.', 'bel emplacement , trÃ¨s bon et copieux petit dÃ©jeuner , chambre un peu  trop petite Ã  mon gout .', 'sehr Ã¼bersichtliche mit viel Liebe zum Detail gepflegte Anlage. von der Reception bis zu den ServicekrÃ¤ften alle super freundlich!!   FrÃ¼hstÃ¼cksbÃ¼ffet sehr abwechslungsreich und vielfÃ¤ltig. FÃ¼r ein  3 Stern  Hammer !!  Auch die Speisekarte und das Essen hervorragend. Haben in dem weissen "alten Hotel" gewohnt. Es wurde vor kurzem kernsaniert.  BettenqualitÃ¤t und BettwÃ¤sche 1. Sahne. Taxi innerhalb einiger Minuten vor Ort zu normalen Preisen. It has a good atmosphere,a pool and hammocks to chill in. If you are an easy traveller,a backpacker, you will enjoy this place lot. it's simple but has everything you need. the location is on the main road so a lot of shops and bars around. The staff is friendly as well. What I really liked was the outside area and the chilled vibe. Definitely recommend!", 'Pool smells bad (chemicals) so we did not take a swim. Staff was arrogant, one of them did not speak in english. The communication was bad. Prices are high. Would choose a different place next time. There are better options. Now I know.', 'We spent 5 nights in the Langchia hostel and everything was great! Its location in the main street is really good for explore the restaurants and bars. We had a room with balcony in front of the pool, with good AC and WiFi. Khoi, from the front desk was amazing helping us with everything!, renting a motorbike, giving info about best spots in the island.... thanks a lot guys!', 'Great location. Excellent landry. Always crisp fresh linen. I love this place! Could live here forever.!', "Had a private pool-side room. Great big windows. Close to the beach. Phu Quoc is very small so with a scooter, location doesn't really matter. About a 20 minute walk to the night market.  Rooms were clean, bathroom was ok. Pool was refreshing after a hot day, even after returning from the beach. Good cheap stay but for the same price I could get a beach front hotel, which I would do if I were to return.", 'This was a great hostel for a quick trip to Phu Quoc. The breakfast was simple but filling, the location was awesome since it was right on the beach and not too far of a walk from the night market. I met other solo travelers and the hostel provided great recommendations and facilities! The sheets were cleaned everyday and I felt that the hostel was very safe, even for a solo traveler like myself.', 'A lot of building construction around for the moment so really NOISY.... The room and the bed are clean. Breakfast really good you have a lot of choice ! Otherwise a little bit overpriced but the restaurant on the other side of the street is i think the best !']

It is in an excellent location- close to great restaurants and shops. Very quiet at night. We enjoyed sitting on the deck outside our room. Lovely to walk down the hibiscus lined path to the beach. Great breakfast and friendly and helpful staff.', 'Perfectly located on Long Beach in Phu Quoc. Owners are so friendly, welcoming and helpful. My reservation I made with Agoda git cancelled. By mistake.  So when we arrived they had no reservation or payment. The showed us 2 different rooms! Then told us just to pick one and we could have room now and worry bout details later. We stayed a few steps from the amazing beach and restaurant. The included breakfast had plenty of great choices. And so delicious every time. Beer is cheap. Rooms very clean and housekeeping staff are wonderful. \rScooter rental on site and the scooter was the newest model Iâ€™d rented in Vietnam. It was modern and well maintained. All in all itâ€™s a great place. Weâ€™re alresdy planning our trip back. Oh and the massage tables (on right  as you enter the beach from the bungalows ) are great. Highly recommend. We also ate fruit and baked goods for sale on beach and everything was amazing.', 'The owners and staff are lovely here. We had a great time. This is not 5 stars here! The beds are quite comfortable and rooms cleaned daily. The breakfast here is great. Christoph (owner) has a french partisserie and produces a range of pasteries, tarts and icecream/sorbet that always satisfy. It is close to village shops and fresh local seafood restaurantsThe mosquitos and sand flies  were quite bad and repellant was a must have.  The bathroom is a wet area and is very slippery particularly for children as the shower toilet and basin share the same space with central drainage. There were day beds at the beach anf it seemed one of the best sections of beach as it was quiet and no noisy bars. Perfect for family', 'WiFi was decent. Staff was helpful. Rooms were clean. AC worked well. Bed was  comfortable. Near restaurants and shops, but still peaceful. I travel full time and switch locations often. My only complaint would be that the beach had too many jelly fish and thatâ€™s not the Hotelâ€™s fault. Pleasant stay overall.']

Staff doesn mind a lot about your, breakfast very basic, just a bun with an egg, and almost cold coffee. It s cheep if there are 2 person just 10euros per night', "The resort is in a great location near the beach. The service was good and the rooms are clean and comfy. Just make sure you book a room with A/C, we accidentally didn't book it, even though the price would have been the same.", 'Stayed a few nights and canâ€™t complain about anything. Really close to the beach, basic but clean rooms with fresh towels, good WiFi, loads of places to eat nearby, nicely kept gardens etc. Breakfast everyday was good but so much oil! Good value for money in PQ', 'We had a really nice stay. Staff was very friendly and accomodating. I was suprised that the bed and pillow was as comfortable as it was! Its a shame they dont have room for a full restaurant/bar. Overall a fantastic lil place!', "We stayed here for two nights. The room was very plain, no table or anything where you could put backbags, no mirror (only a small one in the bathroom). There was a mosquito net in the cabinet.The pool looked dirty and water was greenish...Breakfast was ok, bread and eggs as always.There was no road from the hotel to the beach, so we went trough the hotel next door.The aircondition cost 150,000 VND for one night, which in my opinion is unreasonable because there is lots of hotels at the same, or a little higher, price which includes AC.The staff didn't speak english, only a few words.Can't recommend this place.", 'Clean hotel friendly staff close to the beach and heaps of restaurants nearby  great location', 'The resort was in a great location. There were many fine restaurants within walking distance. The beach was very close. A 3 min walk. At the beach you can rent loungers and there are a few places to eat and drink at. The small pool has a few places to sit around and it gets sun. Breakfast is good', '+: Small swimming pool but usable-: Basic room with limited amenities, a ressort room but much worse than many cheaper hotel rooms I stayed on Phu Quoc. Booked thinking "on the beach" but here is "near the public beach" (with water making itching). Overall, nothing special as a ressort, not better than a normal hotel but worse.Very very limited breakfast: 1 choice only, the Vietnamese instant noodle soup, and coffee or tea if you request (so no self service so you have to ask, or maybe 1 drink only per person?), no milk no drink for kid (just iced tea then, for breakfast!), very old used and almost broken wopden chopsticks. So that is a breakfast included in the room rate (quite cheating to my opinion, when we left we saw another guest got an omelette with bread, but the hotel didn\'t explain us what we can have so all guests had that cheap instant noodle, some Western guests show a disappointed face and have difficulties eating that). All ressorts there use a land potholes pathway!', "I highly recommend this hotel! It's very quite and peaceful. The location is perfect,only 3 min walking to a beautiful beach and only 5 min to street with many restaurants, shops, ...  The stuff is very nice and friendly! One of the best places I have ever stayed!", 'Stayed here for 2 nights on arrival at Phu Quoc.  Staff at the desk were good, friendly and sorted me through efficiently. The grounds are lovely, well laid out and maintained.  My room was nice and clean, had a sweet little patio out front, and good A/C.  It also had a comfortable bed, and an extra bed just in case.  After settling in, I went out to explore. The resort is a bit out of the "action", which as a solo traveller was a bit of a disappointment.  There\'s not a lot going on in the immediate area, which is nice because it\'s definitely quiet, but also a bit boring.  One note, there is no food service at the resort, which is too bad because they have an upstairs area with TONS of potential, but nothing going on up there at all (at least while I was there).  The lovely lady next door is good for breakfast, and you can walk out to the street or down to the beach for food. All in all, if I was going back as part of a couple, especially on a budget, I\'d definitely consider this place again.  As it was, after my 2 booked nights were up I moved to a different (and slightly more expensive) location down the beach that fit my travel better.', "The swimming pool (10 m long?) don't have the automatic cleaning system working so the staff cleans the dirty walls by hand.I checked next door hotel and there swimming pool was in same condition!If you want hot water for coffee or The, please ask the staff for help.", 'the pipe of the sink was completely broken and water flooded the floor every time we used it but nobody came to fix it. One of the staff tried to trick my mother into purchasing overpriced local products and asked for money to visit his mother blatantly. \rVery near the beach.']

Clean room & surrounds, good location busy but not noisy. Often had our kettle beach part to ourselves. Simple breakfast and easy walk to shops & resturants', "Do not stay at this resort! I booked a beach front bungalow but when I arrived I could see it wasn't  beach front, they try to pass off 4 as beach front despite only 2 being so. The bungalow wasn't clean, there was a random t-shirt on top of the mosquito net, and cockroaches in the bathroom. At the time I thought, I can deal with this as the beach looks nice, but was shocked when I was spoken to rudely by staff who refused to serve drinks or food to the beach loungers, seriously this is meant to be a beach resort! In the end I went to the place next door and they were happy to deliver food and drinks to the our beach loungers, subsequently we ended up eating there a lot. I was shocked at the lack of customer service, they had food menus in the rooms but wouldn't do room service, this place is awful and seriously over-priced! After checking out I got a taxi to the airport, on arrival I got a phone call saying I owed them more money. I'd paid for the room in advance and paid up the bill on checkout, yet they were telling me I owed them more money. Had they said this at the time of checking out I'd have paid on card but I had no more cash on me so couldn't give the taxi driver the money as they were requesting, also I didn't trust the driver would return it, and I was rushing to catch my flight. So unorganised, rude, and totally out of touch with their customers. My advice for Phu Quoc is to pay for one of the nicer resorts, its definitely worth the extra money to make sure you don't end up in a dump like this, which wasn't cheap.", 'we were in this hotel only for one night but certainly i would stay there more and even come back again.\rstaff was very friendly and checked-in very fast. in 5 minutes they brought a fruit plate in the room. \rthat was very pleasant. \rwe were very surprised with wifi - it was superb. \rvery nice beach. i would say the best on the long beach. \rhotel has a good location to the night market and city centre. but i would suggest to try food in the hotel restaurant, \rcause it was very delicious.']

We definitely will come back. Hotel pool is good for very young children but 60,000 entrance needs to be paid & only 1 entrance allowed not entire day or stay.  The rooms are spacious & air  conditioning didnt seem to stay cool even though we just used all the fans which was very effective but if a hot summer not sure if property working or if we didnt set remote correctly. A clean and well located budget hotel.', 'When I arrived the receptionist was showering so I couldn\'t check in for 10 minutes.  The room had one towel and zero toilet paper. hotel name: Le Theatre Cruises - Ká»³ Quan trÃªn Vá»‹nh Lan Háº¡ (Le Theatre Cruises - Wonder on Lan Ha Bay)
address: Báº¿n du thuyá»n Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, Äáº£o Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, Ha Long, Viá»‡t Nam, 200000
reviews: ['Du thuyá»n sang trá»ng, phÃ²ng Ä‘áº¹p, thiáº¿t bá»‹ cao cáº¥p, khÃ´ng gian sinh hoáº¡t chung rá»™ng rÃ£i, sang trá»ng, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, mÃ³n Äƒn ngon. QuÃ¡ tuyá»‡t. Sáº½ giá»›i thiá»‡u cho báº¡n bÃ¨.', 'We booked with Le Theatre because of the excellent reviews and relatively reasonable price point.  We absolutely loved the boat, food, service, everything! The boat was about half full, so we were upgraded to an executive cabin and it felt like we were on a nearly private yacht. The service was absolutely amazing, anything you asked for they took care of with a smile. We enjoyed the relaxing nature of the trip, where we had a few activities but plenty of time to relax and enjoy the experience and amazing views.  We saw a few other boats that also looked very nice, but were twice the price. Go ahead and book with Le Theatre, youâ€™ll love it!', 'We really enjoyed our stay at Le Theatre Cruise. We had the beautiful family suite at the 3rd floor and the view in the room was amasing. The service by all the crew members and the food quality were outstanding. Everybody was dedicated to their work. A really big thank you to Steven, Peter, Jackie and Tam (for the excursion). You made our trip special. We recommand this trip to everyone and suggest a two nights to enjoy a complete and astonishing experience.', 'Amazing cruise and delicious food ,excellent staff and activities. They always taked care us on our trip, luxury rooms with private balcony and bathtub. Thanks', 'Overall was great service, i had great time on Le theatre cruise and their team. Thank you!!!', 'The service from Le Theatre Cruise staff is fantastic. Especially from staff named Bun.  Food is also top class. Highly recommend for anyone who want to have a great trip in Ha Long Bay.', 'We had wonderful stay on this cruise. Staff are so friendly and helpful. Food is amazing and delicious. We love it.', 'we really enjoyed the time on Le theatre Cruise, also upgrated to panorama suite, lovely room with over view and clean and large. friendly staff, delicious food in the everning. Recommend it.', 'we booked two room and one night for my birthday, so it was great  time and suprise about them.  they gave us special gifts ,also private area in the everning, this area was nice decoration too. Thank super team specially captian.', 'we booked one night on Le theatre ship, it seem to be the biggest ship compare with some cruises around. Very comfortable  room and has cable tivi and bathtub, friendly and helpful staff , always smiling . we enjoyed it. Thank Le Theatre Team!!!', 'Great trip with high end service, Lovely room and large private balcony, super friendly and professional staff, delicious food, nice decor.  Highly recommended', 'we really enjoy the time on Le theatre cruises, great service, lovely staff , nice room with good view .would recommend it.', 'we really enjoyed our trip on Le theatre cruise. all perfect and friendly, staff was smile alot of time we stayed there. Thanks your team.', 'Food and rooms were first class. Staff were fantastic.', 'it was a wonderful trip. Full of attention and perfection top. Staying 2 nights so it is a good idea. we enjoyed it.', 'They offer 5 stars service, the room was clean, lovely decor ,comfortable beds with satellite 4k TV, big windows too. Great food and activities on cruise. we really have enjoyed every moment of being on this beautiful ship and would be recommended it to our relative and friends.', 'The cruise is really luxurious class. The rooms are very spacious and clean with large windows to see amazing bay.  The staff are really great and professional. Waiteress was always accommodating and made our dining experience fantatic. The manager was really knowledgeable and very personable. Top it off, the cruise contacted us after the trip to deliver a special gift at hanoi. highly recommended.', 'we loved our overnight stay on this new cruise. The room was clean and spacios. There were many delicios options for meals and we wanted to try them all. we did kayaking,swimming, Tai Chi and went to the caves. we loved getting to meet the staff they was friendly,hospitality and very helpful. we wished we could have stayed 2 nights. Thanks Le theatre team.', 'We did the 2 days 1 night cruise and had great time. The cabin is very beatiful and the staff was very helpful, friendly, the photos accurately reflect quality of the rooms and facilities, great food, so many choice of the foods. highly recommended.', 'kitchen staff is accomodating']

Clean hotel, nice bathrooms! Very polite staff! And Excellent view from the room!', 'Really nice, clean and new hotel right near the wharf where you catch boats out to Ha Long Bay. One thing to note is the staff at this hotel speak very little English. I got by using Google Translate. The staff were very helpful with booking a car to the airport. Just be ready to use your apps.**IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT HA LONG BAY CITY: This place is a ghost town! All the food in Ha Long Bay city was AWFUL! Avoid the restaurants with the "fresh" seafood out the front because what you\'ll get is frozen rubbish. The restaurants along the main strip aren\'t even registered on Google maps so there\'s no way to leave a review. There\'s a little bar just up the road that is nice and has cheap drinks. I think the food there is ok.', 'Breakfast was average', 'khach san phuc vu tot. Tuy nhien troi mua, bac ngoai rat tron. hotel name: Le Theatre Cruises - Ká»³ Quan trÃªn Vá»‹nh Lan Háº¡ (Le Theatre Cruises - Wonder on Lan Ha Bay)
address: Báº¿n du thuyá»n Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, Äáº£o Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, Ha Long, Viá»‡t Nam, 200000
reviews: ['Du thuyá»n sang trá»ng, phÃ²ng Ä‘áº¹p, thiáº¿t bá»‹ cao cáº¥p, khÃ´ng gian sinh hoáº¡t chung rá»™ng rÃ£i, sang trá»ng, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, mÃ³n Äƒn ngon. QuÃ¡ tuyá»‡t. Sáº½ giá»›i thiá»‡u cho báº¡n bÃ¨.', 'We booked with Le Theatre because of the excellent reviews and relatively reasonable price point.  We absolutely loved the boat, food, service, everything! The boat was about half full, so we were upgraded to an executive cabin and it felt like we were on a nearly private yacht. The service was absolutely amazing, anything you asked for they took care of with a smile. We enjoyed the relaxing nature of the trip, where we had a few activities but plenty of time to relax and enjoy the experience and amazing views.  We saw a few other boats that also looked very nice, but were twice the price. Go ahead and book with Le Theatre, youâ€™ll love it!', 'We really enjoyed our stay at Le Theatre Cruise. We had the beautiful family suite at the 3rd floor and the view in the room was amasing. The service by all the crew members and the food quality were outstanding. Everybody was dedicated to their work. A really big thank you to Steven, Peter, Jackie and Tam (for the excursion). You made our trip special. We recommand this trip to everyone and suggest a two nights to enjoy a complete and astonishing experience.', 'Amazing cruise and delicious food ,excellent staff and activities. They always taked care us on our trip, luxury rooms with private balcony and bathtub. Thanks', 'Overall was great service, i had great time on Le theatre cruise and their team. Thank you!!!', 'The service from Le Theatre Cruise staff is fantastic. Especially from staff named Bun.  Food is also top class. Highly recommend for anyone who want to have a great trip in Ha Long Bay.', 'We had wonderful stay on this cruise. Staff are so friendly and helpful. Food is amazing and delicious. We love it.', 'we really enjoyed the time on Le theatre Cruise, also upgrated to panorama suite, lovely room with over view and clean and large. friendly staff, delicious food in the everning. Recommend it.', 'we booked two room and one night for my birthday, so it was great  time and suprise about them.  they gave us special gifts ,also private area in the everning, this area was nice decoration too. Thank super team specially captian.', 'we booked one night on Le theatre ship, it seem to be the biggest ship compare with some cruises around. Very comfortable  room and has cable tivi and bathtub, friendly and helpful staff , always smiling . we enjoyed it. Thank Le Theatre Team!!!', 'Great trip with high end service, Lovely room and large private balcony, super friendly and professional staff, delicious food, nice decor.  Highly recommended', 'we really enjoy the time on Le theatre cruises, great service, lovely staff , nice room with good view .would recommend it.', 'we really enjoyed our trip on Le theatre cruise. all perfect and friendly, staff was smile alot of time we stayed there. Thanks your team.', 'Food and rooms were first class. Staff were fantastic.', 'it was a wonderful trip. Full of attention and perfection top. Staying 2 nights so it is a good idea. we enjoyed it.', 'They offer 5 stars service, the room was clean, lovely decor ,comfortable beds with satellite 4k TV, big windows too. Great food and activities on cruise. we really have enjoyed every moment of being on this beautiful ship and would be recommended it to our relative and friends.', 'The cruise is really luxurious class. The rooms are very spacious and clean with large windows to see amazing bay.  The staff are really great and professional. Waiteress was always accommodating and made our dining experience fantatic. The manager was really knowledgeable and very personable. Top it off, the cruise contacted us after the trip to deliver a special gift at hanoi. highly recommended.', 'we loved our overnight stay on this new cruise. The room was clean and spacios. There were many delicios options for meals and we wanted to try them all. we did kayaking,swimming, Tai Chi and went to the caves. we loved getting to meet the staff they was friendly,hospitality and very helpful. we wished we could have stayed 2 nights. Thanks Le theatre team.', 'We did the 2 days 1 night cruise and had great time. The cabin is very beatiful and the staff was very helpful, friendly, the photos accurately reflect quality of the rooms and facilities, great food, so many choice of the foods. highly recommended.', 'kitchen staff is accomodating']

reviews: ['The cruise ship is beautiful. We had the family suite which had a huge balcony (this was the highlight). The kids loved the jacuzzi with the most amazing view. The staff were very helpful and the day trips were very well organised. They had chosen the best spots Which were calm and not very crowded, we loved everything about it. Only improvement maybe make drinking water more easily available :-)', 'Our host Megan looked after us well right from arriving at the port to the end of the cruise.Room we had was good size and very comfortable with all facilities we needed.We got to on  a tour of the fishing villages and a cave walk which were very food.Food on board was quite nice.Would recommend', 'Love the cruise, staff were helpful. Our 2 day 1 night was jam packed. I would have prefer some time to chill and relax in our lovely room, sit in the jacuzzi or hang out in our private balcony area. Too much activity for 2 days haha...', 'Its a less crowded than the others. Staff is friendly and helpful. Room is nice.', 'WE really like their service and kindness.Food were great, But I wish that they can serve us more vietnamese food since we are traveling vietnamTheir Pumpkin soup and pho was awesome ! And WE really like the JaÂ·cuzzi', 'Great cruiseJunior suite was spacious with spa bath ( shower seat only no actual showerProfessional pick up in luxury limousine busLovely friendly staff Our Guide Bruce was super fun and had great knowledge of the area We went to a  less crowded area of the bay with only maybe 10 other boatsFood  was all good , nothing  over the top special but all edible  and plentiful Happy hour always good value  Buy 2 get 2 free buy 10 get 10 free So we bought at happy hour and they served the happy hour drinks during Dinner , so worth doing if you like wine .We paid $10 each for kayaking  but it was worth itVery memorable paddle around the limestone cliffsDay 2 Early morning Thai chi on deck Crosant and coffee Then small boat to small island to walk into caves . Some time on beach but no swimming on 2 day 1 night cruise.All in all a great cruise', 'My girlfriend and I (22&23) booked a 2d/1n Tour with Signature Royal Cruise. Our supervisor (Bruce) and the staff were friendly and competent all the time. The rooms are clean, the balcony and the large bathtub were pure luxury.You will not be brought to the touristic and overcrowded areas of the huge bay but there will be always a few other boats around you. The food is delicious and always either buffet or 5 course menu.The Guests are from all over the world and you will find interesting people either on their honeymoon or on a backpacking journey.I can really recommend Signature Cruises for everyone who can afford these 200â‚¬ per night for this perfect experience without anything to complain about.Thanks Bruce for this journey!', 'My friend and I stayed 2 nights and 3 days on Signature Royal cruise in Ha Long Bay. We fell inlove with the charming cabin, friendly staff and perfect location immediately. The service and experience was impeccable and we would definitely recommend it to anyone. We particularly would like to thank Panda, the cruise manager, for his professionalism, humor and friendliness as well as Liam, Nary and Tina for their fantastic service and hospitality.', 'We had a great trip with the Cruise. The room is large and clean with comfortable bath room. Food is good. Staffs are very friendly and helpful, especially the Manager - Khuong. They made my trip better when going extra miles to serve client. My husband ordered a cake for our ceremony but they made us surpised by decorating the room beautifully with the hearts made from towers and red flowers.', 'Words cannot express the professionalism and hospitality of the entire crew onboard the Signature Royal. From the moment you board the luxurious transfer bus, to the planned comfort breaks on the 2-hr journey, to the welcome at the harbor and finally the welcome to the vessel, you will feel pampered and completely royal.The food was amazing and the evening entertainment was great.I strongly recommend you complete your Ha Long Bay experience with this company!', "This was our first cruise and I could not ask for more, food was excellent, staff were so helpful. We have a Junior Suite, it was so cozy and lovely. I'm glad I'd booked Signature Royal Cruise.", 'It was a great experience with this kind of small cruise boat. Tour manager and and other stay was really concerned about the food for us given that we were vegetarian.Only thing can be improved is keep dining room  more comfortable  since it is so hot. Same goes for the waiting room.', 'This is the best cruise I ever join.We visited many place in Bai Tu Long Bay.The guide is a little bit strict with time but overall the service is top-notch.Also after we depart the ship, they even give us souvenirs to remind us of our journey with them.A definite 5 star Royal Experience.Please join this cruise if you are interested to see Ha Long Bay.', 'Lovely room and attentive staff who took the effort to discuss the menu for our young child.  A very comfortable stay. Regrettable that the company couldnâ€™t refund us the tour component of our visit to Yen Duc Village which we cancelled due to illness. But we understand that preparations had already been made at the village. The company made effort to refund us the transport component of the village tour. Later on, a representative paid us a courtesy visit at our hotel. We didnâ€™t think it necessary, but a very nice and sincere gesture from them. Weâ€™re still glad we chose Signature Royal Cruise.', 'Was a great cruise. Not over crowded with people as they are limited to numbers for each cruise so you donâ€™t feel like you are bumping into people. Lee was our cabin director and was fantastic. All staff were attentive and extremely helpful.', 'Great hospitality and service!! Stayed at Senior suite... which was nicee...recommended vacation and cruise!!', 'All staffs are excellent in services , but rooms need more upgraded.', 'We booked a 2 night trip but unfortunately due to weather we only did the one but we really enjoyed it. Vinh and his staff are superb, couldnâ€™t do enough for you. Food was excellent, bed so comfortable, we had a spa balcony cabin and it was huge compared to any other cruise I have been on', 'Staff were fantastic. NYE meal was incredible. Really enjoyed our cruise with Signature', 'Go with a partner. It was amazing!!']

reviews: ['I went on this trip with my brother to explore Ha Long Bay. We were picked up from our hotel in Hanoi by a mini bus filled with other fellow travellers. It took a little while for them to get us on board (felt like there was a lot of waiting around, especially after the ride from Hanoi). But when we finally did get on board it was a fantastic experience. The service was very good, they always kept us informed of the activities that were coming up and gave us the flexibility to decide which activity to follow/or not. The bed was comfortable and it was so nice to wake up to the view in the morning. So many photos taken during our stay on this cruise! We loved it and would recommend this to our friends and family.', "Our 2-day / 1-night trip with Glory Legend was extremely enjoyable. As we travelled as a family, we had two adjourning rooms. While there was no balcony, all rooms have full height sliding windows which you can open to welcome the Halong Bay breeze. It was a treat just sitting by the windows! The crew on board was an enthusiastic and professional team, and the staff did a great job executing the programme and leading the island visits. The local Vietnamese and seafood meals prepared by the kitchen, helmed by a young lady chef, were delicious. A crew member (sorry didn't take note of the young man's name) also took the initiative to entertain our table by demonstrating the various napkin folding techniques after dinner. Itinerary worked for us as it was fairly well spaced and it didn't feel too rushed.", 'We had a great time in our trip to Halong Bay courtesy of Glory Legend Cruise. From the pick up to hotel, to the waiting area in the port, to the facilities of the cruise itself, to the food that they serve and the attractions/activities in halong bay. We had a great view and great time in  our 2 days 1 night cruise! It must be noted that the water in Halong Bay is not clear, thus you cannot enjoy swimming unlike in Palawan, Philippines or other beaches.  I was able to get information on the cruise from other booking sites. However, pricing wise, Agoda gave me a good pricing with 10% discount!  Thus, were able to save as much as USD 25 per head. Also, unlike in other sites, Agoda provide free cancellation and no advance payment.', "The boat was beautiful. We loved sitting on the top deck. The food was very good and there was always a lot of it so you didn't go hungry. The staff were very helpful and the whole tour was well-organised. The drink prices were a bit steep compared to elsewhere but it was good they offered happy hours! Would recommend for couples and groups.", 'We joined for NYE 2016/7. GREAT service from AMAZING staff. The location is SUPERB for dramatic scenery and the food was top notch.Bar is a bit pricey, but 2 happy hours each day helped.Would definitely recommend!', 'We had a wonderful stay with Glory Legend Cruise with good services from hotel staffs especially the cruise manager. However, we felt that it could have been better if there are more rest time interval in between program and activities. Overall, We recommend Glory Legend Cruise for halong bay trip', 'We initially booked for the Glory Premium Cruise but were upgraded for free to their sister company, the Pelican Cruise. No complaints there as Pelican is a 5 star cruise and is bigger than the Glory Cruise. Staff and service were great. Cruise itinerary were awesome too, though it would be better if they had more activities on board. Overall, it was a great vacation.', "We had such a lovely 3 days on board the glory cruise. Amazing scenery we will never forget and the boat is very modern, clean and comfortable.We had a lovely host named 'happy', he spoke excellent english and went above and beyond to ensure all guests were happy. He was also full of lots of local knowledge, which was very helpful in places such as the caves. Food was brilliant on board, however you get farrrrr too much plus in our opinion too much seafood (and we love seafood!). So if your not so keen i suggest opting for the meat only option. If your in halong bay go with glory cruises.", "Great communication with the company via email to organise taxi transfer. We travelled on a mini bus which was free. We were upgraded from the premium to the luxury boat - guessing this is due to numbers. Room was cosy and clean. Amazing views out of large windows. Complimentary fruit and water provided. Lots of hot water for shower. Our guide Kenny was brilliant though at times it was tricky to understand his English. The boat sticks to a tight itinerary so there isn't much time for relaxing on the boat. Dinner was mainly seafood  and standard was good.", 'Toilets did not look like the ones in the photo (no marbled walls). Cruise is very commercialized as there was little thought put into organizing activities for 3D2N group. If you decide to go for the 3D2N option, pls note that on the 2nd day,  you will be transferred to a day cruise in the morning to explore the quieter parts of Halong Bay. Meanwhile, the cruise will drop-off the remaining 2D1N group and pick-up a new group of passengers. You will return to the cruise at about 3pm and the activity will then be the same as the first day. In this aspect, the cruise should really think about having a different program for people who paid for ab additional night. With that said, overall it was still a nice experience with good service from crew members', 'The overnight cruise was a fantastic experience, we were looked after by fantastic staff with delicious food and we were also fortunate enough to have rose petals on our bed. The activities on the boat were great fun, but they were a little rushed. It would be nice to spend a little more time on the islands we visited or where we went kayaking;  45mins turns it into a  bit of a rush.', "The only negative I had about the tour was that I  booked a family room for my family of 5 which slept 4. I expected to pay a surcharge for one more child but 3 days before the tour left I was notified by the cruise company I would have to pay  75% of the adult cost as a surcharge for 2 children, despite only needing one more bed. It would have been cheaper to book 2 separate rooms but by then was too late to change. Very disappointed with the Glory Legend's sales team. However, everything  else was excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed the cruise.", "We were a group of 6 and had booked 3 rooms with twin beds. One bed in one of the rooms was found to be soaked in water that leaked from the floor above. Luckily the staff was responsive and switched a room immediately. Another room has a faulty bathroom door and can't be closed at all. In this room, we also noticed that the aircon was leaking. Overall, still a pleasant experience as the staff onboard are very kind and warm", "Pick us up right from where we stayed at Hanoi. Driver was late about 20mins but I think it's normal because the old quarter streets could easily be congested. Overall bus transfer to Halong Bay is comfortable and clean limo bus with much leg room. Friendly staff guide us to cruise and warm welcome presentation from crew captain. We got on Pelican cruise instead of Glory legend. Pelican cruise is bigger in size compare to Glory. Rooms are not big but comfortable. Toilet is clean but you can see some hairs underneath the wooden tiles. Buffet lunch and 5 course dinner are good. Very friendly staff and takes good care of us. Overall, great experience cruising along Pelican cruise but the attractions and stops we went are so crowded and you can see many other company cruises alongside with you.", "January 2017, family with kids (9&15).  Not on a million dollar budget, this seemed the best option in our price range.  After 3 weeks of travelling Vietnam, it was a destination we were looking forward to.The bus trip was long, uncomfortable and a bit nerve wracking.  The number of times our driver slammed on the brakes was disconcerting but we eventually made it to our destination.  The tourist trap marble monument refreshment stop was a welcomed toilet stop, but the disabled artist workshop was not a highlight.  Items are very overpriced and with due respect to the artists (a bit tacky).  You're best off stocking up on some snacks and drinks to take on the bus with you prior to leaving Hanoi.On the long trip up, we passed by some very interesting towns and villages, however, our guide was snoozing, so we didn't get any commentary and therefore have no idea what some of the stuff was we passed.Upon arrival in Ha Long Bay terminal area, it is obvious what a huge industry this cruise business is.  It's misleading when you see photos of the beautiful Ha Long Bay and one cruise boat.  Believe me, there's scores of them, and you won't feel like you're on your own, it's like being in a regatta.  After a medium wait time while passports and other administrative stuff was done, the vessel was restocked and ready to board.I would not recommend this particular cruise for anyone who has any sort of mobility issues, possibly even just the use of a walking stick or slight unsteadiness on your feet, as the gangplank up to the bow is a little precarious, though the friendly staff assisted all on board.After a brief welcome and safety induction (yes there did seem to be enough life jackets for everyone!), we were allocated our cabins and left to explore.  Note:  there is no safety rail at the bow of the vessel, so those with small or curious kids may need to tie a rope on them.Upstairs was a nice little sundeck & bar area.  Areas for improvement would be the addition of som", 'I originally booked this trip with a friend, but we booked it separately and ended up on different boats.  Everyone else on the boat was in a large group, leaving me as the only solo traveler.  The staff saw this immediately and became my "friends" while doing everything they could to make me feel comfortable and make sure I was having a good time.  They didn\'t just do this for me, but for everyone else on the boat as well.  The excursions took us to beautiful viewpoints and were all included in the price of the cruise.  There was way more food that I could eat but it tasted incredible.  I would definitely recommend this company for a Halong Bay cruise!', 'We book glory legend cruise on Agoda but we were taken to a Phoenix Cruise.\rThey just had a banner saying "Welcome to Glory legend", the rooms were very different and smaller. Overall the boat was of lower quality than what is shown in pictures here.\rI felt cheated because of this.', "It was exactly how I imagined it, loved it.  Since it is a popular destination, it's a little annoying how crazy it is, but they have it dialed in.  I was a little concerned about the food situation, since I am the only one apparently that doesn't like seafood.  They address those issues right away with asking people if they have any dietary restrictions etc. The one thing for me was I really just wanted to cruise around and relax but there was so much to do, I could have just stayed on the boat and not joined in.  I felt rushed and not really relaxed.  I knew that going in so it wasn't an issue. Loved it!", 'I and my my wife traveled on Feb 3-5, we enjoy very much with this selected cruise, nice staffs and really really great food, the drink may be too expensive which I recommend you to prepare your own drinking water if possible, in conclusion, worth your money and the right choice..', 'We had a lovely time on this trip. The staff were lovely and the views stunning even in the slightly rainy weather. The rooms were clean and decently sized and the activities (except for the visit to the fishing village which was a bit meh) were great!']

address: Ã” 26 Báº¿n tÃ u Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, thuá»™c bÃ¡n Ä‘áº£o Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, Halong, Tá»‰nh Quáº£ng Ninh, Vietnam, Äáº£o Tuáº§n ChÃ¢u, Ha Long, Viá»‡t Nam
reviews: ['I had a wonderful trip from Hanoi pick up bus all the way to the boat, all the activity were nice, staff were friendly and polite. I was having a good mood but changed at the moment getting on the return bus. I didnâ€™t know that going to the front side seats need to take off shoes, I just went and sat down. In a second, the bus driver was seriously asking me to take off shoes and giving me a meant and very very unfriendly face to me. In the way he sometimes turned his head to me, and his face looked like I wasnâ€™t welcomed at all in his bus. This driver ruined my mood and your staff quality. He could use a nicer attitude to request me to take off my shoes. \rBy the way, I will have to say, â€œbananaâ€ the tour guide is a very nice and friendly person. Iâ€™ll give him a 5 stars ! \r\rI would have to say everything was great and good value for money. Only the last driver pissed me off.', 'We bought a trip for less than USD100/pax and it is totally worth the money. We had full inclusive tour including hiking, visiting the cave and kayaking. Excellent staff, â€˜bananaâ€™ was our tour guide, excellent food and choices of servings. Only the room is a bit tight. Will definitely recommend the cruise to others.', 'There is cheaper when you get to Hanoi but this trip was great, lots of fun and pretty easy going, there are several boats, according to some people who had to jump onto our boat they are pretty much the same. Good value for money.', 'Staff were not approachable, the room is dirty. You can smell the dirty sheets and seems like it was not washed properly or may have not been washed. The food was okay, good value for your money. You get what you paid for.Asked the staff to at least move the boat to where we can see the sunrise or sunset but did not even attempted to do anything. Got stuck in a cove with no cellphone signal, nothing to do in the place. No entertainment system. A/C has a schedule and they are switching off the main switch. So you get only 9-10 hours of air conditioner in a very humid weather.Never again for this cruise!', 'I took the 2D1N package & this included the Hanoi/Halong/Hanoi transfers, a single cabin, all meals on board (lunch/dinner/breakfast/lunch), visits to Ti Top island & Sung Sot Cave & kayaking. This is a mid-range cruise and overall, it was great in that you get what you pay for.', 'The crew tried hard to please the guest.  The room should have cuttlery to cut the fruit. But we had plenty food onboard and deliciuos especially dinner.  The beverage price was reasonable compared with the price at the bus stop on the way to the harbour.  The tipping is not required but if you are satified with your vacation why not.  All busses will drop you at 12.30 and pick you up at 12.30 on the next day.', 'Fantasea provided us with a very nice gentleman as our guide who had thorough knowledge about Halong Bay and its attraction. No complains about the ship. I would say it is above average. Food is great as well and we are always well fed. The staff provides activities which are worth doing but not forceful when one of the passenger chose to stay on the ship to recuperate. I would highly recommend this tour. Do at least an overnight one. I hope to bring my family to halong by someday and I would still use Fantasea. Ãœ', 'Absolutely wonderful experience  at a value for money price!  The weather was great!!! There was plenty of yummy  food (im over 100kgs and like to eat!). The cabin was a bit pokie but we were only in there to sleep . My wife doesnt eat sea food...... no problem they said she got a selection of dishes to choose from at each meal. The staff went out of their way to be accomidating.', 'the food served were very good, facilities in the room were satisfying. But you have to be very careful when getting onboard, because sometimes there will be many cruises embark at the same location, your cruise might stop far from the pier and you might need to hop from one boat to the other boats to get on your cruise. lucky me, i got help from another guest to pull me up onboard, not a very convenience and safety way to get on the board.', '3 of us did a 2D1N and each had a single room - which was comfortable and surprisingly spacious, the food came out in abundance and the Serenity made it easy to relax - even with the miserable weather and all the other boats in the water. Our Guide, Nana, was a bit soft spoken, admitted that she was still learning but was knowledgeable and her English was pretty good - there were some more difficult guests on board which I thought she handled well.The crew were friendly enough and were accommodating to our requests. Would be happy to travel with them again.', "This was a good midrange choice. No luxury, but a decent one. We met some great people there, the views were outstanding and the food was nice.If you are trying to decide if you need to go to Ha long - yes, GO there!How much to pay?If you are on a VERY tight budget - go for a one day tour for as cheap as you can get. Just to see the place.If you have about 50-70 $ to spent for a person - it means you are over the minimal backpackers budget. It will not harm you too use about 100$ per person. Go for a midrange tour 2 days 1 night. You will not regret. More money and more time? Go for 3 days 2 nights, but don't go below the midrange price. Need lux? Pay over 200/pax for night and over. You will get the same views. And a better ship.", 'We were so pleased with our choice. The food was the best we had during our 3 week stay in Vietnam. It was fresh with plenty of choices and changed with each meal. Drinks were reasonably priced, $1.50 USD for a can of soft drink. Activities included climbing through the cave, sightseeing, swimming at a beach and kayaking through a cave into a grotto. We saw families of monkeys up close at both the beach and in the grotto. The scenery makes this a must do in Vietnam.The cabins were not huge, but clean, wood lined, and if you go round the opposite side of the boat to your cabin door, you can slide the wooden shutters open for your room and enjoy the scenery and breeze from your beds. For the price we paid, this cruise was outstanding. FYI, you do get lunch on-board the second day before you head back to shore.The only negative was the day we were there, rubbish was being blown towards the beach we stopped for a swim at. We were told this happens sometimes when the wind blows a certain way. Great value for money cruise.', 'we love our tour guide Mr. Tinh. he made an effort to communicate with us. and he was funny and the rest of the crew were good to us. the air-con at night didnt work but i was okey with it i didnt like to sleep in an fully-air-condition room since the bay breeze was so relaxing. and i had a late shower after my husband and the water started to stop more often. i guess there water tank was almost empty, i didnt tried to ask them.', "I thought the cruise is really value for your money.  When I booked Halong Fantasea Cruise, it was one of the most affordable cruises offered.  But when you get to Halong Bay, all junks that cruised in the area were all the same including those that were priced higher. It very convenient because they provided shuttle service to and from Halong-Hanoi.  The food they served is not bad at all and there's enough for everyone.", "Overall very good. We had heard many bad things about Halong Bay  but we're pleasantly surprised. Yes, there are many boats and tourists but its still beautiful and all part of the experience. Fantasea was a good choice, the food was a highlight-- very tasty and more than enough to eat. Our boats engine wasn't working so we were attached to another boat the entire time, which was a little odd but didn't change our experience except that instead of an ocean view we saw another boat.", "We had heard horror stories about choosing a bad Halong Bay cruise and so chose this mid-range option. It was absolutely perfect for the price - the cabins were clean and bright, nothing dirty or sketchy about anything on the boat, the activities were great, the food was fine. If you spend more money you may get fancier cabins, food or top deck but frankly I don't think its worth it if you're a budget traveler because Halong Bay is the big attraction and you'll see it from any boat you use. This is a really nice option. Ba was our tour guide and was very kind and enthusiastic about the area. Princes of alcohol and other drinks were too expensive for Vietnam. Bring your own water.Also, they said there was wifi but it didn't work all weekend. This was fine, we were too busy to check the internet, but they shouldn't advertise wifi.", "Excellent service from the manager and staff. The tour guide and the crew are very nice and helpful. Thanks for the birthday party arrangement. I like kayaking so much. But I don't like the beach when I was swimming, it is dirty. Nice food!", 'The cruise is fantastic packed with activities but the internet was horrible. Sometimes you get connected and the next moment you are disconnected. Apparently they use the slower end of internet modem which must be upgraded.', 'Awesome stay and awesome tour group. The tour guide can get too pushy (not go there, no pictures, etc) and this may be part of their training as tourists can get really rowdy, but otherwise fun and amazing. Lunch and dinner are superb, breakfast not so much.', 'The boat we were staying was a bit newer than other boats with similar prices. Wifi was provided on the boat. Air-cond was on only during sleeping hours. Good to have a coach to pick us up at the hotel and the pier without much waiting time.']
