hotel name: Intercontinental Residence SÃ i GÃ²n (Intercontinental Residence Saigon)
address: GÃ³c phá»‘ Hai BÃ  TrÆ°ng vÃ  Ä‘áº¡i lá»™ LÃª Duáº©n, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Tuong doi thoai mai Nhung phong chua co du dep di trong phong mac du dat phong cho 5 nguoi. Khi dat phong nhan vien le tan lam viec chua that chu dao vi chua lay het ID nen an sang gap truc trac 1 luc, nhan vien nha hang moi ok 5 suat chi cho 1 can ho mac du dat 2 can ho - moi can 5 nguoi. Check out kha nhanh.', 'Tá»‘t', 'Nice hotel, just some ongoing renovation and causes some noise during the morning.', 'My 3days 2 night stay here was so far one of the best experiences I have ever had in our travel experience. The staffs were friendly and helpful when approached - at all times. We had a tailor coming in to send us our garments to the hotel at 11 pm and the front desk & concierge was very helpful in providing detailed instructions to the tailor, as well as sending it all to our room much later. The staff at the lobby is always smiling and greeting us merrily and their joy is infectious! The facilities in the suite are top notch. We have everything that we would ever need in the room. The location is superb - just a walk away from all the attractions.I will definitely comeback soon.', 'It was such a positive experience staying at Interconti Residences. Everything was very smooth from the check in to check out. Location, Staff, Room, everything was perfect. If you want breakfast or high tea services you do end up in the hotel where we actually have had some massive disappointments; for some reason staff there is so unprofessional and made us wonder why there is a difference between the performance in Residences and the Hotel.', 'Great apartments in the middle of the city, in walking distance to the main sight seeing spots. Great breakfast and many restaurants around the hotel - Starbucks in the same building.\rThe apartments are spacious and everything needed inside, incl. washing machine/dryer and the washing powder provided. We had the one bedroom studio and it was totally sufficient for 2 adults and two toddlers (baby cod was provided). And after the kids slept we could sit in the living room and enjoy the quiet time :-))\rStaff is very friendly and helpful.\r\rSmall pool and kids pool also available - great for the kids after sight seeing. Restaurants in the hotel are kids friendly, but prices are not cheap.', 'This place is centrally located in District 1.  Near many attractions like Cathedral and War Remnant.  Very nearby is Diamond Plaza, a shopping center.The apartments are large and well furnished.  Being an apartment, it has fridge, cooking range, microwave, washing machine, cooking utensils and washing machine.The gym is nice and clean, no odor.', "Great location, right smack in the middle of District 1, so you're never too far from anywhere. Nice hotel, new and spacious room, pretty good for a business traveler like me seeking a home-like atmosphere", 'The hotel is the best in Saigon in my opinion, with very good value for money, professional standard in every aspect, recommend all to check the availability of special rates especially in the residence part...', 'Our two bedroom apartment was huge and had everything we needed and more. Only negative of apartment was the rather bizarre shower knob that was nearly impossibly to turn in. Housekeeping was incredibly thorough. Loved the pool and leisure facilities. Only had one drink in the Library bar as so many other more interesting and far cheaper eating and drinking options nearby. Close to most things. Would stay there again but request higher floor as there was quite a lot of noise from the beer club across the road.', 'The best stay we have had as a family in HCMC. The cleanliness of the apartment day in day out, staff were very professional and polite, location and convenience of shops downstairs. Diffinately our choice of stay in HCMC. Thank you Intercontinental HCMC.', 'Booking through agoda was not found on my arrival, spent one hour but still could not be located, eventually a new reservation was booked for us but it could have been done earlier as the booking was a "pay at hotel" one, not sure why need to wait so long, hotel should just deal with agoda but not letting the guest to wait one hour to make another "pay direct" booking, more terrible was that we had to wait for the room to be ready for another three hours after our reservation was sorted out.', 'The location is quite good and can walk to most of the sightseeing places and nice restaurants. Our three-room unit is good for family. with big kitchen and dining. If can have one more bathroom would be better. Just the service is not as good as the hotel part.', "Surprised check-in procedure, they asked me to pay because Agoda did not pay yet(!?) then I said Agoda charged me, so I wont pay! Then they said, your room is not included breakfast, then I show the booking with breakfast, but they said they need to confirm it again...terrible!\r\rDon't know why they provide me cheap breakfast at ground floor with Noodle or Toast with jam only (NOT a kind of breakfast like the other five star hotel). Terrible, everyday Pho Noodle or Toast....The room is clean and large but smells bad...may be not comeback anymore if no explanation from this hotel.", 'really great hotel, great location, recommended a wonderful seafood restaurant.  very friendly and accommodating to us as we have an infant and a younger child.  will definitely be our recommend place of stay whenever we visit ho chi minh.  THANK YOU.', 'All was very good except they have construction directly behind the hotel that can be heard in your room. This will last a long time as they are just starting construction. Food at Basilico is mediocre at best. Avoid a bagel for breakfast. Just normal bread with a hole, not a bagel at all. Plenty of eating options outside the hotel. The rooms in the hotel are great and the staff are helpful and kind.', "Brilliant room in the residences / serviced apartment section of the InterContinental. \r\rThe room is huge...and the price is not. There is no minimum stay.\r\rIdeal place to stay for travellers in the middle of a lenghty stay as there is in room laundry faciliy.\r\rLocation is great too! \r\rDefinitely recommend this place.\r\rYou are also allowed to access the hotel facilities - so it's best of both worlds.", 'We enjoyed our stay here very much. The staff are friendly and very helpful with everything. The apartment is a great size and enough bathrooms for everyone including my 2 teenage daughters! The inhouse food was expensive but very good however we could easily walk to many wonderful cafes and restuarants as Saigon is full of them. We went to the supermarket and bought some food, snacks and drinks and there is a washing machine/dryer in the property as well.We would most certainly stay here again.', 'Good equipment , and good culture! Just the price is a little high!', "It's a very nice hotel in the city center, nice staff and breakfast."]

NhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n.', 'The hotel was located a little far from the centre about a 15-20min walk. Thereâ€™s nothing really open around the hotel. The suite was lovely and everything was clean apart from one small area of the bedroom, when we arrived had a bit of water on the floor. One negative was that both nights we had to ask for hand towels. The bed wasnâ€™t as comfortable, a mattress topper would have done wonders. The breakfast buffet wasnâ€™t bad, but one negative was that twice when requesting the staff for more fruit, they stood around talking and forgot about our request and therefore had to ask someone again. There was only one lift so at times we were waiting, but then discovered another lift on the other side of the restaurant. Overall, we did enjoy our stay and the staff were friendly. The manager did try to make up for the undertrained and uncaring staff.', 'Book for this due to distance from office.But room is not clean. and bathroom door is bad.Please atmosphere in the Lobby is good. but that`s all.I will book for another hotel around this hotel next month.', "Does not have a swimming pool, but rather a large (hot) jacuzzi. Who wants a jacuzzi in HCMC? Also, gym has three pieces of equipment, outside, and that's it. Breakfast was limited in western options to fruit, cereal, bacon and eggs, however they didn't have bacon the three mornings I was there. It's a beautiful place, great location and friendly staff. The area around the jacuzzi is nice, however if you want a swimming pool to cool down in during the heat of the day, this is not the place for you.", 'My partner and I chose this hotel almost entirely based on the rooftop pool and price. What we didnâ€™t realize was how much more came with the hotel. When you walk in, you can tell the hotel is well maintained and newly renovated. Beautifully, tastefully decorated art is everywhere. The staff are warm, kind, helpful and always willing to practice their English with a smile. \rWhen we travel in Asia we prefer places that are central so we can walk almost anywhere, or taxi. Au Lac Legend was ideal in this respect too. All the main attractions of Saigon fit within 1-2km of the hotel. Thereâ€™s even a market called the Box Market within 3 minutes walk. 7-11 is close by too.\rService has also been remarkable. There was some issues that came up due to renovations and the nearness of the hotel. We were blown away by how the manager, Thuy, and her exceptional staff were able to accommodate and turn a negative into an absolutely positive, memorable experience and stay for us. At the time of writing, this hotel is massively undervalued and weâ€™d strongly recommend to anyone looking for a balance of city and quiet sanctuary to choose Au Lac Legend for their stay. Thank you to the staff and especially Thuy for the unforgettable stay! :)', 'Could be so much better. My room was double booked (still canâ€™t believe this) so didnâ€™t actually get the room I booked. King room isnâ€™t a king bed more like a double. No refrigerator in room, no mini bar. No bath in the room as advertised. Did get a window which seems unusual for the hotel. Breakfast is crowded and spills over into the foyer. Jacuzzi on the roof is great but lacks room for many guests. Staff need better management and training in their roles. Very little English spoken which makes the smallest requests a little difficult. Such a shame as it has so much potential.', 'Staff is not friendly, room is different with pictures on website, small and no bathtub ( pictures when booking is have bathtub)\rNo no sound insulation between room and other room, very noisy and canâ€™t sleep\rBreakfast is not much. I think not good for stay because you canâ€™t relax', 'Great location, clean room, great food. Overall fantastic.', 'No normal towels', 'Upgraded to the suite room and it was worth the money. Room was spacious with big window and very nice bathroom. Deluxe room was a bit small without window and several rooms have no bathtub.', 'People here are nice.Breakfast is normal, we found many ants and even cockroach appeared.', 'The only â€œhappyâ€ thing is the room. Only a staff that make me feel very welcomed were the concierge. Lack selections on breakfast and not topping up properly for foods and coffee. â€œStaffâ€ is the big â€œ-â€œ for this hotel.', 'Very good 4* hotel, rooms and other facilities OK.A little bit noisy outside with scooter horns.Good price.', 'Toilet had an open wall, noises from the road can be heard directly even with the toilet door closed. Sleepless nights. Staffs are friendly and fast.', "Our second time back, it's a great boutique hotel with comfortable rooms, great breakfast selection and fantastic location.  Awesome value for money in Saigon."]

address: 67 LÃª Lá»£i, Quáº­n 1, PhÆ°á»ng Báº¿n NghÃ©, thÃ nh phá»‘ Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, 710200
reviews: ['Vá»‹ trÃ­ Ä‘áº¹p, phÃ²ng Ä‘áº¹p. GiÃ¡ cao', 'One of the best hotels we have stayed in.Fantastic location right in the thick of District One.Wonderful rooms - we had a huge 2 bedroom apartment, with 2 bathrooms, kitchen and a laundry.Fabulous pool area which we had almost to ourselves everyday.Great buffet breakfasts.All staff members we dealt with were extremely friendly and helpful.We will definitely stay at the Sedona Suites Grand Tower next time we visit Ho Chi Minh City!', 'Highly recommend - for convenience as there is a well known mall connected to the hotel (Saigon Centre) which houses Takashimaya. Opposite you have the Saigon Square market and about 5 minutes walk away is Ben Thanh market. Easy to get grab/taxi as there is a taxi stand on the right side of the hotel lobby and staff are there to help you 24/7.', 'If you are looking for a hotel with an amazing view, this place is it.  If you want an amazing location to use as your base this is it.  Looking for privacy, zen like room and atmosphere, this is the place.  Absolutely love this place.  Great Restaurant options in the lobby and if you fancy street food just step outside and options abound.  Would stay here for a month if I could.  Just EXCELLENT!!!!', "My wife and I stayed at The Sedona Suites for 7 nights. The place was immaculate, and the staff were professional. You can't beat the location! The washing machine was a godsend as it meant we didn't have to pack a lot. The kitchen and fridge allowed us to make breakfast, but to be honest, with the food offering in HCM, why would you cook? Lol.Great place. I highly recommend it.", "This is the 10 times we come back to sedona suit . the staff is friendly ,good location , only 1 thing disappointed was we can't use hair dryer in the bathroom, there was no power point install. i  hope the hotel should fix that problem otherwise everything perfect.", 'I was very impressed with the high class quality of the hotel. I was staying at the serviced apartment. Everything is fantastic and superb. Facilities are wonderful. I was very careless to leave my valuable items in the safe before checking out. The supervisor and team members at the hotel went out of their way to try to contact me for me to retrieve the items. I am very thankful to their integrity and great kindness. I will stay over there long term every time during my trip. Thank you once again to the whole crew at the hotel. Highly recommended.', 'Location is good but guess room is noisy, I can hear the voice from next room, may be due to the room type, my room is connecting room, the smallest  one...', "Our 2 bedrooms were fantastic and everything was modern and clean.  Centrally located but not noisy because the building is very high. Only minus point is it doesn't have Spa services.  But I would definitely go back to Sedona Suite the next time I'm at HCMC.", 'Recently renovated, all the facilities were clean and slick. From the reception to staff, all aspects of service was 5 out of 5. Especially the outdoor swimming pool was warm even in the evening and the reception desk helped us to travel to Vung Tau by motorcycle with a kind advice.', 'We had a fantastic stay at Sedona Suites. It is our second time to stay at this hotel. First time was with our 2 young children.Great location, staff and facility. It will be our "go to" hotel when we are back in Saigon.', 'Nothing to fault. Highly recommended', 'Beautiful views over Saigon from way high up. Sleek public spaces. Clean and large suites. Central location for great restaurants and shopping. Excellent value.', 'good', 'Staying here just 1 night but so in love with this place. Nice and clean room..view is excellent. I will definitely come back for the next time.', 'We love the view. Breakfastt was good.', "Best thing is that it's attached to a great air conditioned mall with lots of great reasonable restaurants.   I feel it's 50% more expensive than it should be, but the amazing location is a big plus.  Breakfast is just ok,  room decent, but not great value.   Staff were polite and friendly.", 'Please do not confuse with old sedona.', 'All is great except for breakfast selections for the price we pay.', 'Perfect hotel, perfect location and very clean! nice hotel for groups like us 6 girls and also good for families! reviews: ['Noi chung, gia dinh chung toi cam thay hai long khi nghi tai khach san Renaissance Riverside Saigon. Gia dinh chung toi o Club suite floor va duoc tan huong toan bo nhung benefit cua no. Phong oc thi trang bi day du, tinh te va tien loi. Tuy nhien, chung toi khong thay hai long nhan vien le tan (female staff, look young and nice) lam thu tuc check out. Chung toi cung la nhung nha quan ly khach san cao cap va hien la chu cua nhung co so kinh doanh cao cap tai Nhatrang, nen chung toi hieu rat ro thai do cua nhan le tan nhu the nao. Tat ca deu perfect, ngoai tru "last impression = worst feeling". Anyway, we feel happy and will return to Renaissance Riverside soon!Ha Nguyen0913444337', 'Ks gan song,nhan vien than thien,do an ngon,an sang rat nhieu mon,nhung gia qua mac va gia phong cung qua mac trong cac dip le tet', 'khach san thi to, nhung phong thi nho . Trang thiet bi cung khong dat chuan 5sao. may ma dat phong nhin ra song sai gon, neu la phong nhin pho thi chan chet. noi chung la neu o khach san nay thi gia dat qua agoda la gan 200 usd ma khong co an sang la qua bat hop ly vi khach san k du tieu chuan 5sao. se k phai la sÆ° luc hcon cua toi trong nhung lan sau.', 'phong qua nho,trang thiet bi khong dat tieu chuan 5 sao. hien nay ma va khong dc free truy cap internet. co dc Æ°u diem la nam ven song sai gon nen co the ngam mat troi len buoi som kha dep va tam mat dc thoai mai. neu ban lay phong trong pho thi chac chan se rat tiec tien cho ky nghi tai day. gia da giam qua agoda la 200 usd ma k co an sang. qua dat.', 'phuc vu chu dao , nhiet tinh .Khach san co khong gian dep v asang trong, toi hi vong se duoc nghi tai khach san lan sau', 'Vá»‹ trÃ­ thÃ¬ Ä‘áº¯c Ä‘á»‹a nhÆ°ng view chá»‰ Ä‘áº¹p vá»›i river view cÃ²n city view thÃ¬ bá»‹ che bá»Ÿi toÃ  mÃª linh point vÃ  1 khÃ¡ch sáº¡n Ä‘ang xÃ¢y Bá»“n táº¯m vÃ  táº¯m Ä‘á»©ng dÃ¹ng chungÄ‚n sÃ¡ng chuáº©n bá»‹ Ä‘á»“ lÃ¢u, nhÃ¢n viÃªn cÃ³ giáº£i thÃ­ch do mÃ¹a dá»‹ch nÃªn bá»‹ cáº¯t nhÃ¢n sá»± nhÆ°ng thá»±c sá»± quÃ¡ lÃ¢u, quáº§y salad chÆ°a tháº­t phong phÃº, chá»‰ cÃ³ 3 loáº¡i sá»‘tNhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, cho nháº­n phÃ²ng sá»›m dÃ¹ chÆ°a Ä‘áº¿n giá» checkin', 'Phong sach, dep, tien nghi. Nhan vien lich su, kha nang giao tiep tot. Bua an sang tot.', "It's a little pricey but you'll definitely be happy with your stay here. Check in was a breeze, rooms are nice, water pressure / temperature is good, bed is comfortable, facilities are well maintained, staff are professional, breakfast is comprehensive... I can go on and on.", 'Club lounge in there has not changed anything from 8years ago.many places are trying to change,but finally  almost failed. Club lounge there is able to keep that kind of level is really the best. They clean the lounge everywhere and every staff there is outstanding.', 'Staff was very friendly and helpful during check-in and check out. Perfect hotel for NYE and festivities as the staff are exceptionally helpful and provided great service to me despite the high season during NYE. Would definitely come back here in 2019 given that they gave me such a good start to 2019 when I did my countdown in Saigon.', 'Everything was great except the room seemed a little old. Can also do with upgrading their weak hair dryers. Love the great selection of food choices at breakfast. Delicious food with great Korean / Japanese choices', 'I come to HCMC for work all the time and this is one of the hotels at which I stay, as it is close to Dong Khoi where I work. Close proximity to many restaurants make this a great choice for business or leisure travelers alike.', 'Made a very last minute booking from agoda as the hotel 2 building next to it was horrible. Staff was very nice and polite to help us to check in at 1am even though agoda had not sent any confirmation to the hotel.Breakfast was fantastic.Hotel room are very clean except for the toliet abit old.Roomservice, 6 star rated. the snack food " Meat ball", die die must try, very good.Abit pricely, but still ok for a 5 star hotel. Highly recommended.', 'It was a good stay, love the room ,the river view, I stayed at a club room. Food wise both at the club room and breakfast buffet is mean for 100% for non muslim. Look guys, this is asian, i am sure you have visiotrs from Muslim countries and jewish people too. Both of us myself and my poor jewish friend which has to be vegetarian that day, cause most of the food are pork. Been to the rest of Asian countries, thailand, loas, Myanmar, they have varieties (chicken, beef, lamd and etc,)', 'Upon my arrival at the hotel, the staff has kindly upgraded me to the river-view room as the day before my arrival was my birthday. The room itself is rather small than I expected but not bad at all.  Lobby lounge on the 5th floor is very attractive and their location is perfect to look around HCM city!', 'Nice experience. Good breakfast menu. Location is really top near to city center. Nice room, good bath room amenity kits. My complaint only on wifi facility. No free wifi in the room. You must pay around usd10/days.', 'Hotel staffs are well trained, speak good English. Location is very centralized, view is great if room is river facing. Internet connection is consistent and stable. Would recommend it to business and holiday travelers.', 'Great hotel and very comfortable. We always end our trips to Vietnam at this hotel. It gives us time to kick back and relax before we depart. The staff is very attentive and responsive to requests. We will be staying here again.', 'We stayed 3 nights in this hotel and loved every minute of it. It is a great hotel and just the place to explore the streets of HCMC,dine in one of the many restaurants in the city centre or walk to all the main tourist sights.']

NhÃ¢n viÃªn khÃ´ng há» xin lá»—i vÃ  thÃ´ng bÃ¡o cho tÃ´i biáº¿t viá»‡c chiáº¿c xe tÃ´i bá»‹ Ä‘á»• Ä‘á»ƒ trá»‘n trÃ¡nh trÃ¡ch nhiá»‡m.', 'As usual, hotel staff is friendly and helpful as always. Special mentioned to Wilson, even though he is not on duty upon my check-in but surprised me that all arrangements had been arranged and settle beforehand. The extra kind thought does help a business traveller like me to save more times. Thumbs up once again for Roseland Centa, keep it up.', 'The pool is def smaller than imagined but it was OK because I was the only one using it most of the time!Cute little bar with great barmanThey kindly upgraded me to a suite which was good - I think the standard room must be really small as the suite was as big as normal room in other hotels.  Good value though, if you onlyk want to pay $80-$100 last minute on Agoda.. it is good value for moneyArea is Japanese district - you can walk to Shopping area and mall', '1) not enough room cards they can only give 1 per room causing inconvenience2) booked single beds but they insisted they only have 1 queen size3) security lots of loopholes4) staff unpleasant', 'This is our second time staying here and has no reason to try other hotels. The reasons as stated below :- Fantastic breakfast options which the main courses and dishes changed daily.  Breakfast session starts very early which made work traveler very convenient and comfortable.- Amazing experience with hotel staff namely Wilson and another bell boy who is wearing spectacle. Wilson is multilingual, polite, patient and very helpful to all the request and questions. Likewise, considerate and helpfulness of the bell boy which leave us a very good impression about the stay.Definitely will return again in August for work and hopefully other trips for leisure. Thank you Roseland Centa.', 'This is our second time staying here and has no reason to try other hotels. The reasons as stated below :- Fantastic breakfast options which the main courses and dishes changed daily.  Breakfast session starts very early which made work traveler very convenient and comfortable.- Amazing experience with hotel staff namely Wilson and another bell boy who is wearing spectacle. Wilson is multilingual, polite, patient and very helpful to all the request and questions. Likewise, considerate and helpfulness of the bell boy which leave us a very good impression about the stay.Definitely will return again in August for work and hopefully other trips for leisure. Thank you Roseland Centa.']

Cáº£m Æ¡n cÃ¡c báº¡n!ğŸ¤©', 'táº¥t cáº£ Ä‘á»u tá»‘t . nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n gáº§n ngay trung tÃ¢m thÃ nh phá»‘, tiá»‡n Ä‘i mua sáº¯m vÃ  Äƒn uá»‘ng cÃ¡c loáº¡i. KhÃ´ng gian khÃ¡ch sáº¡n áº¥m cÃºng, sáº¡ch sáº½, nhiá»u tiá»‡n nghi. NhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, dá»‹ch vá»¥ tá»‘t', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n Ä‘áº¹p, nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, giÃ¡ cáº£ há»£p lÃ­, thÃ­ch nháº¥t lÃ  miá»…n phÃ­ minibar', 'To those who are looking for a hotel stay in HCM CITY, do not hesitate to book this hotel, it was superb ! Strategic location, most of the attractions are within walking distance. Modern and spacious room, a big hammock is hanging in room, best place for relax after a long day sightseeing. Free snacks and drink in room and rooftop lounge, everything is complimentary by the hotel. Breakfast is included, not much of variety but was very tasty though, love their ice white coffee with condensed milk ! For those light sleeper, you may request to have a quiet room, you will be annoyed by tons of bikes and horn at night, luckily i have brought my own ear plug. I was very satisfied with the hotel, the best boutique hotel I have ever stayed !!! Great Job !!!', 'Very good location can reach famous sight-seeing spots, shopping area by walk; good restaurants nearby; spacious & stylish room; unlimited supply of drinks & snacks; warm greetings from staff; very good price-performance.', 'The location was ideal as everything was in a short walking distance to the major attractions such as war museum, palace and markets etc. The hotel is small but the additional amenities offered was surprising such as free minibar and the area on the 7th floor called the space which was an outdoor area which was loaded with free food and as much drinks as you would like (ranging from soft drinks to beer). The only criticisms of the hotel was the breakfast as it was more a snack from the attached coffee shop and during our first night they did warn us that some renovations would be happening near our landing however the work went on into the early hours of the morning with drilling, hammering etc luckily we were tired so managed to get some sleep. Thankful it was only one night of renovating!', "It was a great experience staying at this hotel.Accept that the noise from the rooftop terrace and corridor by other travelers was too much.The room door can't block much of it and it really disturbs my sleep in the early morning.Other than that, everything was good.", 'Excellent place to stay in the heart of the city. Quick check-in and explaining facilities . The cool beer in the lounge is very nice after a  hot day out in town. Also the washer and dryer very useful after a trip to the chu chi tunnels and jungle trek . Very practical hotel that knows what a trveler to go chi  min requires Would stay again if return.', "There's a hammock in the room. Mini bar with beer and snacks are free. On the top floor, there's a room filled with beer, drinks and snacks including hot dogs and Chinese buns. All free. Breakfast is served in the coffee shop on the ground floor (coffee and pastries - no bacon and eggs!). Coffee is of high quality. The location is great. Plenty of eating places around. In short, we really had a good time.", "Free beer. Free. Beer. The minibar is fully stocked daily and if you run out, the rooftop has beer, soft drinks, and snacks, as well as free laundry. Despite the free flowing alcohol, the hotel was not noisy or boisterous at all. The breakfast comes from the coffee shop downstairs, and choices were limited there. \r\rMost helpful staff I have ever encountered. My girlfriend's phone was stolen on the street (not near the hotel), and the hotel staff came to our rescue, paying for the taxi to and from the police station and helping us file the police report. Since we were leaving Vietnam, they even went back to the station days later to get a copy of the report and then scanned it to email it to us. I cannot say enough good things about the staff! I would recommend this hotel to anybody.", 'The room is big and neat. A lot of snack for us in the room and roof TOP lounge. Like it a lot. Will come again. Breakfast was good too as it was from the coffee house. Will stay here again next time.ğŸ‘', 'I love how they welcome and assist guest. The hotel is good for solo travelers since it is quiet and you can chill at the rooftop or at the coffee shop. The room is clean and in order. Anyway, i love the bed!!! I really slept well.', 'We would like to express our appreciation to the hotel staff especially Miss Phan T. Ngoc Duyen and the 2 ladies who were on duty during the night on 7 June 2019.  Our family unluckily encountered a robbery case by a taxi driver when we got on a taxi at Cho Ben Thanh Market.  After we shared the case with the the hotel staff when we were back to the hotel, the hotel staff offered kind assistance to us and accompanied us to report the case in the police station on the next day.  They all understand English very well and provided good support in doing the translation with the police.  Afterwards, they also helped us to book Grab cars many times so that we could go to one place to another place safely.  We wish them all good health and success in future.\r\rOne minor point about the hotel facilities:  We stayed in the Family Nest room on the 5/F floor, the bath shower is rather weak.  This is the only point which the hotel could improve.  Others are perfect!', 'Pros: Clean room. Love the hammock and the free flow snacks, cup noodles, soft drinks and BEER. Location is great too. The hotel is located near to two popular banh mi stores. I like how the hotel lobby is a cafe (we get our coffee/ice teas from there too). Cons: Walls are thin. You can hear your neighbours chatting outside and closing of room doors.']

Staff at the front desk was always helpful in getting a taxi for somewhere. There are a number of international restaurants around the hotel, which is convenient. Has an elevator. Wi-Fi works good.  Worked well for me while in Ho Chi Minh doing business.', 'Very friendly staff. Great location! Beds are super firm but I like that. Not the cleanest. I donâ€™t think they mop the floors very well. They were very dirty.', 'I do not recommend hotel. The hotel manager Pham Nam must go away from this hotel. He speaks not friendly with customers.', 'Huge place with huge beds. The only off is the receptionist sleeps a lot and they smoke inside the lobby. Didnâ€™t know it was allowed. There are lot of near restoâ€™s and convenient stores.', 'Over sold room, tried to change my reservation and relocate to the other hotel', 'The best rooms are the ones that end in once(1) - 101/201 /301 etc as they have big window to the front.  Reception and staff have  no English at all.  Very hard to communicate.   It is in a fantastic  area though.', 'our room has little cockroaches in the bathroom and the bath towels were smelly. The first reception girl was kinda rude.', "Don't think twice just book it. Felt like a home away from home with the fabulous and attentive staff. Kieu (as seen in photo) and HiÃªn went above and beyond to help me with whatever I needed and became more friends then anything else. The men that worked the door were also great and the cleaning staff did their jobs extremely professionally.  I stayed for 2 weeks (my brother then joined for another week) in a room facing the street and I couldn't have been happier. The room was very spacious and the bed was large and very comfortable (not like other hard mattresses often found). Also the room was very clean (cleaned meticulously daily), had a good working aircon and the window overlooking the street was just huge which I loved. It was also quiet when the window was closed. Big selling point for me was also the big rainwater shower. It is 2min walk to Ben Thanh Market and Bui Vien St (nightlife), but just far enough away to be peaceful. Minimart 150m away. Bang for your buck. Thank you", "Very tiny room with no sunlight coming in. The AC brought in heavy cigarette smoke several times during our stay. When we complained, we were told to wait one more night to see if anything would change - which it did! So we didn't complain any further.  The smoke was back on the third day and so it continued on/ off. When checking out the receptionist refused to lower the price due to our inconvenience!", "Good location(5mins walk to backpacker's st)!\rClean room!\rGood enough facilities!\rHelpful and kind staffs!!\rThis hotel is better than any other 3star  hotels", "I paid already but the receptionist told me that there were not available room. how can i understand? i think prepaid means one room is for me, right? even if i'm late, they didn't give me any notice and ask when i expect to arrive. fortunately, receptionist let me stay in another hotel. but i was so disappointed."]

reviews: ['KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n vá»‹ trÃ­ ráº¥t thuáº­n lá»£iSáº¡ch sáº½', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº¡ch Ä‘áº¹p, vá»‹ trÃ­ cÅ©ng ráº¥t tuyá»‡t vá»i. We could stay in better hotel with lower price. We booked a suite on the top floor for 3 people to stay in, but it's really small. Besides the shower room  is no hot water and weak water press. The gym, which is only 3 equipments in a tiny room, is beside the room, so quite noisy.The great location, good staff and breakfast is only thing I gave a good review.", 'Pros are great location next to Saigon Center and Takashimaya and great staff on the ground floor and restaurant....cons: sound-proofing insulation is terrible that I slept with periodic noises from the street, what I was very upset about is...one day I came back to my room and saw one bag of garbage was on the sofa right next to my personal stuff, this definitely was disgusting and so carelessly forgotten by house keeper, but I also realized he/she thought itâ€™s ok to put it on the sofa of guest room, so bad!!!! I called the reception and they just could apologize, attitude was acceptable  but staff definitely must be re-trained because for the person like me that experienced this might not choose to come back. I would think direct apology in person or even just via call/email from manager or anyone from management to apologize in person will be more appropriate instead of doing almost nothing.', 'Close to shopping bars restaurants', 'Good location and friendly staff but lack of public space and hotel demanded service.', 'good', 'In a main stress which would be crowded on rush hour', 'Great location, friendly staff, clean and huge room. I had a pleasant stay.', "Staff is very professional and sweet, hotel is nice and clean, breakfast is good, and location is convenient. Good for short work trips. The only main problem at the hotel is noise, especially if you are a light sleeper or sensitive to it, as it seems the walls are quite thin. During our stay, we could hear the water running from another room (when they are using the washroom) and any noise outside the door to our room is quite loud (people talking by the elevator, trolley, phone from another room).  Another thing is lack of hooks or towel rails in the room. There were only two hooks in different spots and could've been a few more to hang the other towels instead of leaving them on the counter.", 'City center, walking to tourist places, foods and drinks just beside.', 'The M Hotel is located by a high class shopping mall. Walking to many tourist places.', '- Nice staff-  Modern decoration and clean- Close to Mall area', 'Because it is close to Bar Street, it â€™s too noisy to sleep at night. The hotel will give you a earplugs in the drawer.', 'This is a new hotel at a really great location (I would have given it 6 stars for location), it is near a nice mall and many restaurants. Certainly not a boring place to be staying whether you are alone or with family. The walls are a little thin but otherwise its a pleasant stay for me', 'We stayed at the hotel  for one night, New Years 2020. We chose it due to its centrality and proximity to city attractions and the new year fireworks. Was very impressed with the location, functionality of the room and staff service. Walking distance to most sites in the city, lots of food and drinking options nearby and shopping malls around the corner. Would recommend for a central location to get out and explore sites.', 'The location is great.  Every staff was very kind and helpful.', 'Hotel is nice & clean, location & service is good.  Just the room a bit small, I paid extra a bit to upgrade the room.  Other than that, everything is good.', 'All very good from the staff to facilities and location.  but they need to fix the sound proofing, you can hear bits of the nightclub nearby from the room till 4AM', 'Helpful and friendly front desk staff especially Thuy vy .Good location, beside Saigon Centre,Thakashimaya']

Toilet rá»‰ nÆ°á»›c nghe tiáº¿ng Ä‘á»™ng cáº£ Ä‘Ãªm ráº¥t sá»£. XÃ  phÃ²ng mÃ¹i láº¡', 'The design is really unique and you can see it right from the elevator. The rooftop is perfect to chill and you can enjoy the free unlimited snacks and drink (beer, soda, coffeeand tea) everywhere in the hotel, even in the mini bar in your room ! The breakfast is also very nice.', 'Nice staff, cozy room and lots of snacks.', "Excellent employees; coupled with good knowledge, attitude and nothing to pick on! The staffs were a young and enthusiastic bunch, spoke good english (important for the tourists) and was fun to chat with.Decor of the room is very modern, the hammock installation exudes a different flavour and the platform bed makes everything seems just right. Roof top bar was nicely decorated with a pool table and not forgetting the free flow snacks and beer!! Could just spend the whole day doing nothing but enjoying the cold cans of 333 with the view of HCMC.The Blush Spa which is located on 1F belongs to the hotel and there was a discount during my visit! Emma, the manager was impressive!If you want a getaway from the usual commercial or business hotels, The Hammock is where you should be as I like the room more than my own! *I always felt an affinity with the hotel because of it's concept and design and incidentally found out that the owners of hotel are my fellow locals!*", 'Stayed 3 nights with wife and a tweenage boy, enjoyed taking turns on the hammock, so much so that we were talking about putting one at home... location was great, walking distance to most tourist places and shopping... close to the centre but far enough not to be bothered by heavy traffic and vehicle horns all the time.. appreciate that there was free flow food / snacks/ drinks all the time, free use of fusbal, pool table, good wifi... even had the added adventure of catching a fruitbat one night... staff were young and speak good English, very accommodating and helpful... breakfast was light but tasty... definitely would stay again if we were in HCMC. I really hope that they recycle the empty drink bottles (weather was warm and we drank a lot)... maybe there could be a "recycle bin" in the room?', "We been travelling to North middle and south of Vietnam.  This is the best. Not to mention free snack and drink but also rooftop area that we can relax in the evening. I like their breakfast concept.  Order what you want and need.  Not to waste food.  Food are good appearance. Not only look good but taste good also.  Staff can speak fluent English compare to others.  And very helpful.  Good on Attend our question and issues. Well training.  Only area to improve but doesn't bother me which is their air-con is abit old, hence some noise. Clean room and welll equip with everything you need.", 'Everything about the hotel was exceptional. Exceptional service, tasteful decors, great location, breakfast til 12pm, free minibar and kitchen with just about everything you need, and all at a 3-star hotel rates. I have been to many 4 and 5-star hotels, and I could say this hotel exceeds them in many aspects.', "Loved the decor and free snacks & drinks available in-room and at the common area for guests! Aesthetics of the place is beautiful and I loved the hammock in the room. Staff were friendly too.  Well done, The Hammock Hotel Fine Arts Museum! If returning to the area, I'll definitely stay again.", 'I have to say that I am very impressed with them. The fist time I stayed at the Ben Thanh branch months back and the service was excellent. This time round I tried their fine arts museum branch and it was exceptional. I was surprised that some staff from Ben Thanh branch shifted to fine art museum and they remember my name. !! They even know what I like for breakfast !! I felt so at home. I do travel a lot in the region and certainly the hammock team has made my day and leave me a lasting impression. I will surely 100000% come back to this hotel !! Kudos hammock team !! Well done.', 'Rooms are small and clean. Free washing machines on top floor were convenient. Rooftop pool table and view are nice if you donâ€™t mind the heat/humidity.', 'Pros:Comfy bedsFree snacks/drinksWashing machinesBreakfast Cons:Price They use TOO MUCH PLASTIC....too many water bottles...get a water tank!', 'Thank you for offering me a super early check in.', 'the staffs were really helpful, the room was so spacious', "From friendly staffs, free flow snacks and beers, to comfortable bed........every comments from others' reviews were so true!!!! our group was fortunate to squeeze time to enjoy the spa. highly recommended :)", 'Really good breakfast, clean rooms, a choice of pillows, and free snacks and drinks! The roof terrace is a nice place to sit and read a book, and there are washing machines with washing tablets for guests to use for free! Really friendly staff and a great nights sleep', "The hotel is strategically located, it's a 5-10 mins walk to Ben Thanh Market and a 15-20 mins walk to Saigon river! I did not hire Grab or taxi while I was visiting the attractions like War Remnants Museum, Notre Dame Cathedral etc. It's a walkable distance, if you don't mind walking. Took a map from the staffs, and it was really useful! There were some recommended tours on the map as well. The staffs were helpful throughout my stay and attended to my needs instantly whenever they could! The hotel room was amazing, I love the interior and the bed was so comfortable! Most importantly, all the beverages (alcohol, soft drinks and milk) and food at the lobby are free! Love how generous they are!"]

The only thing is they don't have 3 Restaurants that should be change, there is the Breakfast room and the lounge and coffee bar, where the also serve food, but there is not an other real restaurant.", 'This hotel is great the staff and service are second to none and they are happy to go the extra mile to help out.  One Gem if you like to have a great sleep is to ask for one of the rooms with no windows, the first time we stayed here I was a bit concerned but after staying I always ask for the same rooms now as the room is pitch black at night and wonderful for sleeping in as even in the middle of the day the room is back out wonderful.', 'Based on good reviews from this hotel, I decided to stray away from my group and booked this hotel instead.  I am so glad that I never regret making this choice as the moment I stepped into this hotel, I feel so warm and welcome by the staff receiving me at door entrance, reception and next day staff at the breakfast area.  The hotel is strategic located, clean room though mine is without window view, it does not matter to me as I were out most of the time except evening.  There are many spa / massage areas near the hotel, one recommendation to try is the Golden Lotus Spa which is just behind the hotel about 3 min walk.  I feel very safe staying at this hotel, the staff always friendly and keep a lookout of my safety as well.  Even helping me to make reservation for my dinner appointments.  I will definitely head back to this hotel again on my next trip and hope Agoda will still keep this price very attractive for us to book. thank you', 'The best bed Iâ€™m currently sleeping in HCM city', 'Good!', 'The front desk personnel was kind enough to upgrade my reservation.  Appreciate it!', 'Located at the strategic area. Near the shopping belt, Vincom Center, Parkson, union square.The rooms are kinda old and TV programme signals are weak. Tends to reboot itself after watching a period of time.', 'My wife and I stayed in this Hotel for 10 days, of our 30 day trip to Vietnam. So we got to know the Hotel very well!The rooms were clean! The sheets were changed daily! The breakfast was excellent! They offered a couple of new items each day!If I was to return to Saigon; I would not hesitate to stay in this Hotel again.It is walking distance to Saigon Square and Ben Thanh Market (10 minutes).Lots of restaurants and small markets nearby.Book with Agoda, as the rates are much higher at the hotel! Enjoy!', 'Nhat Ha 3 hotel was close to the town centre around 5-7minute walk to Vincom Shopping centre. The room we had was a good size for 3 people, shower had decent pressure and was really clean. The breakfast was alright but never changed and was very Japanese orientated, which is good if you are Japanese but unfair to customers/guests that were not.The staff were helpful and most of them were friendly. I would go back again,  but hope they could consider changing the breakfast around a bit to suit everyone.', 'I booked 2 rooms with non- smoking but both rooms were ended up with all smoking. 1 was smelled really bad & smokes stayed in our clothing, hair & every where.Other than that, the rooms, facilities, staffs, location, breakfast are fabulous..', 'good cost, traffic, staff than near by other hotel.', 'we love the food for breakfast.']

Báº¡n sáº½ k pháº£i mang báº¥t ká»³ thá»© gÃ¬ Ä‘áº¿n Ä‘Ã¢y Ä‘Ã¢u, dáº§u gá»™i, xáº£, sá»¯a táº¯m Ä‘á»u lÃ  loáº¡i thÆ°á»ng ngÃ y hay dÃ¹ng chá»© k pháº£i máº¥y gÃ³i trong ks thÆ°á»ng tháº¥y Ä‘Ã¢u. SÃ n vÃ o phÃ²ng lÃ  cÃ¡t nÃªn hÆ¡i báº¥t tiá»‡n 1 chÃºt khi ra ngoÃ i, vÃ o phÃ²ng ngá»§, táº¯m xong ná»¯a, nhÆ°ng nÃ³ láº¡i mang cho mÃ¬nh cáº£m giÃ¡c Ä‘i biá»ƒn váº­y thÃ­ch cá»±c. Nv thÃ¬ nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh hÃ i hÆ°á»›c khá»i chÃª, giá»‘ng kiá»ƒu mÃ¬nh cáº§n cÃ¡i gÃ¬ lÃ  cÃ³ thá»© Ä‘Ã³ luÃ´n váº­y. Hotel táº¡o cho mÃ¬nh sá»± thoáº£i mÃ¡i tá»™t cÃ¹ng, láº§n sau cÃ³ dá»‹p mÃ¬nh váº«n sáº½ chá»n 24h SG. Cáº£m Æ¡n cÃ¡c báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘á»c.', 'The concept is great but it becomes dull and annoying pretty soon. would suggest a one night stay and the experience would be great. maybe if they keep the sand on the side and create a path to walk on would make things better.', 'Good location, very easy to go anywhere. Not really clean, maybe because the floor of capsule full of white sands...but actually the white sand is a good idea for the decorations. Lockers nice. Toilet and bathroom are clean. Will stay again if we back to Saigon', 'I went to the hotel recently and had great service from the co-manager, Nemo. The hotel has a real relaxing theme and the space pod was amazing :) I enjoyed chatting to a diverse  group of travellers  and we all agreed about the unique atmosphere.  Considering all the staff went home during the Tet Holiday, Nemo was able to serve and make us feel at home. Thanks :)Jack', "If you have ever thought 'what I want just before I get into bed is a foot full of sand' then this is the hostel for you. The capsule is a cool concept and it gives you privacy but I don't think it's worth the scratchy nights sleep.", 'My friend and I stayed there for 1 night in the private room. We booked the room from Agoda; and when we arrived at hotel, I found out that the room was given to someone else. At first, they said they will give us back our money. Then they changed their mind and told us that they would call the guests and ask them to leave. However, they couldn\'t reach out to the guest. So they told us that we could wait in the capsule room.A few minute later, they told us that we could leave our luggages at the reception (no room was giving anymore due to the fact that I said I would go out to eat). At this time, I was so disappointed. I insisted that I need a room to rest for a bit, get changed, and take shower. They said "Okay Okay".In the end, we got the room that we book but it was a nightmare. It\'s 12.30am and the restaurant on the 1st floor turned on the music so loud (imagine you go to the nightclub). So we decided to go out because we couldn\'t sleep. I wouldn\'t go back.', 'This was the most uncomfortable stay in 15 months of traveling! They tried to do something nice in the hostel but the result is very annoying. The room where the capsules are has sand on the floor which gets into your capsule. In the balcony and in the bathroom they put stones but not those smooth little white stones which don\'t hurt your feet but common stones which cut into your feet when you step on them. This would be a fine place to stay if they could get rid of the "design". Nobody likes sand between their toes all the time!', "Clean. Super cleaned. Super comfy. If you want to relax deep or work, it's place is perfect for you. The restroom/ bathroom was equipped... body lotion, shampoo, toothpaste... OMG, so good. Clean towel every day. Fresh air. WARM water! Friendly, lovely, helpful Hotel Manager. Thank you for everything.", 'As a solo traveller, cleaness is all I want. And the put on the SAND on the floor which make is messy.', "I love a hotel....beach concept with sand in the floor of room...it's very amazing", 'Doors were locked on arrival, though we noted arrival time on booking. Luckily our driver could call someone who arrived to let us in! Once inside, staff was great, capsule was roomier than expected. Loved the experience!', 'sands on the floor is not a good idea', "The capsule was cool, 24/7 AC good for your sleep , good facility but without stairway, it would be struggle with big suitcase but you can call a help from the reception. Location is perfect, just a few walk from lot of coffee shop and restaurant, sightseeing spot, shopping mall... and only a few minutes walk from Bui Vien walking street, it's not the same as it you used to be but there still a numeral of bas still open.", "The only flaw that this hotel have was the 1st floor restaurant, once you've passed that, everything is OK. All in all, I'm satisfied with their services. Cool capsule though"]

address: 44-46 LÃª ThÃ¡nh TÃ´n, Quáº­n 1, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam
reviews: ['Sáº¡ch, nhÃ¢n viÃªn chu Ä‘Ã¡o.', 'Very personable and friendly staff. I have used this hotel for business travel over the past 10 years and have always been satisfied. The central location is very helpful and the great individualized breakfast is beyond compare. My room was nice, the wi-fi worked well, and I noted they are redoing some of the rooms, which also speaks to their quest for offering a quality experience for guests.', "Whenever I have to visit HCM for business I always choose the Spring. It's centrally located just a few minutes walk from the Äá»“ng Khá»Ÿi and LÃª Lá»£i and from Pasteur and Nguyá»…n Du. The rooms are not sumptuous, but they large and comfortable with reliable wifi. The breakfast suits me, with a good selection of vegetarian options - I had the very decent phá»Ÿ chay and a good fruit plate. And it's inexpensive - good value for money. I'll be going back next month.", "I love this hotel. Getting there by bus was a little difficult as it's a long ride from HCMC but the trip there was worth it. The villas were nice, clean and very affordable. I love the outdoor shower. We spent most of it at the hotel itself but the beach was great, the room service was affordable and tasty, as most places should be, there was not much incentive to go out besides for seafood which isn't too far away. Tip: wherever the bus drops you, make sure to take a cab to the resort (it's too far to walk)", 'The Spring Hotel was a good choice. Great location, nice clean rooms and an inviting dÃ©cor throughout. It was a bit more expensive than similar class hotels in the area, but IMO worth the extra dollars.', 'Small but nice Colonial era designed hotel. Very friendly staff and a reasonable set breakfast is included. The place is a little old & run down and the rooms a little dark (not all rooms have windows.) However, the location is fantastic and the staff are really helpful.', 'stayed for a few days. staff very friendly and helpful. location is very convenient. book the next price level for a quiet room at the back of the hotel. bathroom small  but clean and functional.\rseemed quite a few jp business visitors, not just tourists. nice breakfast included different fresh fruits each day. recommended value for money.', 'i booked in advance and requested a couple of extras. 1st an early check in as my flight arrived at 0630hrs. i received confirmation that a room would be available at around 0830 however, i finally got my room. 2nd i requested an airport pick up but would not forward in an open email all my credit card details including security pin? the hotel should develop a https secure server then i feel alot more people would be willing to book transfers, trips etc. having said the above the hotel is great and the facilities on the exec floor were excellent. tha staff were friendly and attentive and sitting outside on the terrace of the champions bar with a drink watching the world go by in the evening was an event in itself. i did use the in hotel travel booking service for a day trip and all was good, smooth and no hastle. i will be back.', 'we stayed only 2 nights. the room was quite large and airy - and in comparison to many other hotels it was amazingly quiet. the bed was super-king sized and very comfortable. our cheerful hotel pickup from the airport waited for us despite our being delayed by visa formalisties by about one hour. the hotel was centrally located and this allowed us easy access to all of lonely planet\'s "hcmc in one day" locations, but take our time over it. didn\'t sample the restaurant for anything but breakfast which was ok. all in all a pleasant stay.', "This is a nice conveniently located hotel on Le Thanh Ton Street, one of the main streets that run through the middle of Saigon. It's within walking distance of the main shopping and business area of the city.\r\rThe hotel would be the ideal place for a business traveller or a couple wanting a quiet, private place to spend a vacation together.", "I've informed via email that I'll be arriving at their hotel past midnight and they responded quite promptly. When I arrived, a man sleeping in the sofa opened the door. A bit grumpy but I assumed coz I jolted him out of his sleep. Nevertheless, the remaining interaction with the hotel staff were very pleasant. They were quite  helpful, from security guard, receptionist, waitress. The lobby has this fantastic chandelier and spiral staircase which was very lovely to look at - you really feel like you're in the bygone era of the french occupation. Room was clean, size was perfect. Value for money", 'I chose this particular hotel because it was in the middle of District 1, near to restaurants, bars and shops within walking distance. The hotel staff were helpful and understood and spoke English well.The rooms need some makeover but were generally clean and well fitted out', 'the spring hotel is one of the best hotels that i have stayed at in vietnam for 10 years. i stayed in a superior room which was excellent with nice touches as flowers,etc. staff were efficient and friendly at every level and a request for a late checkout was kindly agreed to without the normal hassle with many other hotels. i will now be a regular vistor', "It was the first time to stay in Vietnam though I have been traveling a lot around all corner of Asia since 1999. I've heard many things about Hochi Minh and Hanoi. But those information doesn't fool me. I was happier more than those prior input. I will try go to Vietman with my whole families again in near future. Sure... spring hotel is a really good option.", "I booked superior room in this hotel. The lady staff attitude is very bad and poor. She kept talking on the phone while I waited for her to finish. When she ended the call, I told her I like book superior room in Agoda. She commented why I do not want pay in cash over the counter.This question need not be asked as it is up to customer choose mode of payment.When I got the room, I noted Wifi has problem and can't be accessed. I also noted the curtains are broken, leaving a huge gap and sunlight enters brightly at 6am.Breakfast was not buffet as promised. Menu is just pho, juice/milk, few pieces of fruit and egg, that's all.Utterly disappointed, Anh se k bao gio quay lai ks nay.Mac qua va dich vu k tot, a r that vong.", 'The location is quite good and the staff are fine. But the hotel was very old fashioned and would benefit from renovation.', 'The public computers need upgradingso that one can read the key boards as a number of the letters are obliterated .Otherwise excellent on all counts', 'Very friendly staff on this clean and very well located hotel.Breakfast was good.Overall a very good stay and I would come back in my next visit !', 'Suites 205 and 305 stink of mould as at 27/10 so if you read this and find yourself in either room you only have yourself to blame.Everything else about the hotel is fine which makes the mould problem a real pity.']

Got a great rate through Agoda including breakfast which was more than reasonable.  Buffet breakfast has plenty on offer. Service is good and rooms are clean and well maintained. Would highly recommend and definitely would stay here again.', "Close to everything. The room was clean, though you can hear people's footsteps and coversation in the other room. Breakfast was OK. Ideal place to book if you are planning to stay for 1-2 nights.Overall, its quite impressive for a 3â˜† hotel.", 'Stayed at this hotel for 2nd time. Room is clean, breakfast is awesomely good. Super good location, opposite famous Ben Thang Market. Walking distance to nice restaurants, both local or international cuisine. Massage spa, hair/nail saloon nearby.', 'Stayed in this hotel for the 2nd time. Like the service. Room is clean, breakfast is awesomely good. Super good location, just opposite the famous Ben Thanh Market. Walking distance to restaurants, cafÃ© & massage spa. Strongly recommend.', 'This is an excellent budget hotel in a great location opposite the Ben Thanh Market and close to many tourist attractions. Booked through Agoda at a super cheap rate, I would certainly recommend and stay there again. Very good buffet breakfast with lots of choices. A good hotel for a solo traveler.', 'The location is excellent is surrounded by eateries, shopping and massage. Most of the attraction is within walking distance. Hotel is clean but only the shower tap is a bit faulty. Will stay there again on the next visit.', 'The hotel is just located behind Ben Thanh Market. Surrounding with lots of nice restaurants and massage. City hall and coffee apartment is within walking distance. Breakfast is normal, the room is clean just that my shower head is a bit faulty but within my acceptable range. They got 100 over channels for selection but mostly in Viet. I did try to request to extend till 2pm but was being rejected immediately just trying my luck. Overall recommended hotel except for lonely guy as this hotel not allow to bring gal back.', 'Pros: clean rooms, efficient staff, good airconditioning and water pressureCons: glass bathroom/shower. So if you are sharing a room with someone you are not close with, it is a little weird that your silhouette is visible through the door. Breakfast is just okay, not too great', 'This hotel is in an excellent location., right opposite Ben Thanh Market and within walking distance to many main attractions.  Good clean facilities and friendly staff.  With the price offered through Agoda including breakfast this hotel was exceptional value for money.  Highly recommend', 'The room is clean and tidy.  Daily Morning change all bed sheets and etc...The breakfast is acceptable well spread and taste is perfect good.Convenience to take a Taxi to your next destination.Hotel Staff speaks good English.  Value for money.', 'Absolutely the best hotel in HCMC.  Nice, modern, clean and perfect location in the heart of Saigon, right at BenThanh Market. Front receptionist staff very professional & friendly. Check in/out was done very fast. Breakfast buffet was wonderful and delicious.  Staff at breakfast restaurant was very efficient. Foods and drinks will refill very fast when is going to finish. House keeping lady at 2nd floor is very polite and friendly. Thank you for making my room clean during my stay in the hotel. Room are clean, comfortable bed and pillows. Lastly thank you to the bellboy that help me to bring the luggage up and down the stairs in front of the hotel. Thank you Avanti for making my vacation in HCMC great and lovely. Well done and keep up the good job. Definitely will stay here again during my next visit.', "THe Triple Room was spacious and clean and staff are helpful. Breakfast provided was adequate (for Muslim guests) but it will be even better if all the food are Halal especially since there are many Muslim guests staying at the hotel.  Location is excellent. The 'Malaysia Street' is just across the road from the hotel.  THe nigthly Night markets are also just across from the hotel. I'd like to suggest that a rack or more hooks be provided in the room for us to hang the towels. I will definitely stay at this hotel again.", 'Surrounded by almost everything. However dislike the stairs that lead to the lobby. Breakfast is pretty basic but considering the price of the  hotel, it is acceptable : )Overall pleasant and would stay there again', 'Hotel is clean. Just that my room has a separate shower room and toilet. I find it abit inconvenient and breakie was not halal ones so we  are always on bread and scrambled egg every morning. Other than that,all were good.', "Location very good and plenty eateries. Room is clean which is important for a good night's sleep. First time staying in this hotel  and am impressed."]

PhÃ²ng hÆ¡i nhá». Äá»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng khÃ´ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c phong phÃº', 'Very newly renovated. Another section of the hotel is still under renovation and you will need to enter from the entrance along Cao BÃ¡t QuÃ¡t instead of ThÃ¡i VÄƒn Lung. Everything in the room is brand new.\rBreakfast selection is not very wide but its sufficient for me. Staffs are friendly and helpful.\r\rDo take note of the wifi password when you check-in as you will not find it in the room or on the access card.', 'staff is very friendly and helpful and the location is quite central. I actually booked Sunflower Luxury hotel, but then got a room in sunflower Opera hotel (connected building) due to renovation in Sunflower Luxury. So the room was different from what I expected and there was no information prior to my arrival. Room was clean but had no window and was smelly. One morning I woke up at 5:30 from the loud ambience music they played outside in the hotel.', "The hotel is centrally located and the room was spacious and clean.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  The choices for breakfast are a bit limited and could be improved. The TV didn't work. I think the function of the main room facilities,  e.g. TV, A.C. etc should always be checked before the guest arrives.", 'The most impressive thing about this hotel is the service. Once you alighted from your taxi, the bell boy came over and help with the luggage. Checking in is such a breeze too. The morning breakfast and chambermaids are also a plus point. \r\rRoom is decent size but without any windows. There is a jacuzzi bath tub which is surprisingly clean. They have a round shape toilet bowl which is rather unusual to me.\r\rThe location is good and with 2 convenience stores opposite within 2 minutes of walking and plenty of eateries varying from Japanese to Thai within 10 minutes of walking. There are also numerous massage spa around as well. It is easy to get a taxi with the bell boy who is always helpful.\r\rThe only bad thing about this hotel is the ongoing renovation. It is almost impossible to stay in the room during day time because renovation will starts in the morning and finishes around 6pm. However, the pricing was also reduced which makes this hotel a very attractive option.', 'I am from South Africa. To me the hotel is a 4star. Good clean room.  Excellent value for money. Friendly staff. Excellent location, delicious breakfast. Close to everything. Good advice for tours as well. Lady at reception went out of her way to arrange tours for us. Im SA ,Indian, and found a great curry place close by too.', 'I immensely enjoyed my stay there at the Sunflower Luxury Hotel and recommend it to anyone who is going to HCMC. Thank you to the staff for making my stay enjoyable and accommodating me with my needs...', "Hotel staffs were super helpful and friendly. I give my utmost compliment to Mr Ksuyen for being so helpful throughout our stay. Our compliment to the housekeeping lady and receptionist too. Location was not 100% ideal but we managed to enjoy it as the road is quite at night not the super busy jam packed horn hearing one. The room for us is quite small and old but I felt kinda nostalgic. The bed was huge, good for family. The only thing was we put our dirty clothes in the bathroom basket and unknowingly we didn't know it meant for laundry service because usually hotel will provide a bag for this service  and in the end  we had to pay for the service unwillingly. There's 4 convenient shop nearby the hotel, there's also Coffee Bean and Tea Leaves shop at the junction, for Indian Malaysian food lovers, there is one just 5 minutes walk from the hotel.", 'Check in was a breeze, receptionists had a good command of English, plus point for me. Location was walking distance to Ben Than market and couple minutes car and bike taxi travel to Reunification square and Saigon square for shopping. Just one grip, check that its the correct Sunflower hotel as there are 2 locations, I actually wanted the Ly Trong street hotel but ended up in this one. Overall, a very decent hotel for 3 stars and would recommend it anytime. Cheers.', "Overall, it was a pleasant stay. It's my first time but I will definitely return. Check-in staff was busy so I was told to wait at the cafÃ©. I eventually got my room after 10 minutes wait. Quite understandable as she was the only one on duty.", "Nice hotel to stay at if your wanting a good place that locals like. Fantastic location. Stay here each time I travel to Ho Chi Minh.Fantastic location, service and staff really helpful. Extremely good value. Don't need to go to International 5#", 'This is my first time staying in Sun Flower Hotel and I personally find it a very good and convenient location where most Japanese tourists and expatriates will hang around. At the same time, it is located at a street which is not too busy and noisy.', 'the staff were friendly and helpful and finishings of the hotel were real value for money. with many small hotels around the area, this is easily one of the newest and best value for money. sheets were clean and comfortable and location was excellent with a 5 minute stroll to dong khoi.', 'the best hotel we had during our visit to hcm.\rwe stayed in a few different hotels during our stay in vietnam.\rnice lobby, nice restaurant, nice room, nice bed, nice jacuzzi.\ralmost perfect for this trip to vietnam.\rhelpful staff and friendly.\rnice decoration.', 'In my opinion, This hotel is located in the middle of the city and The price of this hotel is also very reasonable. So I wold like to recommend it to backpacks.', "Internet not working on complete floor, moved to other floor.If take a shower, water goes anywhere where it doesn't need to goBreakfast ok but simpleToo expensive compared to other similar hotels"]

Spotless new hotel, hot water amazing, wifi strong, aircon cold, 5 min walk to airport...plenty of food/mini mart options around, perfect!!', 'This is a great hotel, easy walking distance to the airport. NÃ³i chung lÃ  good cho 1 khÃ¡ch sáº¡n táº§m 2 sao giÃ¡ ráº» táº¡i khu vá»±c trung tÃ¢m Quáº­n 1.', 'I have paid cash on my first day of arrival for Studio Apartment for 3 Nights (at pricing SGD$108.03 about VND1, 848,015). But I was given a Duluxe Room at Room Number 204 for the 3 nights. Room booked is much more smaller not as same comfirm reservation booked.I am a frequent traveller and I have been booking hotels around Ho Chi Minh City and other parts of Central Vietnam. This is the first time where the property accommodation 1) did not issue a client/ visitor after paying in cash VND1, 848,015.2) and also the first time where the property which is Savanna Hotel did not promised the same room accommodation as booked. 3) Today 25 June 2019, I check out from your property. I have asked for the receipt again.. I have got the same reply from the guy serving at the front desk. In the end, I have request him to email the receipt to show that I have paid VND1, 848,015. Till now I have not received a single email of the receipt. I will hope that your management team will look it.', 'New hotel in perfect location, 2 minutes walk to bui vien. Friendly staff.. Rooms are modern and with really nice beds and bedsheets. Huge bathrooms.. Highly recommended if you looking for nice modern rooms in good location..', 'Avoid rooms 601 and 602. They have a bar 3 metres from your door. (Inside of the same hotel).With very loud music until 00.00-01.00 am. (despitenat the receptiom they will say to you that they will turn off music at 22.00-22.30.']

reviews: ['KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n Ä‘áº¹p, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh tuy nhiÃªn Ä‘á»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng quÃ¡ Ã­t lá»±a chá»n, khÃ´ng ngon', 'good location', 'pros   very clean room  bed comfortable  home like feeling  staff very nice   gym greatlocation excellent near the centercons  maybe its my bad luck but a/c positioning right over bed not good  if u keep it on u can get sick  if you turn it off hot     con also  some very loud construction during day time and i was jet lagged sleeping during dayalso hallways are not air conditioned', "This was my second time staying at the Norfolk. The location is awesome and the facilities are great. It's highly recommended if you're a family or just want more space than what a normal hotel room offers.", 'Although I love the aura of the old hotels in Saigon (Caravelle, Rex, Grand, Continental, and Majestic), and usually find a good buy on a suite with them, I could not find sypuch this time, so I decided to try Norfolk Mansions.  Very glad I did.  Much more spacious than hotel suites and includes a kitchen.  The trade-off is that your room-included breakfast is much more rudimentary (but quite acceptable) than the huge buffet breakfasts offered by hotels.  In addition, the welcoming fruit basket at the apartel is nothing compared to those at the hotels.  But I think the trade-off worthwhile if the Norfolk Mansions is offering a good rate, as I found.  I would do it again. ğŸ˜', 'Actually  it  was  good  for every group.  Wide living room and reasonable  kitchen.  Good  location which can walk near the central places. The  weather  make  us  to  take a taxi but it is too short to take a taxi.  Except this  it  was  great  hotel.', "Staff go above and beyond to help you out - needed transport from the hotel: they booked and supported me with what I was going to expect when I got to the terminal early the next morning.I've given the staff 3 stars - this is not because of the continued help, it's because when I checked in they had a print out of my credit card from Booking.com and it had all my details including the CCV in full display. I explained that this was not acceptable as anyone could go and purchase online with a less secure card. Apart from this, the rooms are huge and spotlessly clean with a balcony.", "I live in suburban HCMC and like to do getaways to D1 at times. This was my first time staying at Norfolk Mansion. It's a great area of HCMC & D1 (the Japanese area), which has tons of restaurants, spas, and bars around. If you like craft beer, the best craft beer pub, Heart of Darkness, is only 100m down the road. Check in and check out were quick and easy. The facilities at Norfolk are fantastic. The room was big, clean, and comfortable. It was quiet, too. No complaints. The breakfast was yummy. Not only are there the buffet items, but there is a small menu from which you can order pho, eggs, and a couple of other items. The swimming pool is great (big enough to do laps) and the gym is very well-stocked with a variety of machine and free weight equipment. The sauna/steambath/jacuzzi area is one of the nicest I've seen in a hotel like this. The hotel doesn't have a busy feel in any of the facilities, also, which was nice. Overall, it was a great stay at Norfolk. I'll be back!", 'The staff was so helpful and friendly, the room clean and spacious (I was even upgraded to a higher class room without extra-charge) and the place overall is very nice. Next time I come to HCMC this will definitely be my choice!', 'Incredible. Brilliant in every . aspect.  Stunning. I stay frequently via business experiences atvthe best 5 star hotels in many countries. There are no better places to stay within a city environment any where. I am going back to HCM City for a weeks holiday and that is 90% so I can stay at the Norfolk  Mansion. Staff brilliant-  absolutely. A smile given gets you at least two back ! Wonderful WOW.', 'We booked a 2 bed apartment. Our kids loved it. The apartment had a lounge and dining area, small kitchen, office area and ensuite bathrooms for both rooms. The wifi was good in the whole apartment. There was a lot of cupboard space which you donâ€™t normally find. The whole space was great for our family of 2 adults and 2 kids. 1 room has a king size (UK) bed and the other has a double bed. The staff are really friendly and helpful. Breakfast options were fine.  The best part though was the location.  You can walk to all the main sights around District 1, but the area is on the quieter side. Definitely recommend this as an option for families. I have stayed in the Park Hyatt before with a friend and this definitely beats that for a family friendly option.', 'This is the best hotel I have ever stayed! Everything is great! Great service and rooms are clean and tidy. All the staff can speak fluent English! I will definitely stay in this hotel next time! Highly recommended!', "This hotel is a must stay in Ho Chi Minh. It may be a little pricy compared to other options, but three of us it was perfect. There was A LOT of room with the two bedrooms starting at 88 sqm (about three times the size of normal hotels). If you think that's excessive, imagine the living space of a nice TV lounge, a large balcony overlooking the city, two comfortable bed rooms, two bathrooms (no need to prioritise who goes in first), a small bar area and a dining area should you get take out, all after a hard / hot day's touring.The staff is unbelievable. Everyone speaks English, is trained to be hospitable. The bell person cheers up your day before you go out, and the reception very helpful - and can make calls to local tour companies for you. The hotel has a nice (if small) pool, a really good gym (with a stair master) and an adjacent Chinese restaurant that we found to be excellent. There were also welcome drinks and breakfast at the T restaurant was also above par of many hotels.You get what you paid for and if you are already going for a hotel, top up a little more and go for the Norfolk Mansion. You won't regret it.", "Initially, thought that it was Norfolk Hotel.  Hotel staff was kind enough to call a taxi to drive us to the actual place.  The place was clean and spacious. It was as if you are at ease with a new house.  All facilities are available. One exclusion - there is no toilet water gush near the toilet bowl. Usually, there is always one in Vietnam hotel rooms. Location ain't convenient.  Need to call cab even for short trip to Ben Thanh market we were with our elderly mother-inlaw.", 'Most welcoming staff.  Very accommodating from the moment we arrived until we left.   Service apartment was more like home than a hotel room.  Having fresh fruit on the table when we arrived was nice & we appreciated being able to do laundry before heading home too.', 'Hotel is situated in District 1 with many eateries, massage palours (good & clean massage, not those sleazy ones) and pubs within walking distance.The hotel is an apartment converted into a hotel with clean rooms and delicious breakfast.I will come back to stay again.', "I really can't falter this place.  We were made to feel very welcome as soon as we  arrived .  All staff across all service areas were always extremely helpful and friendly. Their professional manner and willingness to assist in any way truly made our 5th trip to HCM our best. The 2 bdrm premier room we stayed in was very clean, modern and great layout.  No problem with hot water for showers and good water pressure. Great view from our good sized balcony.  Free to use laundrette available with free powder provided.  Great location, only 5 min walk to Dong Khoi, Opera house and Notre Dame. Great range of restaurants both in price and variety in very close proximity but ladies do your homework if you are looking at Beauty treatments as prices vary immensely  and you could  easily  pay 3x more than needed. I would highly recommend Norfolk Mansion to families and couples as it is like being in a home away from home. We stayed here for 2 weeks and enjoyed every minute.", 'enjoyable, friendly staff, good clean environment, the interior furnishing of the aprtment not luxury enough for the upper class income group, nto much different from other service apartment. need to refurbish to better fabric and floor tile or carpet.', 'This is my second time to visit Vietnam, this hotel I trust it is extremely good service and take care for all room hotel guest. I would like to come and stay with this nice hotel at Vietnam Ho Chi Minh, also easy and work to Vincom center shopping mall, we can eat at the food mall at the basement.', "It was my first time to come to Vietnam and since I'm moslem then I prefer to stay in an apartment. The review stated in Agoda about Norfolk made me choose this hotel and the reviews are very accurate. I found this hotel very nice, big rooms, good lighting, and there's a balcony too. Kitchen utensils were there although not too complete but appropriate for short term stays. Location is good and easy to get the cab and there's a minimart in the hotel compound.\r\rOverall, this hotel is very recommended."]
