Will come back the next visit.Thank you Ms Linh and looking forward to see soon.Best Regards,Eric Chua', 'Rooms have a good size, the bed is comfortable and the shower works perfect. Cable TV with many choices, like BBC, CNN, HBO or Cinemax to name a few. Location is great, in the center of everything. Breakfast is reasonable, not so many choices for European people. Best of all are the hotel staff, very helpful and approachable. Would definitely stay again in this hotel.', 'Room was good sized with a comfortable bed and body jets in the shower. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Located in District 1 with a good nether nearby and plenty of shops around. Nothing is more than a short taxi ride away. Recommended hotel and would definitely stay again.', 'All was fantastic. From the arrival, being greeted by the most friendly and helpful staff, the breakfast, until the check out, all was perfect. Rarely stayed in a hotel where things went so smooth and all was simply as it should be. Definitely would recommend this hotel', 'All the staff were very accomodating and all our request were granted.The hotel is very near to different restaurants and coffee shop .Acessible to behn tah market.Highly recommended to all travellers', 'pros:- location is good- friendly staffs from front desk to kitchen to chambermaids- breakfast is nice for a couple of days- room is quiet, wifi works well all the time- cleancons:- neighbours with "sexy" hairsalon/massage shops on both sides (may be good for some :p)- as the dining area is limited, may be times where u may have to wait a little while for tables but so far i didn\'t see much issue on this', 'I booked 1 room 24/10/18 to 27/10 at cap town ho chi Minh,after check in I received another confirmation mentioned that I book another room on 24/10 & charged to my credit card.i try to call back Singapore agoda for cancellation the response and service was slow ..asking me to hold on on idd call from Saigon.end up I need to pay 46 usd for idd. called from hotel..I do  not believe agoda any more for such incidents happen to me n never use your service for my feture booking and also like to share my experience ..because I dont receive any explanation why there is double booking from the system. I need to call twice and can to do my cancellation..very unprofesstional service..no urgency attitude and get good advice to customer from spending unnecceaasry odd call that if they think that they need to take more than 22minutes to do the canellation.', 'The reception staff were very friendly and helpful.  We liked that the rooms were clean and spacious.  Location is great too; near Ben Thanh Market.  The buffet breakfast was quite good, except that they could have stepped up on hygiene as flies could be seen hovering over  uncovered fruits and raw vegetables.  Also,  when I scooped a spoonful of cereals on my plate, ants were seen running helter skelter on the plate.']

reviews: ['Táº¡m Ä‘c', 'PhÃ²ng nhá» , phá»¥ thu cao', 'TÆ°Æ¡ng Ä‘á»‘i á»•n', 'Khach san gia re, hoi xau, dc cai vi tri trung tam, ngay Cho ben thanh', 'Má»i thá»© Ä‘á»u á»•n - tuy nhiÃªn cÃ¡c á»• cáº¯m Ä‘iá»‡n vÃ  Ä‘iá»u khiá»ƒn Ä‘áº§u giÆ°á»ng hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng khÃ´ng khá»›p nhau.', 'KhÄƒn táº¯m ko sáº¡ch sáº½, ná»™i tháº¥t cÅ© kÄ©, sáº½ khÃ´ng quay láº¡i', 'Bá»¯a sÃ¡ng chÆ°a phong phÃº', 'NhÃ  táº¯m vÃ  toilet cáº§n Ä‘Æ°á»£c nÃ¢ng cáº¥p tá»‘t hÆ¡n vÃ¬ thiáº¿t bá»‹ khÃ¡ cÅ©, bá»“n táº¯m nhá», vá»‹ trÃ­ thuáº­n lá»£i gáº§n chá»£ Báº¿n ThÃ nh, thá»©c Äƒn dÃ nh cho bá»¯a sÃ¡ng ngon nhÆ°ng hÆ¡i Ã­t, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh.', 'khÃ´ng thÃ­ch láº¯m', 'Thuc an diem tam sang can phai thay doi mot it moi ngay va dung nen ngay nao cung giong nhu ngay nao va nuoc cung cafÃ© nen de san khi don phong dung cho den khi hoi moi dua trong ngay', 'I picked this hotel due to its location, price and good ratings. Most of the descriptions were as in the reviews. But one thing that was not mentioned was that I was given a room without any window! Looking at the hotel design as well as most similar hotels in Saigon City Centre which are located as intermediate units in a block of shophouses, only the front and back rooms of the the hotel would have windows. They made up for that by keeping it clean and choosing shiny bright colours. Their cafeteria was located on the rooftop and had quite a good choice for a small hotel. I will not return here as I would like to try other similar hotels.', 'The hotel location is superb! Near Ben Thanh market and other tourist spots in area. Rooms are clean breakfast is superb!  Downside is when I booked the room I requested for Twin Beds but when we arrived we had given a room with queen size bed when we ask the Front Desk he said that there is no available Twin Beds and we have to wait for next day to be transferred. But overall we still recommend this hotel and will stay here next time!', "Near Ben Tanh, There's family mart across the street with lots of cheese and bacon for those low carb dieters. Walk around the block you have restaurants and massage parlors.I booked the Deluxe Room City View, which was advertised as 22 square meters. I measured 21 square meters so it sounds about right. That's impressive because most hotels in ho chi minh embellish their room sizes about 30 percent or more. They give you a choice with a room with a double bed or a choice of a room with 2 single beds put together to make an even larger bed. The rooms with the 2 single beds put together have a bathtub in the bathroom.There's free breakfast, but I haven't tried it yet.Room Tip: Get the Deluxe room with City Views", 'everything is good the location is near shopping centre and major attraction except you cannot stay more than two days cause the breakfast averyday is almost the same since i stayed for four days there are no much choice to choose.', "this is the 2nd time i'm staying in ha hien. the first time it was because the previous hotel was terrible. the staff at ha hien had no hidden cost at all.\rso i knew exactly what i was paying for!\reven better now that i have a bit of experience with the area, moving about is always so easy.\rthe staff are always helpful and ready to help what ever the problem.\ri had a taxi driver try to cheat me of a few bucks. the security stepped in before anything could get ugly and resolved the matter. this is something that was very reassuring.", 'we stayed 5 days and find at this hotel and we like it. The location is good, just a few steps to Ben thanh market. There are lots of eateries around. The hotel is modern and clean. The room (deluxe) big enough and has big LCD tv. The breakfast is good, nothing to conplaint about.', 'The hotel is really best and location is good. The room is big and spacious.  It is very convenient, all of us were very happy to stay in that hotel. Definitely we will comeback , if we will be in HCM City again.', 'I was on a low budget trip, so I opted for a room with no window. The room was quite small but very clean and surprisingly the bathroom had a bathtub. The room did not come with coffee/tea making facilities, however, the hotel was ever ready with a flask of hot water. For the three days two nights stay, I have no regrets for the room without a window.', 'Stay in a deluxe room. Presentable and clean room. US40 a day. \rBuffet Breakfast with limited choice, but the food is not bad. Comparing with iPeace hotel, which we stay for another 3 days, only comes with limited choice of breakfast set.\rLocation is very good. Very near to Ben Thanh Night Market.\rFree Wifi access.\rAt ground level, three are 3 PCs with free internet access for guest.\rTV with cable vision which covers quite a lot of channels.\r\rOut of 3 days stay, we only took 3 bottles of mineral water. But they charge us for 6. The room service did not do a thorough check on the Fridge inventory. Almost quarrel with them over this.\r\rOverall, I would give a rating 4 out of 5.', "For the price that we are paying it's value for money. Although there are many hotel around the vicinity that offer almost similar price, I find that it's the friendly and helpful staffs that will make your stay memorable."]

reviews: ['>8tr cho 4 Ä‘Ãªm, phÃ²ng khÃ´ng cÃ³ tivi, máº¯c Ã¡o há»ng gá»i lá»… tÃ¢n thÃ¬ bÃ¡o anh á»Ÿ táº¡m ???', 'ok', 'PhÃ²ng nhá», ban Ä‘Ãªm ráº¥t á»“n, vá»‹ trÃ­ ks khÃ³ báº¯t taxi.', 'this place have a lot of food as it is near the backpacker location.', 'This hotel is new. Nice pho at the junction and a few street stalls and alot restaurants around to find food. Currently on-going renovations every day even on saturdays and sundays :-( loud banging n drilings.', 'Great location, but very noisy at night, room was clean, staff are nice. When I arrived they didnâ€™t have a room for me so they sent me to another hotel which was very bad and only give 5$ rebate for that night which was a little bit irritating. Otherwise the hotel is nice.', 'stayed here for two nights. there was noise from outside till around 4am but it is because of the location of the hotel. I read some review before my stay and brought my earplug and slept well. \rloved the water pressure of the shower and the temperature of water can be easily adjusted from hot to cold. \reasy to walk around.', "The hotel staff are very friendly with good English skills. You can book all the trips you want from the front desk . Iiked the place so much I stayed an extra 4 days . It's a new build and the rooms are excellent.  They up gradded me free of charge, wich was a lovely surprise on my arrival . Thank you :)", 'The air con seem to be a bit over work for the suite room . As the room is not cold enough.  The toilet drainage system too as the toilet floor always seem to.be flooding with small paddle of water ...', 'My whole saty was a real pleasure at Green Star the rooms are vey luxurious and comfy with all the mod cons. All the staff are very helpful and kind to suit your needs. 5 star service all the way. Thank you to all the staff at Green Star I will come and stay again soon. Mr Lyndon Faupel', 'Im so gald I booked this fantastic hotel. I was greeted with a big welcome and was shown my room, It was large comftable and very mordern and clean. All the staff are so friendly and helpful and the cleaners make up the room every day, excellent! I would fully recommmend you saty here for a modern fun and happy Stay. Thank you to you all I will return soon :)', 'Very nice staffs', "If it's your first time in Vietnam this hotel is for you. Lanudry close, Small stores food close by. Clean hotel.", "Very clean room and central location but a lot of noice makes it hard to sleep. We miss a hair straightener and have tried to get in contact with the hotel on telephone and through Facebook since they don't have any e-mail adress. No answer in almost two weeks. Very hard to get in contact with them.", 'Low quality glass door in bathroom collapsed and shattered on me due to faulty installation. Staff was reluctant to help call an ambulance and did not have a first aid kit on site. Had scratches and cuts all over and had to be rushed to the hospital to get stitches on my foot.When checking out, they reluctantly offered to pay for (only half) of my medical bills and a waiver for the bill of the stay, with the condition that I do not bring up and forget about this incident. Hotel manager/owner did not show up after the reception told us he will be in during our check out.I did not take and decided to go through Agoda for the proper compensation procedure . They took a month to respond and they told Agoda that they will not be providing any sort of compensation.Location is opposite a club and next to a building under construction. This adds to the levels of danger and noise.For your own safety, I would strongly advise to STAY AWAY from this hotel.', 'I arrived at the reception they told me room is not available even i got the confirmation from agoda, the placed me to their other hotel next door for USD 15 , which is a very old hotel without WiFi in the room , no lift , leaking marks ever where smell damp . The said offer me a breakfast on the next morning but nothing been done , I cancelled the booking and asked about the receipt for the one night stayed in their lousy hostel but they just reluctant to do so , am very very the disappointed', "I'll start by saying the reception staff were very friendly , smiling and tried caring for us. We also booked a tour with the hotel and it went well on every aspect. The hotel is very new (1mnth) and it felt like they didn't know how to do their job yet. Even though we complained every morning that our room isn't thoroughly cleaned, nothing happened about it.The room itself was small but nice, with windows, comfortable bed, tv and A/c all worked. The toilet wasn't clean and there was bad smell (I guess drainage issues).The stream in the shower goes suddenly from hot to cold.The whole place is currently under construction and one day the elevator was shut down, the other we woke up to hammer sounds from the next room door. Paint job has visible peeling off going on. \r\rMy biggest disappointment is with the wifi, which is practically non-existent. \r\rWhile the staff are friendly and try their best to resolve the issues, most of the issues were structural and there's nothing much that can be done about it, unless the management undertakes a serious overhaul reno. \r\rThere are definitely better hotels around.", 'The receptionist told me air conditioning was broken in my checked I say, so they transferred me to Hong Vina luxury, I donâ€™t like the room they arranged for me, I was booked a room with big window, but what they arranged me was a room with a big window, but low story, so I can see through the window and looked into someone elseâ€™s kitchen and bed room....', 'This is a nice hotel, well maintained building. Rooms and facilities are modern and clean. Bed is confortable. Staff is really welcoming and friendly. Fast check-in and check-out, no trouble. Perfect location in the city center, off the crown but very nearby all the entertainment of D1.', 'I am quite satisfied for the stay in Hong Vina. The receptionist girl was very helpful & able to communicate with her by english. The room was clean & quite comfort for the stay of my 3d2n trip in HCM. The location is nearby the attractions.', 'Overall it was great considering the price. The staff are more than helpful at helping with booking tours, finding great places to eat, and getting taxis. They always had a smile on their face. The room was very clean although i recommend you remind the front desk to tell the cleaning crew to do your room so they dont forget. They skipped my room one time.', 'Great place, friendly staff and good location (: We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel and the price was very good for what we got! We recommend you to try this little nice hotel and see for your self!', 'The hotel is located at a strategic location which Ben Thanh Market is just few minutes a way of walking distance. The breakfast included is good and with few choices. Staffs was helpful and friendly to help whereas one of my friend lost her mobile phone. The staff at the counter help us to cancel the mobile number and also check with our tour group although in the end the phone is not found. Yet, we still appreciate the help from them. Room is clean and come with free shampoo and shower gel.', 'Upgraded to Deluxe room with window after 1st night. Quiet & spacious. Near backpacker area Pham Ngu Lao street (10mins walk) where all the best deals for day tours, restaurants, cafes, pubs & massages are located. Great local food at night market at nearby Ben Thanh market, opens at 7pm. Hotel staffs are superb - very friendly and helpful. They offer cheaper airport transfer compared to tour agents. Best money exchange rates at Saigon Square, 10 mins walk, cheap and good shopping experience.']

KS phÃ¹ há»£p vá»›i giÃ¡ tiá»n', 'ChÄƒn má»n dÆ¡, má»ng, khÃ´ng nhÆ° trÃªn hÃ¬nh áº£nh Ä‘Äƒng trÃªn Agoda, phÃ²ng hÃ´i nhÆ° chÆ°a Ä‘Æ°Æ¡c dá»n.Ä‚n sÃ¡ng thÃ¬ 7h má»›i cÃ³ ngÆ°á»i Ä‘i chá»£ vá»', 'Cáº§n vá»‡ sinh sáº¡ch sáº½ hÆ¡n', 'Äá»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm tuyá»‡t vá»›i', "The actual room condition and facilities were a far cry from what can be seen from the photos posted on the website. \r\rMany facilities were broken or in need of repair. Paint job has visible peeling off going on. \r\rMy biggest disappointment is with the wifi, which is practically non-existent. \r\rWhile the staff are friendly and try their best to resolve the issues, most of the issues were structural and there's nothing much that can be done about it, unless the management undertakes a serious overhaul reno. \r\rThere are definitely better hotels around.", 'The receptionist told me air conditioning was broken in my checked I say, so they transferred me to Hong Vina luxury, I donâ€™t like the room they arranged for me, I was booked a room with big window, but what they arranged me was a room with a big window, but low story, so I can see through the window and looked into someone elseâ€™s kitchen and bed room....', 'This is a nice hotel, well maintained building. Rooms and facilities are modern and clean. Bed is confortable. Staff is really welcoming and friendly. Fast check-in and check-out, no trouble. Perfect location in the city center, off the crown but very nearby all the entertainment of D1.', 'I am quite satisfied for the stay in Hong Vina. The receptionist girl was very helpful & able to communicate with her by english. The room was clean & quite comfort for the stay of my 3d2n trip in HCM. The location is nearby the attractions.', 'Overall it was great considering the price. The staff are more than helpful at helping with booking tours, finding great places to eat, and getting taxis. They always had a smile on their face. The room was very clean although i recommend you remind the front desk to tell the cleaning crew to do your room so they dont forget. They skipped my room one time.', 'Great place, friendly staff and good location (: We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel and the price was very good for what we got! We recommend you to try this little nice hotel and see for your self!', 'The hotel is located at a strategic location which Ben Thanh Market is just few minutes a way of walking distance. The breakfast included is good and with few choices. Staffs was helpful and friendly to help whereas one of my friend lost her mobile phone. The staff at the counter help us to cancel the mobile number and also check with our tour group although in the end the phone is not found. Yet, we still appreciate the help from them. Room is clean and come with free shampoo and shower gel.', 'Upgraded to Deluxe room with window after 1st night. Quiet & spacious. Near backpacker area Pham Ngu Lao street (10mins walk) where all the best deals for day tours, restaurants, cafes, pubs & massages are located. Great local food at night market at nearby Ben Thanh market, opens at 7pm. Hotel staffs are superb - very friendly and helpful. They offer cheaper airport transfer compared to tour agents. Best money exchange rates at Saigon Square, 10 mins walk, cheap and good shopping experience.']

No airport transfer, no coffee shop, no tour service, etc. The hotel has Wifi hotspots on every floor but only level 5 Wifi hotspot was working as the rest cannot be connected. Those staying on level 2 and 3 need to go to Level 5 to get a Wifi connection.However, it is value for money as the rates are the most reasonable in that area. Other hotels rate in that area are much more expensive. An ideal location for vegetarians as there are lots of vegan restaurants nearby.', 'Excellent location if your reason for stay is conference in the USSH. I like the location because it has a local feel even if it is very difficult to communicate with the hotel staff due to limited English.', 'We stayed 4 nights in this hotel. The room was large, the shower hot and with good water pressure. Shower just above the toilet was known. Bed hard as a board. Window with City View means looking inward in the hallway was not known. Non-smoking room smelt of cigarettes. Staff smokes without reservation in the elevator. Cleaning once in four days and only after repeated request. Also there was no fresh towels and toilet paper. The family business is characterized by unfriendlyness and lack of helpfulness.', "Undecided about this one ... Everything was good except that I wasn't sure if it was a primarily a short or long stay hotel. But the facilities were perfectly fine. I have no complaints, just not sure what the primary purpose of the hotel is. Wouldn't stay again unless there was nothing else in the price range, then would.", 'We actually ended up staying here for about 5 weeks whilst studying in HCM, for the money this hotel is excellent, and is certainly better value than staying in the normal tourist areas, the basic room only has a semi-internal window which does not let very much light in, but the deluxe has a large balcony which is brilliant. Staff were very friendly, and the girl who usually worked on reception spoke English very well. Wi-fi speed was very good, though signal was stronger in some areas than others. Easy to get into the tourist parts of town and cheap enough in a taxi. If you stay here then I recommend a visit to&ngo restaurant 5 minutes walk away.', 'We was 1 night. Everything is okay, but on pictures it looks more clean that it does ;)', 'I booked this hotel few days before I visit, But still price is very cheap.size of the room is not that tiny (I would say cosy)the only uncomfortable thing is there is only one plug behind table.So I need to move big table everytime I charge. except that I pretty satisfied with this hotel.', "The Tuan Viet Hotel is a great budget hotel to stay when you're first arriving in Ho Chi Minh City. The front desk staff was pretty friendly and was able to handle any questions I had. I would definitely recommend this place if you're on a budget and need a place for a couple days.", 'the room give to me has a bed that was super hard, and i asked for another room but was told that all other room has the same bed. I have been to HCM for 10 years and never encounter any hotel with a bed so hard.']

Difficult to find if youâ€™re not familiar to the set-up but this is near to everything, night life, teashop, coffee shop,convenient store, noodle shop ..as in EVERYTHING..ğŸ‘ğŸ»Staffs- All of them are very accommodating specially Binh ğŸ˜„ whoâ€™s really patient on answering all our queries/concerns and requests.Kudos to the Team!â™¥ï¸if ever iâ€™ll be coming back to HCM, will definitely book on this hostel again. Til next time!', 'We arrived almost 2am in this hotel and we got a hard time finding the location. good thing that we encountered an accommodating grab driver and help us find the specific hostel unit. We are so sleepy that time and we got disappointed because Binh told us they donâ€™t have room left for usâ˜¹ï¸informed that they are  fullybooked, but they will divert our booking in a nearby hostel within bui vien street.My rating is for Saigon hostel 2. The girl there looks like irritated whenever weâ€™re asking her for something. She gave us a locker space without a padlock. my friend is a bit worried about her things because her bag does not have a lock. In the end, they still did not provide us a padlock. Also, we asked her simple things like if thereâ€™s a nearby mall that we could see,she said she doesnâ€™t know anything because sheâ€™s just working there.We never got a good information from .Even reserving a ticket going to Phnom Penh,looks like weâ€™re giving her a hard time as her face shown.She just told us that the line is busy,all tickets are fullybooked and she canâ€™t do anything about it. Then upon checking out we requested Binh if we could transfer back at Phan Anh on our succeeding night.good thing they reserved a room for us this time.', 'Their team were helpful and accommodating. reviews: ['Ráº¥t phÃ¹ há»£p', 'Sáº¡ch sáº½, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ tiá»‡n nghi, ráº¥t tÃ´n trá»ng khÃ¡ch hÃ ng', 'Tá»‘t', 'Tot', 'Tiá»‡n nghi vÃ  vá»‹ trÃ­ vÃ  vá»‡ sinh á»•n,GiÆ°á»ng Ä‘á»‡m vÃ  gá»‘i tá»‡Äiá»u hoÃ  tá»‡KhoÃ¡ phÃ²ng khÃ³ má»Ÿ ( cÃ³ thá»ƒ má»—i phÃ²ng mÃ¬nh bá»‹)NhÆ°ng nÃ³i chung vá»›i giÃ¡ Ä‘Ã³ má»i thá»© mÃ¬nh nghÄ© lÃ  Ä‘Æ°á»£c', 'cá»¡ 2 star', 'Äá»‹nh ká»³', '- checkin lÃºc 4h sÃ¡ng..nÃªn ko Ä‘c Äƒn sÃ¡ng..ks nÃ³i Äƒn sÃ¡ng pháº£i dki trÆ°á»›c...vÃ´ phÃ²ng 2 Ä‘á»©a nhá»..Ä‘á»©a 5 thÃ¡ng Ä‘á»©a 2 tuá»•i khÃ³c cáº£ tiáº¿ng.- á»Ÿ 3 ngÃ y mÃ  dá»n phÃ²ng lÃºc 8h ngÃ y Ä‘áº§u tiÃªn..má»›i vÃ´ 4 tiáº¿ng lÃ  dá»n...cÃ²n ngÃ y sau bÃ¡o dá»n ko dá»n..báº©n kinh khá»§ng...tháº£m cá»±c dÆ¡- vÃ´ thang mÃ¡y thÃ¬ thang mÃ¡y Ä‘Ã³ng cá»­a..ko lÃªn ko xuá»‘ng..chá»“ng mÃ¬nh dÃ¹ng tay kÃ©o cá»­a cho 2 Ä‘á»©a nhá» ra..tá»¥i nhá» sá»£ khÃ³c thÃ©t.- ko biáº¿t cÄƒn há»™ cÃ³ gÃ¬ ko nhÆ°ng 2 Ä‘á»©a nhá» nhÃ  mÃ¬nh vÃ o tá»›i cá»­a lÃ  khÃ³c..khÃ³c ngáº·t ngháº½o..Ä‘i ra lÃ  nÃ­n...con gÃ¡i lá»›n tÃ© giÆ°á»ng  trong khi ngá»§ káº¹p giá»¯a ba vÃ  máº¹...Ä‘Ã¡ng sá»£ luÃ´n.', 'Tá»‘t', "at first, it looked not bad,quite clean and good. but when we lied on the bed and were covered by the blanket, It was horribly itchy. when we saw our skin, there are many mites(we guessed) bites!!! we couldn't sleep anymore and just stayed on the couch in the living room. and also we saw many mites and bugs on our baggage later. it was awful!!!", 'Good:Price and locationBad:Registration for check in, Breakfast not in time, midnight noisy.', 'I like the room! Super clean and i love the bathroom! Hahahaha But its quite far from ben thanh market, close to war museum..', 'It was the first time staying at this hotel.\rSpacious rooms never made me feel cramped.\rEverything is clean so I wasnâ€™t reluctant to use cups and dishes.\rTelevisions and air conditioners work well, Wi-Fi also.\rTwo bed rooms have toilet and shower respectively.\rAmenity consists of shop, shampoo and bath towel which is changed with new one every day.\r\rThere is not a reception but a staff is staying near gate the whole day.\rHousekeepers work carefully.\rAlthough I arrived in the morning, they allowed me to check in.', 'Saigon Apartments is just a well managed well maintained boutique home away from home experience. I have stayed here a dozen times (maybe more - I lost track) over the past two years.  By far my most preferred short term residence  in HCMC.', '2 Bedrooms/Bathrooms which is assigned to 3A room, everything look good except Aircon and Fan at living hall making some noise, will be good if they able to fix it before my next visit.Overall still a good apartment to stay.', 'I have stayed in Saigon Apartments now half a dozen times.  It is the first place to look to stay when I visit Saigon.  I would live here 365 days a year if I could.  The location is far enough from the noise and bustle, yet close enough to walk.  I would not want to recommend this apartment to anyone, since it would only make it tougher for me to get the bookings I want.  Having said that, I would recommend this apartment building to anyone who wants a quiet, private, living-in-the-city experience in HCMC.', 'The apartment was very clean tidy and spacious, far better than we had ever expected! We stayed in apartment 10 and it had two bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms! The kitchen had everything you would need. More than enough complimentary drinking water was provided for our stay which was really nice, as well as a fruit bowl when we arrived! The cleaners came every day as well!', 'Get rid of the carpet; with the heat, humidity in Saigon, there is no need for carpet. Ceramic tile would be much cleaner and cooler. Less maintenance for the hotel too. There are clear stain on the carpet. Other than this, it was very pleasant stay, particularly for family with children.']

hotel name: KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n LiÃªn An Saigon (Lien An Saigon Hotel)
address: 181 LÃª ThÃ¡nh TÃ´n, phÆ°á»ng Báº¿n ThÃ nh, Quáº­n 1, thÃ nh phá»‘ Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, 700000
reviews: ['K cÃ³ nÆ°á»›c suá»‘i free cho khÃ¡ch. K cÃµ bÃ£i Ä‘áº­u xe, pháº£i nhá» NV gá»­i vÃ  tá»‘n tiá»n. MÃ¡y quáº¹t tháº» lá»—i thá»i, k sá»­ dá»¥g Ä‘c ATM', 'Ä‘á»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm cá»±c há»£p lÃ½, gáº§n trung tÃ¢m cÃ¡c hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng, Äƒn uá»‘ng', '- ChÃºng tÃ´i Ä‘i cÃ´ng tÃ¡c nhÆ°ng há»i nhÃ¢n viÃªn 1 sá»‘ Ä‘iá»ƒm Äƒn uá»‘ng gáº§n Ä‘Ã³ há» Ä‘á»u ko rÃµ láº¯m.- PhÃ²ng hÆ¡i nhá» vÃ  giÃ¡ phÃ²ng so vá»›i cÃ¡c khÃ¡ch sáº¡n xung quanh, Ä‘áº·t qua agoda chÆ°a thá»±c sá»± cáº¡nh tranh.', 'had an overall pleasant & lovely experience at lien ann hotel 2.\r\rwe paid all-inclusive [2nights] for a deluxe twin room.\rroom is kinda big. and the price is inclusive of breakfast (7am-9am).\r\râ€¢ 1 king size bed + 1 super single\râ€¢ 2 chairs + 1 coffee table\râ€¢ desktop pc with internet connection\râ€¢ dvd player + samsung lcd flat screen tv\râ€¢ bathtub/ bathrobes etc\r\rben thanh market is right beside the hotel.', "friendly and considerate staff. rooms are clean but the shower rooms are a we bit small. in-house dining room at the 10th floor is  small and need 'to climb' two levels up because the lift ends at the 8th floor only.  senior people like me find it a bit difficult. before taking a taxi do seek the staff assistance so that you won't be overcharged. try avoid taking the tribike ... you will be con if you are not careful. we had a very pleasant stay. i would put up at the same hotel if i visited hcmc again.", "Ive stayed here 10 times over the past 3 years. I dont recommend staying on the ground floor as it's noisy but otherwise no complaints about this hotel. super friendly staff and good value for money rooms. amazing location. make sure you try 4P's pizza restaurant around the corner ...best pizza in town", 'pros - near must see areascons - staff not helpful. chung even shouted at us when we requested him to assist us in weighing our baggage. unlike other hotels that we stayed inHCMC, staff are helpful and jolly fellows. lower floor rooms are noisy.', 'We reserved a family room so that my daughter can have her own space and bathroom. This room is interconnected with each other so space is enough for the three of us. Breakfast is not appealing though with 4 selections to choose and repeated for the entire duration of our stay, 6 nights. The dining area is at 10th floor that you have to use the stairs from 8th floor to 10th floor. Elevator is only up to 8th floor. No free bottled water in room.  The staff are nice esp the housekeeping staff. Although the kind of cleaning they do esp making the bed is not as neat and well organized. Noise from the outside your room can be heard but bec you will be tired after the whole day, it doesnt matter. Ben tanh market is so near! The famous Street Food Market is walking distance only. You can actually walk going to Saigon Center, Saigon Square!', 'This is by far the best value for money stay in HCMC for me on my travels... and ive been travelling for 17 years. Great location with spacious rooms with seperate bathroom and which is RARE for HCMC. I would highly recommend this place!', "My friend and I had a great time in saigon. We are regular travellers and normally I use Air BnB but for this trip I wanted to be very centrally located and this hotel didn't dissapoint :) Staff on front desk are super friendly and kind and helped us in every way possible. Maid service could do with not waking us at 9:30am everyday but otherwise fine Showers are very low so tall guys goodluckWas traveling with my Vietnamese gf and not always easy to stay in hotels unless married but this hotel is accepting of all female guests Good value, would definately stay again", 'Convenient location 5 Min walk to Ben Than market.Grab Taxi and Grab Moto available.Staff service is excellent. Although room small but value for money. You pay for what you get.Local food available with walking distance.You can get a transport to airport at USD9 for maximum 5 people. Check with the reception.', 'Really enjoyed my stay at Lien An Saigon Hotel, the location is excellent, the staff are fantastic and really helpful with tours, information and directions, breakfast was great, would definitely stay here again and highly recommend', "The room is too small that there is no space for you to walk. Feels like one of those cheap budget hotel. If you could imagine, there are only 3 rooms to each floor. The sheets are dirty like they've not changed it after the previous occupant. There is no complimentary bottled water in the room.\rThe staff wanted me to pay VND 10,000 after using her tape to seal my box! As I was asking the staff where to get the bahn mi, he was giving me directions half way and just walked away to have his breakfast in the room.\rI'll never recommend this hotel to anyone who visits HCMC.", "It's an old fashion hotel, like those you would find in olden days Peking. For slightly more money, you can get much better hotel around the area, eg. The Luxe or Avanti.The room is so small, there's hardly place to even walk or sit. Really, don't bother.", "overall a good experience at the hotel. the room was very clean clean, it had a clean, dry bathroom and a shower with strong water flow. There were several English channels (but no news channels) on TV. Unfortunately the standard room was claustrophobically tiny and it had a very small window facing the side wall of the next hotel, making it very dark. It felt like a windowless room. Pay a little more for a higher standard room with bigger windows and space, and try booking from the hotel's website for better value. The staff were friendly and the receptionist was helpful and spoke very good english. It is located within walking distance to all the central tourist areas.", 'We enjoyed our stay here, very convenient to market and many good places to eat. Easy walking distance to many points of interest. The staff arranged a trip to the Mekong delta which was very enjoyable. We would come again and recommend to friends.', 'This hotel had very nice rooms and the location was ideal for the market and nightlife however I was disapointed to be told I had to pay an extra $10 a night because the room I had booked was "broken", the staff were mostly helpful but this extra charge did sour the stay.', 'It was a pleasant stay with all we needed for the 4 day stay. Breakfast choice was limited but good enough to get the day going. For those who need more, it is readily available around the hotel at reasonable prices. Most attractions are within walking distances and taxi is also inexpensive.', 'we really enjoy the location of the hotel...nice & welcoming lobby. rooms are comfy. excellent internet service. however, without electric kettle/hot water,our stay with children were quite difficult.', "Good hotel but I got the same room during my stays there. I stayed here twice. i got a feeling only 1 room is available only. The room had a few cockroaches. Toilet was a lil dirty. but still ok. Staf was friendly and even helped me buy gum when i didn't know where to buy. In the end, I tip him and the total cost of the gum was so so so expensive. But that was my choice."]

hotel name: KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n LiÃªn An Saigon (Lien An Saigon Hotel)
address: 181 LÃª ThÃ¡nh TÃ´n, phÆ°á»ng Báº¿n ThÃ nh, Quáº­n 1, thÃ nh phá»‘ Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, 700000
reviews: ['K cÃ³ nÆ°á»›c suá»‘i free cho khÃ¡ch. K cÃµ bÃ£i Ä‘áº­u xe, pháº£i nhá» NV gá»­i vÃ  tá»‘n tiá»n. MÃ¡y quáº¹t tháº» lá»—i thá»i, k sá»­ dá»¥g Ä‘c ATM', 'Ä‘á»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm cá»±c há»£p lÃ½, gáº§n trung tÃ¢m cÃ¡c hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng, Äƒn uá»‘ng', '- ChÃºng tÃ´i Ä‘i cÃ´ng tÃ¡c nhÆ°ng há»i nhÃ¢n viÃªn 1 sá»‘ Ä‘iá»ƒm Äƒn uá»‘ng gáº§n Ä‘Ã³ há» Ä‘á»u ko rÃµ láº¯m.- PhÃ²ng hÆ¡i nhá» vÃ  giÃ¡ phÃ²ng so vá»›i cÃ¡c khÃ¡ch sáº¡n xung quanh, Ä‘áº·t qua agoda chÆ°a thá»±c sá»± cáº¡nh tranh.', 'had an overall pleasant & lovely experience at lien ann hotel 2.\r\rwe paid all-inclusive [2nights] for a deluxe twin room.\rroom is kinda big. and the price is inclusive of breakfast (7am-9am).\r\râ€¢ 1 king size bed + 1 super single\râ€¢ 2 chairs + 1 coffee table\râ€¢ desktop pc with internet connection\râ€¢ dvd player + samsung lcd flat screen tv\râ€¢ bathtub/ bathrobes etc\r\rben thanh market is right beside the hotel.', "friendly and considerate staff. rooms are clean but the shower rooms are a we bit small. in-house dining room at the 10th floor is  small and need 'to climb' two levels up because the lift ends at the 8th floor only.  senior people like me find it a bit difficult. before taking a taxi do seek the staff assistance so that you won't be overcharged. try avoid taking the tribike ... you will be con if you are not careful. we had a very pleasant stay. i would put up at the same hotel if i visited hcmc again.", "Ive stayed here 10 times over the past 3 years. I dont recommend staying on the ground floor as it's noisy but otherwise no complaints about this hotel. super friendly staff and good value for money rooms. amazing location. make sure you try 4P's pizza restaurant around the corner ...best pizza in town", 'pros - near must see areascons - staff not helpful. chung even shouted at us when we requested him to assist us in weighing our baggage. unlike other hotels that we stayed inHCMC, staff are helpful and jolly fellows. lower floor rooms are noisy.', 'We reserved a family room so that my daughter can have her own space and bathroom. This room is interconnected with each other so space is enough for the three of us. Breakfast is not appealing though with 4 selections to choose and repeated for the entire duration of our stay, 6 nights. The dining area is at 10th floor that you have to use the stairs from 8th floor to 10th floor. Elevator is only up to 8th floor. No free bottled water in room.  The staff are nice esp the housekeeping staff. Although the kind of cleaning they do esp making the bed is not as neat and well organized. Noise from the outside your room can be heard but bec you will be tired after the whole day, it doesnt matter. Ben tanh market is so near! The famous Street Food Market is walking distance only. You can actually walk going to Saigon Center, Saigon Square!', 'This is by far the best value for money stay in HCMC for me on my travels... and ive been travelling for 17 years. Great location with spacious rooms with seperate bathroom and which is RARE for HCMC. I would highly recommend this place!', "My friend and I had a great time in saigon. We are regular travellers and normally I use Air BnB but for this trip I wanted to be very centrally located and this hotel didn't dissapoint :) Staff on front desk are super friendly and kind and helped us in every way possible. Maid service could do with not waking us at 9:30am everyday but otherwise fine Showers are very low so tall guys goodluckWas traveling with my Vietnamese gf and not always easy to stay in hotels unless married but this hotel is accepting of all female guests Good value, would definately stay again", 'Convenient location 5 Min walk to Ben Than market.Grab Taxi and Grab Moto available.Staff service is excellent. Although room small but value for money. You pay for what you get.Local food available with walking distance.You can get a transport to airport at USD9 for maximum 5 people. Check with the reception.', 'Really enjoyed my stay at Lien An Saigon Hotel, the location is excellent, the staff are fantastic and really helpful with tours, information and directions, breakfast was great, would definitely stay here again and highly recommend', "The room is too small that there is no space for you to walk. Feels like one of those cheap budget hotel. If you could imagine, there are only 3 rooms to each floor. The sheets are dirty like they've not changed it after the previous occupant. There is no complimentary bottled water in the room.\rThe staff wanted me to pay VND 10,000 after using her tape to seal my box! As I was asking the staff where to get the bahn mi, he was giving me directions half way and just walked away to have his breakfast in the room.\rI'll never recommend this hotel to anyone who visits HCMC.", "It's an old fashion hotel, like those you would find in olden days Peking. For slightly more money, you can get much better hotel around the area, eg. The Luxe or Avanti.The room is so small, there's hardly place to even walk or sit. Really, don't bother.", "overall a good experience at the hotel. the room was very clean clean, it had a clean, dry bathroom and a shower with strong water flow. There were several English channels (but no news channels) on TV. Unfortunately the standard room was claustrophobically tiny and it had a very small window facing the side wall of the next hotel, making it very dark. It felt like a windowless room. Pay a little more for a higher standard room with bigger windows and space, and try booking from the hotel's website for better value. The staff were friendly and the receptionist was helpful and spoke very good english. It is located within walking distance to all the central tourist areas.", 'We enjoyed our stay here, very convenient to market and many good places to eat. Easy walking distance to many points of interest. The staff arranged a trip to the Mekong delta which was very enjoyable. We would come again and recommend to friends.', 'This hotel had very nice rooms and the location was ideal for the market and nightlife however I was disapointed to be told I had to pay an extra $10 a night because the room I had booked was "broken", the staff were mostly helpful but this extra charge did sour the stay.', 'It was a pleasant stay with all we needed for the 4 day stay. Breakfast choice was limited but good enough to get the day going. For those who need more, it is readily available around the hotel at reasonable prices. Most attractions are within walking distances and taxi is also inexpensive.', 'we really enjoy the location of the hotel...nice & welcoming lobby. rooms are comfy. excellent internet service. however, without electric kettle/hot water,our stay with children were quite difficult.', "Good hotel but I got the same room during my stays there. I stayed here twice. i got a feeling only 1 room is available only. The room had a few cockroaches. Toilet was a lil dirty. but still ok. Staf was friendly and even helped me buy gum when i didn't know where to buy. In the end, I tip him and the total cost of the gum was so so so expensive. But that was my choice."]

We decided to check out the next day and transfer to another hotel.', 'No window rooms must be better checked for smell.', 'Well, if it were not for the rats in my room I would rate my experience a 5 out 5 stars easily.What made me put 1 star is first of all the rats roaming around my room, I didnt see them first night but they woke me up during my second night and that caught me completely disgusted and shocked (travelled in my hotels in SE Asia and first time I see rats in my room) at the middle of the night that I couldnt even wanna sleep there anymore so I packed all my stuff and went on to complaint to the receptionist which didnt even proposed me to go check in a new room so I could go sleep again (I woke up at 3 AM) till I had to wake up to catch my flight, hell, she didnt even offered me the redbull that I took from the minibar (which only costed 15000 dong), even worse : she didnt apologized either for my bad experience, I had to beg her to sleep the rest of my night in the tiny couch at the reception, worst staff ever, she didnt care at all and didnt help me try to figure out a solution.', 'We have stayed in a few places in Saigon at around the same, or more than the price we paid here, and have been sorely disappointed with the quality of the hotel. MÃ¡y quáº¹t tháº» lá»—i thá»i, k sá»­ dá»¥g Ä‘c ATM', 'Ä‘á»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm cá»±c há»£p lÃ½, gáº§n trung tÃ¢m cÃ¡c hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng, Äƒn uá»‘ng', '- ChÃºng tÃ´i Ä‘i cÃ´ng tÃ¡c nhÆ°ng há»i nhÃ¢n viÃªn 1 sá»‘ Ä‘iá»ƒm Äƒn uá»‘ng gáº§n Ä‘Ã³ há» Ä‘á»u ko rÃµ láº¯m.- PhÃ²ng hÆ¡i nhá» vÃ  giÃ¡ phÃ²ng so vá»›i cÃ¡c khÃ¡ch sáº¡n xung quanh, Ä‘áº·t qua agoda chÆ°a thá»±c sá»± cáº¡nh tranh.', 'had an overall pleasant & lovely experience at lien ann hotel 2.\r\rwe paid all-inclusive [2nights] for a deluxe twin room.\rroom is kinda big. and the price is inclusive of breakfast (7am-9am).\r\râ€¢ 1 king size bed + 1 super single\râ€¢ 2 chairs + 1 coffee table\râ€¢ desktop pc with internet connection\râ€¢ dvd player + samsung lcd flat screen tv\râ€¢ bathtub/ bathrobes etc\r\rben thanh market is right beside the hotel.', "friendly and considerate staff. rooms are clean but the shower rooms are a we bit small. in-house dining room at the 10th floor is  small and need 'to climb' two levels up because the lift ends at the 8th floor only.  senior people like me find it a bit difficult. before taking a taxi do seek the staff assistance so that you won't be overcharged. try avoid taking the tribike ... you will be con if you are not careful. we had a very pleasant stay. i would put up at the same hotel if i visited hcmc again.", "Ive stayed here 10 times over the past 3 years. I dont recommend staying on the ground floor as it's noisy but otherwise no complaints about this hotel. super friendly staff and good value for money rooms. amazing location. make sure you try 4P's pizza restaurant around the corner ...best pizza in town", 'pros - near must see areascons - staff not helpful. chung even shouted at us when we requested him to assist us in weighing our baggage. unlike other hotels that we stayed inHCMC, staff are helpful and jolly fellows. lower floor rooms are noisy.', 'We reserved a family room so that my daughter can have her own space and bathroom. This room is interconnected with each other so space is enough for the three of us. Breakfast is not appealing though with 4 selections to choose and repeated for the entire duration of our stay, 6 nights. The dining area is at 10th floor that you have to use the stairs from 8th floor to 10th floor. Elevator is only up to 8th floor. No free bottled water in room.  The staff are nice esp the housekeeping staff. Although the kind of cleaning they do esp making the bed is not as neat and well organized. Noise from the outside your room can be heard but bec you will be tired after the whole day, it doesnt matter. Ben tanh market is so near! The famous Street Food Market is walking distance only. You can actually walk going to Saigon Center, Saigon Square!', 'This is by far the best value for money stay in HCMC for me on my travels... and ive been travelling for 17 years. Great location with spacious rooms with seperate bathroom and which is RARE for HCMC. I would highly recommend this place!', "My friend and I had a great time in saigon. We are regular travellers and normally I use Air BnB but for this trip I wanted to be very centrally located and this hotel didn't dissapoint :) Staff on front desk are super friendly and kind and helped us in every way possible. Maid service could do with not waking us at 9:30am everyday but otherwise fine Showers are very low so tall guys goodluckWas traveling with my Vietnamese gf and not always easy to stay in hotels unless married but this hotel is accepting of all female guests Good value, would definately stay again", 'Convenient location 5 Min walk to Ben Than market.Grab Taxi and Grab Moto available.Staff service is excellent. Although room small but value for money. You pay for what you get.Local food available with walking distance.You can get a transport to airport at USD9 for maximum 5 people. Check with the reception.', 'Really enjoyed my stay at Lien An Saigon Hotel, the location is excellent, the staff are fantastic and really helpful with tours, information and directions, breakfast was great, would definitely stay here again and highly recommend', "The room is too small that there is no space for you to walk. Feels like one of those cheap budget hotel. If you could imagine, there are only 3 rooms to each floor. The sheets are dirty like they've not changed it after the previous occupant. There is no complimentary bottled water in the room.\rThe staff wanted me to pay VND 10,000 after using her tape to seal my box! As I was asking the staff where to get the bahn mi, he was giving me directions half way and just walked away to have his breakfast in the room.\rI'll never recommend this hotel to anyone who visits HCMC.", "It's an old fashion hotel, like those you would find in olden days Peking. For slightly more money, you can get much better hotel around the area, eg. The Luxe or Avanti.The room is so small, there's hardly place to even walk or sit. Really, don't bother.", "overall a good experience at the hotel. the room was very clean clean, it had a clean, dry bathroom and a shower with strong water flow. There were several English channels (but no news channels) on TV. Unfortunately the standard room was claustrophobically tiny and it had a very small window facing the side wall of the next hotel, making it very dark. It felt like a windowless room. Pay a little more for a higher standard room with bigger windows and space, and try booking from the hotel's website for better value. The staff were friendly and the receptionist was helpful and spoke very good english. It is located within walking distance to all the central tourist areas.", 'We enjoyed our stay here, very convenient to market and many good places to eat. Easy walking distance to many points of interest. The staff arranged a trip to the Mekong delta which was very enjoyable. We would come again and recommend to friends.', 'This hotel had very nice rooms and the location was ideal for the market and nightlife however I was disapointed to be told I had to pay an extra $10 a night because the room I had booked was "broken", the staff were mostly helpful but this extra charge did sour the stay.', 'It was a pleasant stay with all we needed for the 4 day stay. Breakfast choice was limited but good enough to get the day going. For those who need more, it is readily available around the hotel at reasonable prices. Most attractions are within walking distances and taxi is also inexpensive.', 'we really enjoy the location of the hotel...nice & welcoming lobby. rooms are comfy. excellent internet service. however, without electric kettle/hot water,our stay with children were quite difficult.', "Good hotel but I got the same room during my stays there. I stayed here twice. i got a feeling only 1 room is available only. The room had a few cockroaches. Toilet was a lil dirty. but still ok. Staf was friendly and even helped me buy gum when i didn't know where to buy. In the end, I tip him and the total cost of the gum was so so so expensive. But that was my choice."]

We decided to check out the next day and transfer to another hotel.', 'No window rooms must be better checked for smell.', 'Well, if it were not for the rats in my room I would rate my experience a 5 out 5 stars easily.What made me put 1 star is first of all the rats roaming around my room, I didnt see them first night but they woke me up during my second night and that caught me completely disgusted and shocked (travelled in my hotels in SE Asia and first time I see rats in my room) at the middle of the night that I couldnt even wanna sleep there anymore so I packed all my stuff and went on to complaint to the receptionist which didnt even proposed me to go check in a new room so I could go sleep again (I woke up at 3 AM) till I had to wake up to catch my flight, hell, she didnt even offered me the redbull that I took from the minibar (which only costed 15000 dong), even worse : she didnt apologized either for my bad experience, I had to beg her to sleep the rest of my night in the tiny couch at the reception, worst staff ever, she didnt care at all and didnt help me try to figure out a solution.', 'We have stayed in a few places in Saigon at around the same, or more than the price we paid here, and have been sorely disappointed with the quality of the hotel. Housekeeping was well done everyday. The doors are somewhat stuck. The worst is its location right across one of the most happening night spot in town. The music will be blaring since 7pm and taken up several notches after 12am. They won't stop until 3am. If you are looking for a good night sleep, this is not the place for you", 'Great staff, good location if I have a chance to visit Vietnam certainly choose this hotel.', 'The staffs are accomodating. Cozy, breakfast is not good.', "Pleasant staff.  New Food hall/mini mall straight opposite.  Close to ATM's, Mini Marts, Bus, pleasant park and places to eat.  In the Backpacker area.  A little noisy up to about 9 - 10 pm because of two entertainment areas nearby.  It is a pleasant 10 minute walk, mostly through a park, to the Ben Thanh Market.", 'Loved this Place, the wife Owner speaks good English and was a lovely lady, All the staff had big smiles. The room was good, The water was hot, and the mini bar prices were as you would buy at a Circle K.It is an easy walk to the Markets and the popular tourist night spots. Highland coffee was 10m away.', 'this hotel is close to many places around ho chi minh city,\rit is very convenient to get to. \rthe hotel staff is so very friendly and helpful.\rthe price was of the room was affordable. \ri would return to the same hotel next time i visit ho chi minh city, vietnam', 'Hotel was full when I turned up with my booking. They put me in a nearby place for the night. I was a bit disconcerted. However the staff are really nice at this hotel and that repaired the bad start. Rooms can be a little noisy. Traffic noise mainly (horns). I used ear plugs and slept really well.', 'We enjoyed our stay. People are very accommodating. The standard room is small but the rooms are well maintained. They made up our room everytime we leave. The place is located near Ben Tanh Market, about 10 mins walk. The hotel also has free fast wifi. :)', "i've stayed here several times before and visited again.\rpham ung lao, benthan market, and some other tourist spots are just near there.\rquite good breakfast is free though not many options are offering; some bread or instant noodle. you better try ice white coffee, vietnam style. yes, it's free with your breakfast.\r\rfriendly staffs, clean rooms, nothing disappointed.", 'i have only good things to say about this hotel. we were treated very nice by the staff the room was nice , cleaned everyday sheets and pillow cases changed everyday. felt very compfortable staff was nice and we enjoyed chattng with them at breakfast which also was very good . walking distance to everything. we saw many hotels in the area this was by far the best. booked all of our tours down stairs. was quite an enjoyable stay. great for familys and couples. not alot of noise and no strangers wandering around the hotel late at night. they run a first class hotel one of the best i have stayed in se asia.... oh wifi works great too and is free.', 'A very good hotel and managed by family. Friendly and smile. All staffs are kind-heart, honest and can speak little English. They were very detail and concern about cleanliness. Always feel cleanliness and refresh every time back to hotel.', "The staff are AWESOME. the rooftop restaurant is a great little breakfast nook, and the built-in travel agency down below can book you any trip anywhere in the area of Saigon. The owner and staff will bend over backwards to take care of you. The room is very clean. The shower is very good. The bed is very comfortable. The Wi-Fi is second to none.  It is quiet and within easy walking distance of most major attractions. Like I said, it's anything but fancy, but it's clean efficient and the staff are so friendly. Whenever we organized any tours or trips, the buses would come and pick us up right at the front door. They always had that bottles of water ready to purchase very cheap, soda, and there's a Shoppers Drug Mart right next door for all the little things that you need like toothpaste shampoo and toiletries. It is a perfect little hotel in a perfect little location with a perfect staff.", 'The funny thing is Vietnamese dont speak good english seem thay misinterpret your request but anyway its a good loacation food courts nearby. There is a massage SPA beside but be careful they force you to give tips. There is a corner tour agent who gives cheap options', 'The funny thing is Vietnamese dont speak good english seem thay misinterpret your request but anyway its a good loacation food courts nearby. There is a massage SPA beside but be careful they force you to give tips. There is a corner tour agent who gives cheap options', "Traveling with my mom. Chose this place because it's near Sinh Tourist and Futa Busline. We're traveling the next day to Da Lat. Didn't expect much from our short stay. Room was a little noisy as it's near the road. Overall I'd recommend it if you're on a budget.", 'Rude staff, poor facilities, no water dispenser, will sneak up to our room to switch off the lights etc. when we are away, so do not leave any valuables in the room, very far away from attractions, not worth the time & money spent at Kim Khoi Hotel. Will not stay again.', "Great location. Take bus No 109 from Airport and they will drop you right in front of the hotel. Check in is super fast. It's like they wait for you and know who you are the moment you walk into the hotel. Exchange of Agoda voucher with key to the room. Booked for large bed but was given single beds but I am ok. There were many airlines tickets sub in the drawer, showing they don't really clean the drawer. Other than that, i think this is a good place to put a night of two.", 'Good points1.The hotel is close to Ben Thanh Market (5-10 minutes walk) and bus stops. It is convenient to go around the city.2.The staffs are helpful and friendly. I got a hotel room upgrade without any charge because the room type I had booked was full.3.Eventhough the hotel is small, there is a elevator. It is good for a traveler with a big luggage.Unsatisfied points1.The breakfast is not enough for me. I needed to buy something else to fill my stomach.2.The room (superior type) is clean, but the devices and furniture are out of date. The bathroom door bolt is broken.']

Highly recommend, good clean, simple and safety. The Avanti B. is quite, clean and safety at the center of Saigon/Ho chi Minh city. It nears many stores, markets and other hotels as choosing. Many near, different and fast transportations with bookings to travel to other cities, countries, places, etc. Night times, a best places around the hotel and come back to the hotel without lost. All in all its decent value for the price.Some of the staff doesn't speak the best English but this is the norm in Vietnam.  Breakfast wise please note they serve only coffee, tea with some white bread and 3 jams. Appreciate it being free but I wouldn't really call it breakfast.  Location wise it's a 10 minute walk from where most backpackers stay. This means for the most part it's quiter which is nice but you'll have to walk farther if you want to hangout in the main area. Additionally, this means it's a bit harder to meet other backpackers as many people staying at this hotel are Vietnamese travelers and Chinese travelors who don't speak any English.", "This hostel has amazing staff. Ming in particular is amazing and super helpful. The hostel needs the bed curtains to be repaired as many are in disrepair and half falling off. All in all its decent value for the price.Some of the staff doesn't speak the best English but this is the norm in Vietnam.  Breakfast wise please note they serve only coffee, tea with some white bread and 3 jams. Appreciate it being free but I wouldn't really call it breakfast.  Location wise it's a 10 minute walk from where most backpackers stay. This means for the most part it's quiter which is nice but you'll have to walk farther if you want to hangout in the main area. Additionally, this means it's a bit harder to meet other backpackers as many people staying at this hotel are Vietnamese travelers and Chinese travelors who don't speak any English.", 'Positives:Very clean and staff is really nice. Definitely a fair price for with you get and the bed curtains allow you privacy.Everyone gets a free 450ml beer between 6-8pmNegatives: They need more of a "kitchen" then just a microwave. A stove top burner and some pots and pans is a kitchen. Also, they don\'t serve breakfast. It\'s jam, margarine and bread, coffee and tea . It\'s misleading to say this is breakfast. Offer some protein. Like boiled eggs, peanut butter etcBeer is great but free water bottle refills would be really nice', "The hostel was a bit hard to find for the taxi driver as it's in a small alley, but it's not really off the main street. Very comfortable beds, clean room, shampoo , toothbrush, towels provided. The staff is super friendly. I checked out but my bus was at night and they let me hang out at the hostel offering new towels if I wanted to take a shower before I leave for free. Location is great. Walking distance to the main tourist street but far enough to avoid the noise and craziness. Highly recommend place!", 'I chose this hostel because of central location, they have a kitchen you can use, breakfast (dont expect too much only toast and jam and instant coffee), its quiet and not crowded. Its not the best place to mingle and meet people because there is only a small common area. If youre looking for a quiet space centrally located for couple days its a very good choice. They offer free beer every evening. Big plus for the staff for letting me borrow a helmet!', 'although the location is not near to the central , but take a grab only cost 20k dong , and nearby got few restaurant serve with nice food, and all the price is not tourist price! Moreover, at the morning , you can experience the local life by visiting the street nearby to this hostel!', 'Stayed one night in the double room on forth floor. The room was clean, had a nice modern design and a small balcony. Looks just like in the pictures! Staff was very friendly and helpful. There is also a shared kitchen downstairs. We would definitely come back!', 'I rent a couple room with a queen bed but when we come and checked in. I had to stay in a Family with old children. I do not understand why they did it.. i am very disappointed.. the room is too old, everything is oldddddd...', "I decided to test out this hostel for a night because it is part of the same company as Luci hostel.It is what you pay for a bed, secure and quiet.But there were a few things that made me want to leave the first hour in.- Too hot, the room was so small that the fans were ineffective- Soo dark, you couldn't see anything in the room, even their bed light was dismal.4th Floor, the dorm room is on the 4th floor so you have to climb flights if stairs to get up there.- hot water didn't work.The room was clean, , beds comfortable.I've gone back to their other hostel Luci house, much better there.", 'We are in a group of 5.. All female. We booked at GoCo hostel but we were transfered to Luci House. The place and the room was clean and near the city center. The breakfast was bread and tea.']

address: 35/6 Bui Vien St, Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 1, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, +84 28
reviews: ['TÃ´i Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ ká»³ nghá»‰ ráº¥t thÃº vá»‹ táº¡i Lily hostel, nhÃ¢n viÃªn á»Ÿ Ä‘Ã¢y ráº¥t thÃ¢n thiá»‡n Ä‘áº·c biá»‡t lÃ  báº¡n Nam khi chÃºng tÃ´i Ä‘Ãªn vali hÃ nh lÃ½ ráº¥t náº·ng mÃ  báº¡n Ã½ nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh bÃª Ä‘á»“ cho chÃºng tÃ´i lÃªn gÃ¡c. PhÃ²ng giÆ°á»ng táº§ng rá»™ng sáº¡ch sáº½, Ä‘iá»ƒm trá»« phÃ²ng vá»‡ sinh hÆ¡i cháº­t.', 'Hostel Ä‘Æ°á»£c thiáº¿t káº¿ khÃ¡ Ä‘áº¹p vá»›i phong cÃ¡ch trang trÃ­ tráº» trung, phÃ¹ há»£p vá»›i cÃ¡c nhÃ³m báº¡n Ä‘i du lá»‹ch cÃ¹ng nhau. Hostel á»Ÿ ngay phá»‘ BÃ¹i Viá»‡n tuy nhiÃªn á»Ÿ trong ngÃµ nÃªn khÃ´ng bá»‹ á»“n.', 'NhÃ¬n chung tá»‘t ngoáº¡i trá»« phÃ²ng cháº­t do Ä‘áº·t 8 giÆ°á»ng. NhÃ¢n viÃªn ráº¥t thÃ¢n thiá»‡n', 'This hostel is very near to Sinh Tourist Center in Saigon. Is about 50 metre away only from the hostel. Is good for foreign travellers who wish to take the bus at Sinh Tourist Center. A lot of restaurants nearby. The staff named Lien is very nice and friendly!', 'This guesthouse can be tricky to find.  However once you do, it offered a delightful stay.  Great location in the middle of the bars and restaurants.  However I never heard any noise from my room (which could have been from the lack of window!).  Great breakfast, very friendly staff and a nice environment to meet other travelers.  I would highly recommend it!', 'Clean, very friendly staff, but this property is under construction.  Does not match photos (maybe soon)... good location if you want to be in backpackers central.  Pretty loud.  Breakfast is great, and again, the staff is excellent.', 'We stayed in both the 12 bed mixed dorm and a private room.  We were very happy at Lily hostel.  Nicely tucked back from the main drag chaos, but close enough that you can have it all.  Staff were incredibly friendly, patient and helpful.  Breakfast was delicious.  Would definitely come back!', "Location is perfect with restaurants, shops, attractions nearby. The owner, her family and the staffs (especially the korean guy) are absolutely nice and helpful. Dorm room is a decent size and the bed is big compared to other hostels I've stayed at. The staffs clean the room daily. Breakfast is also good. They can help you book tours as well which is a plus. And lastly, what I like the most about this hostel is the overall atmosphere. It feels like home!", 'Pros:-1. location - good location in the District 1.2. Price - good price.3. Service - the staff service very good, they try their best.Cons:-1. Air-Conditioning maintenance.everything is ok except the air-conditioning is not cooling enough.the staff know nothing about the basic maintaining the air-conditioning.on the 2nd night, i found out that the air-conditioning filter is full of dust until it fail to work properly. The dusk is as thick as 1CM and totally block the air.I need to self removed the air filter before able to use air-conditioning.2. Breakfast - very simple breakfast, soup noodle is instant noodle.', "We stayed one night at Lily hotel and arrived quite late, there was a staff to pick us up at the airport to the hotel. The decoration of the hotel was cute and modern and the rooms are very clean. There is no elevator but a hotel staff help us carried all our luggages upstair and we really feel grateful for him because our luggages are quite heavy. The breakfast was also very nice. There are few things I'd like the hotel to improve, is that the air-co in my room wasn't that cool and the wifi signal was quite weak on the 2nd floor.", "I loved this hostel!!! This has been one of the cleanest and most comfortable dorm rooms I've ever stayed in my travels. There is hot shower and breakfast included in the pricing for the dorm room. The front staff is really friendly and helpful as well as well versed in English!The WiFi is really fast (well in the rooms, it varies) but there is a common area where you can just hang out if you're bored in your room. The location is just in a side street of Bui Vien (backpacker area) and gives you access to everywhere easily! Definitely going back here!", "A new and therefore very clean hostel, down a quiet street but still very close to all the action. The staff were very friendly and genuine, and spoke good English. WOuldn't hesitate to stay there again - in fact it would be my first call if I returned to Saigon.", 'My friends and I were very happy staying at this hotel for 4 nigiht.Check in was fast and we were very lucky to be able to check in early, around 10.00am in the morning.(as i requested in the booking form). I love the simple breakfast and i ordered almost the same everyday for noodle with egg and vege.Drink was very tasty milik as well as the lime juice.for the first three morning i have two bananas,for me the breakfast is sufficient.The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful especially aon how and where to go for good shopping..By the way this hostel is located in a small ally and reachead able on foot in one minutes.Taxi cant go through but motor bike has no proble to acess till next to the main door of this hostel.The hostel main door will be closed at 11.00pm but guest can ring the bell and staff on duty will open up for you at once since they are boarding at the reception area.Nearby to the hostel are many guesthouses or similar hotel but maybe different prices.We were very pleased with the hostel arrangment for tour since booking directly to the agency nearby is slightly expensive.For the Delta mekong 1 day tour for RM35.00 was reasonable price included the lunch.The hotel Cu Chi half tour 135KVND compared to 156 000 from the agency is much better.for those who loves to hang in a bar ,there are noumerous and i can says that the whole areas are full with bar and places to drink.I dont saw any halal restaurant here but many pizzaz and other fast food outlets.ther are also many massages parlour here with operating time till 3.00am. My goodness this place is full of character, most tourist are westerners and very few from my home country as well as others asian country.Ther are many small boutique nearby selling good quality tshirt and dresses just opposite block of this hotel.i will surely come back here again.', 'We were put in a room that had bed bugs, which the staff admitted the next day that they knew about. The bugs thankfully donâ€™t seem to have gotten into our luggage but we are still covered in bites and this could have caused a lot more damage. Totally unacceptable.', "We were informed a day before our check in that we might be transferred to a partner hostel which is across the actual Lily's Hostel which is also owned by the same management. The hostel staffs were very accommodating and nice to us. Free breakfast given used to be a toast and some spread, but this hostel has given a nicely plated banguet and a choice of egg or sausage. You can also choose a home cooked noodles. I have never experienced this kind of service and hospitality from previous hostel stay. If you're looking for an affordable and comfortable stay, then don't hesitate to book this place.", 'I stayed here for 2 nights prior to meeting with a tour. It is in a really ideal location, just off the main walking street where there are loads of bars and restaurants. Quiet, it isnâ€™t the most friendly of hostels as the shared space is so small, so little opportunity to chat and meet new people. However rooms are good, I had a double private room and it was clean, had everything I needed except a safe. Staff are very friendly, know you name, check in on you and store luggage for when you need it. Perfect hostel for when in Ho Chi Minh.', 'Very friendly and welcoming place. The location was very central to a lot of restaurants and shops. If you stay here you must eat at 145 Bun Cha which is the most delicious food we have eaten whilst here in Vietnam so far!! The location is just off the Main Street which is great as this street comes alive with music and bars at night, but you do not get disturbed as you are situated down a little alley way. The breakfast was very basic considering the price per night, but you did get a fair choice.  On the whole, it is a nice property to stay in, but a little pricey for what you get.', 'We got the family room we are backpacking with our two young children, it was a good price, location is super, a lot of night life, very lively, the building is slightly off the main road down a alley (make sure your diver knows exactly where to go or you may get lost, ours knew the exact location) the room we had was good you couldnâ€™t hear the loud music from the main road. The room was clean and a decent size, no fridge which wasnâ€™t a big deal, although we like to have cold beverages on hand. Wifi works well, staff was very friendly. Overall it was a great two days here money well spent!', "Starting from cons: this hostel cooperates with the other one on the same street, so even though you book with Lily's hostel you may end up in bedstation. What it means is that what you see on pictures is not the place you may get, like it was in my case.The other hostel is quite nice and staff is extremely nice. Location wise both hostels are in the center of backpackers area, not far from main sights.  Bedstation has nice design, but it's tiny (bathroom in my room was so small you couldn't fully open shower door) and bit run down (pain pealing from the walls for example). Breakfast was decent, same about wifi. To summarize it's good place to stay, they are just asking for bit to much considering standard.", 'Room is clean and decorated nicely. Bathroom is spacious but toilet is too near the wall thus not comfortable when sitting down. Hanger lacking and water pressure is low in the bathroom. No room service to clean up the room for the 3 nights we stayed. No complimentary drinking and no kettle and hot water from hotel is chargeable.']

address: 185 -187 LÃª ThÃ¡nh TÃ´n Quáº­n 1, Quáº­n 1, Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, Viá»‡t Nam, 70000
reviews: ['Pros: have a large room and bathroom, location near to ben thanh market, around have the circle k mart, restaurant also.Cons: the prices is higher abit but no free bottled water, charges each bottle vnd 20k, so expensive on it. U can get it cheaper at K mart. Coz the water put inside refrigerator , on the first night we stayed we thoughts its free, but when check out time just only know its charges us money, not free. So after we back to stay 2 nights we knew already we just bought the water at K mart.', "Good hotel for family. I'am always stayed at this hotel since when i came to vietnam (ho chi min city)..Just walking to Choo Ben Than Market and Malaysian street.  Totaly this hotel comfortable and staff always helpful. Recommended hotel", 'The staffs are very friendly and helpful. Although it is quite noisy during the day, it is quite during the night. Room condition is very good. Also quite near to Malaysian Street and easy to find halal food.', 'Pros. Excellent location.  Near to Ben Thanh , night markets. Walking  distance to Takashimaya and other shopping centres. Lots of restaurants, cafes and street food around. Friendly staff. Daily room cleaning.Cons Bring your own shampoo and shower gel as hotel does not provide.', "Ideal location as Ben Thanh is just down the block. Away from the hustle and bustle of the market but still noisy in the streets (city never sleeps). Staff were super nice and helpful. We had to ask for more towels multiple times and I wish water as provided but for the price and location, it was a good experience and I'd book again.", "Checked in was fast and efficient. Hotel room and toilet were spacious. Our family consist of five adults and after we checked in and settled down, we were told to pay extra USD5/day for extra one pax. We didn't mind paying since everything looks great and clean. We were on level 6 and WiFi wasn't stable. However, one can use wifi on different levels with the same password. TV cable with Fox movie, HBO and many more were our entertainment. Staff were helpful and service was good. Balcony with the street view was nice. Hotel is a few step away from Ben thanh market and next to it, there is a family mart. Hotel provided good cheap massage service which I enjoyed it very much. Overall, we had a great stay and thumbs up for a budget hotel.", 'This was our first experience at this hotel & we liked it very much. We will return in the future to the hotel as it is nearby Ben-Than & just a short walk away. The room is quite specious even for 4 people.', 'Love this place close to everywhere and everything you need like eating places, nightlife spots and even good massages. The pricing for the room is amazingly afforable but the only thing missing is a safe where we can store valuables  and passport.', 'My husband & I enjoyed our stay so much, though at first, we only got our room at 5.30pm (waited for like 2 hours) but they gave us a very nice big room for two. The room was clean, no fouls odor, the bathroom was clean, surrounding not noisy. We had the view of other buildings but it was a nice scene.Overall I paid for what I got...its worthit & the area is safe too...', 'The hotel is strategically situated. It is within short walking distant to shops and halal food restaurants. Tourist guide and tour packages is just next door and was a real bargain with experienced personnels. The hotel staffs was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. I would certainly recommend this hotel to would be tourist.', "It was great.  So close to the Ben T. Market and the room's AC was super strong.  That really is a good thing in Vietnam's May weather.  Cools down the room within 5 mins.  Toilet was also Super Clean.  Everything looks new...", 'Information at agoda this hotel children 0-10years free to stay if not add extra bed.. But when i came at the hotel, the staff at the counter told me children 0-6years stay for free..7years must pay more 5usd/VND 200k.. So i was charged vnd 200k..So far  the rooms comfortable & clean..', 'Pros: good location, near to Ben thanh market, the room and bath room is big.Cons: no provide free bottled mineral water, each bottle charge VND 20k', 'kepada yang plan nak shopping area ben than market,ini adalah pilihan yang tepat kerana anda boleh jalan kaki sahaja kerana ia terletak di satu blok hadapan, begitu juga ben thant night market dan Malay Street .', 'The centre of old Sai Gon, now Ho Chi Minh City, is a short walk away, Ben Thanh markets are around the corner, good street food is every where and so is western fare if you prefer... and all for just over $40per night... and considering I was only there to sleep, what else would you want?', 'The location is just beside the popular Ben Thanh Market and night market.The family room is big and has balcony.Easy to get halal food at Malaysian street.There are wifi network in each room but sometimes the connection is very slow.', 'The best thing about this hotel is the location. Just walking distance to major attractions. Clean room. Very friendly and helpful staff. Value for money. Not many facility or food for breakfast but not a big problem.', 'The room was very run down n toilet was meh..aircon was noisy n only hot air came out...furnitures was also run down..very disappointed!..not recommending it to anyone..will never go back there again..', 'All the complaints that I read about other hotels are not found in this hotel. Basic hotel facilities even toothbrush were provided. Towels were changed daily. I was not moved to other hotels. Water pressure was great - just the hot water took sometimes in the morning and late evening. 50++ tv channels with around 7 English channels....', "Generous sized family room, good selection of TV channels (english channels available). But the room is getting worn, we suspect the waterproofing in the shower is a little faulty as the floor always got wet after a shower despite using the curtain. The cleaning service is a bit unpredictable (they skipped us one day, bedsheets arent changed even though we stayed for a week) and laundry is quite expensive. Convenient location although a bit noisy as facing a major road, on the plus side it's very easy to find. Next to two convenient stores and several eateries. Walking distance to Ben Thanh market and halal restaurants.Staff are friendly and helpful enough. there is a PC downstairs for usage and wifi is quite fast."]
