Thank you so much.', 'The staffs were really friendly and helpful. Only feedback for improvement will be the room service switch in the room. Once you remove your hotel card, the lights for room service is no longer there, which should not be the case.', 'We stayed here for just one night when our Ha Long Bay cruise was cancelled and the staff was so wonderful. The room was clean, the views were awesome and it was very comfortable. I would definitely recommend.', "Beautiful hotel with perfect location in Old Quarter, close to weekend night market (food + shopping) and pond (great for jogging). We're greeted by Ms Lan who is very nice and provided us useful info in Hanoi. Breakfast included was good (their pho is a must-eat), upgraded to bigger rooms with early check-in.  We tried massages at the hotel spa one night but service was below expectation and not professional (some are freelance masseuses). We talked to Ms Lan about that the next morning and she quickly escalated the case to hotel manager Tony. Tony is efficient to look into our case and offered us options as compensation to rectify. Appreciated their understanding, sincerity and flexibility. Despite the spa experience, everything is recommendable and we will be happy to stay there again. There is also water leakage for shower place in the rooms due to the design but Tony already noted and we understood this is an issue for all rooms which fixing it will take time.", 'Bathroom needs to be fixed. The glass door is a bit dangerous and makes people cant move much.', 'Superb breakfastPerfect locationVery nice staffNice designSkybar with a stunning viewOnly problem:   In our room there was a bad WIFI (it was the last room in the corridor on the 7th floor, probably far from the router....the wifi was very good in the common areas of the hotel)', 'Unfortunately I got no window room. It was felt like a prison.', 'Good location easy to walk nearby attractions...so many stalls around near to lake night market..extremely clean...delicious breakfast...jz superior room no window and abit small but ok for afew days....glass door in toilet made abit uncomfortable..especially if u coming with friends...overall excellent', 'We had to check out early and very suddenly due to a family emergency; the staff were very understanding and helped us cancel our day-trip package as well as arranged for transportation to the airport. During our short stay, the staff were always ready to answer any questions we had about Hanoi. The rooms were comfortable and were well-maintained. Location was good as well, with most of the key attractions in the old quarter within walking distance.', 'Location best to none. All the staff (front desk, restaurant) wonderful. To recommend the place.', 'Beautiful room, nice view, friendly staff. I was really comfortable when I stayed here', 'The room was good, perfectly clean and the bed soft for Asia.  The staff were fantastic, especially the breakfast staff. Overall a great hotel in an excellent location.']

Will definitely stay at the same hotel when I go back to Hanoi.', 'Had a chance to stay at this amazing hotel in Old Quarter Hanoi for 3 nights and it was beyond our expectation. CÃ³ dá»‹p quay láº¡i tÃ´i cÅ©ng dáº½ chá»n nÆ¡i nÃ y.', "We loved this hotel...location is perfect... staff are friendly and welcoming... breakfast was better than most 5* (don't miss the eggs benedict) and big bright rooms!! For the price this was the best value hotel we've stayed at for many years... ğŸ˜", 'Special thanks to all their staff.  They looked after us very well.  All staff were great from junior to senior management.  Service was excellent.  It makes you feel on a good holiday.  They even decorated our room and we had a lovely cake waiting because we were celebrating our anniversary.The room was clean.  I would recommend this hotel.  The staff were attentive and helpful at breakfast.Location was perfect â€“ walking distance to everything in the old quarter.', 'The room and service from all staff members were impeccable. The room was very clean, quite soundproof (considering the location is in central Hanoi/old town), and prepared to be very comfortable. Itâ€™s a classy hotel, always with fresh flowers in the lobby and some in your room and with very professional breakfast service. The staff remembered all of our names, including those of our kids, and were always ready to assist us. On the way to the airport, the one staff member made sure that the taxi would only charge us a fixed amount and not over that amount. I couldnâ€™t recommend it enough.', 'The family room was huge & spacious, true to the photos, and despite overlooking the street, it did not get noisy at night. Hotel was well located near the lake & more touristy parts of the old quarter like the night market street.  However, there were many issues with the room over our 2 night stay. There was only one aircon in the middle of the room on top of the single bed, insufficient to cool the entire room. It was actually warm at the side of the double bed & the dressing table. The aircon was still the same after the staff came to help. The metal tubing on the shower had came off on both sides and although the reception promised to change it on the next day, it was not done. The blanket on our second night had a tear at one end, while a towel had a hole. We received our laundry delivered right to our room. But we fohnd an extra red underwear that did not belong to us and stains on some of our tshirts. Kudos to the bellboy who could speak Mandarin - he was bery friendly.']

KhÃ¡ch gáº§n háº¿t ngÃ y á»Ÿ nÃªn gá»i há»i khÃ¡ch lÃ  cÃ³ muá»‘n á»Ÿ tiáº¿p ko thÃ¬ Ä‘áº±ng nÃ y cháº³ng há»i gÃ¬ cá»© báº¯t ngÃ y check out pháº£i báº¯t buá»™c check out...', 'trung tÃ¢m phá»‘ cá»•', 'The hotel was in a good location in old quarter just around the corner from all the food and drinking places yet quiet so you didnâ€™t get room noise. The staff were so warm and welcoming and eager to help with whatever we needed. They gave us late check out which was very much appreciated and organised a car for us. The rooms were reasonable and the breakfast was acceptable but I wouldnâ€™t say impressive. Le Ngoc provides great customer service!', "It was a really great stay at the MK Premier. The staff was so friendly and the facilities like the rooftop-bar and the Spa was also very nice. The hotel is located in the middle of the Backpacker-quarter, so you are surrounded by bars and restaurants. The rooms are a little bit noisy because the roomdoors aren't really soundproof. So you can hear every noise from the floor. But in total, I would stay there again.", "Always love this place, service is good, bare in mind when you stay on the top floor the rooftop restaurant (it wasn't in use the last time I was there) makes a hell of noise when they setup for breakfast which can be annoying at 6-7am for those who have had a late night.", 'We stayed there for one night.  Itâ€™s centrally located in Old Quarter, so the night market is at our doorstep.  With that said, you will hear some noise from that but it didnâ€™t bother us.  The room is reasonably spacious.  We didnâ€™t hear noise from other guests.  Free breakfast was included on the rooftop with great view.', 'MK Premiere is a great choice if you want to stay on Old Quarter. All the action is right outside front door, and staff very attentive. We were a little worried because we booked a balcony room and thought street noise might be bad, but apparently the windows are heavy duty, so when balcony door/windows closed very quiet in room. Would highly recommend. A little pricey for Hanoi, but worth the money.', 'Excellent location in Old quarter of Hanoi.  Staff great, really helpful and welcoming.  Would strongly recommend upgrading to Deluxe Double/Twin as the standard rooms are quite small and have limited window space.But would definitely recommend  this hotel!', 'A BIG thumbs up to the staff at MK Premier Boutique Hotel. I had such a pleasant stay when I was there. \r\rThe receptionists were very welcoming and they were very helpful in recommending good food places to us. The lobby is beautifully decorated with a gallery for guests to appreciate. The rooms were big and spacious, with a bath tub to enjoy after a long day out. The hotel is also strategically located near a convenience store (Circle K) and the Weekend Night Market. \r\rI have to specially mention Lu, a staff at MK Premier, for going the distance to look after his guests. I was unfortunately unwell on the day of checkout and was supposed to head for a tour to Sapa. He went out of his way to make sure I was feeling alright and even arranged to bring me to the nearest hospital for a checkup. He also prepared a bowl of congee for a better digestion when I returned to the hotel after the hospital visit. As we had to arrange another night to stay in Hanoi due to the sudden cancellation of the trip, he went on further to check for hotel availability as it was already fully occupied in MK Premier (I totally understand its popularity now). He managed to get us a room for a night at their nearest sister hotel, Bonsella Boutique Hotel, just 2 minutes walk away. I cannot thank him enough and am very touched by his warmest actions. He sincerely cares and checks on me even till the last day of my trip in Hanoi. \r\rI would highly recommend MK Premier Boutique Hotel for their top-notch service and hospitality. I would definitely return the next time Iâ€™m back in Hanoi. Thank you for giving me such good memories of Hanoi despite my sickness.']

hotel name: KhÃ¡ch Sáº¡n Lavender Central HÃ  Ná»™i (Lavender Central Hotel Hanoi)
address: Sá»‘ 39, Phá»‘ HÃ ng Báº¡c, Quáº­n HoÃ n Kiáº¿m, Phá»‘ Cá»•, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam, 844
reviews: ['Khach san phuc vu tot, nhan vien than thien va vui ve.Bua sang buffet it lua chon. Yen tinh, thoai mai. Vi tri khach san tot, ngay khu pho co tien loi cho viec an uong, dao pho , mua hang luu niem. Xung quanh khach san nhieu hang quan an uong voi nhieu lua chon. Lan sau ra ha noi toi se chon khach san nay nua. Cam on Agoda voi phong cach chuyen nghiep va nhanh gon.', '123', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n khu phá»‘ cá»•, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, phÃ²ng Ä‘Ãºng cháº¥t lÆ°á»£ng nhÆ° giá»›i thiá»‡u,  buffet sÃ¡ng tÆ°Æ¡ng Ä‘á»‘i Ä‘a dáº¡ng vÃ  há»£p kháº©u vá»‹ ......  tÃ´i chá»‰ á»Ÿ 1 Ä‘Ãªm nhÆ°ng cÃ³ dá»‹p tÃ´i sáº½ quay trá»Ÿ láº¡i', 'We stayed here at the beginning AND end of our month in Vietnam.  It was clean and comfortable and accessible to everywhere.  Likely Mr. Thomas was the tipping point. He called us by name every time. That may seem irrelevant,  but there is something special about your name and him remembering it demonstrated care and respect. Looking for a good hotel and good price? This is it', 'The facilities & the location are outstanding.   However the staffs are what made this hotel stands out against other hotels.  They are very personable, speak perfect English & would go out of their way to help their guests.  I usually donâ€™t write reviews    However I think the staffs at the oriental central hotel deserve my standing applauds.', 'HIGHLY RECOMMENDED', 'Although itâ€™s like a boutique hotel, the hotel is very cosy and itâ€™s located in the heart of the old quarter.We were impressed by the service of the staff. Upon arrival, they spent a good half an hour serving us welcome drinks, explain the facilities of the hotel and where to go and eat around the area. They even helped us to book the tickets for the water puppet performance. When we face challenges in the room, they will help us immediately. Upon check out, they even helped us to get a taxi that charged lesser than Grab.Overall, we are very satisfied with the hotel for the rate that we paid for.', 'All the staff we met were so friendly and helpful.  From the manager Thomas to the waitress Isabella at the restaurant, they are so attentive and caring.  Thanks Thomas for giving us a free upgrade of our room. The breakfast is nicely done as well.  We had a great time at the hotel.', 'Hotel is located in a central location in old quarter, along a narrow street where embarking and disembarking from a bus/taxi is challenging.  Hotel staff attempt to escort guest each time they have to board transportation, but there are just too many motorbikes that from my perspective it will not always be safe for older guests who move more slowly than the hotel staff. \r\rMorning breakfast is small range, nothing impressive. Staff are polite and allow packed breakfast. \r\rBed and pillows are comfortable, but the toilet can be cleaner and less of a musky smell. Shower head height cannot be adjusted to desired height. \r\rTransport to and from hotel arranged by hotel is USD 25 a trip for 7 seater, but when i arranged it myself with Hanoi Transfer Service Company (contactable on Facebook and their website), it is more affordable at USD 18 from airport to hotel and USD 14 from hotel to airport (both ways 7 seater).', 'Superb and professional handle by the team of oriental central hotel Hanoi. Keep it up.', 'Great hotel in a central location with nice rooms and excellent, friendly staff.My only comment would be that a lot of noise travels up and down the stairs during the evening/early morning which can be a bit disturbing.', 'We booked an overnight cruise in Halong Bay but unfortunately, the government cancelled all overnight cruises in the bay due to weather. We booked this room through Agoda hours before we check-in. We planned to stay at the hotel we booked after the cruise but it was full. We chose this hotel because it was near the other hotel booking we have for the next day. When we arrived they offered cold towels (Despite cold weather outside. I would have loved it if they offered cold towels instead), welcome drinks and some lotus candies while waiting for them to finish the check-in process. We were extremely happy when we saw the room. The room was not as big but it was beautiful and neat. The bathroom was big and had rainfall shower. The breakfast was also good. The staff were nice and friendly. The location was very close to tourist areas. We made the right choice booking this property.', "In the midst of Old Quarter, Hanoi. The staff fully extended their service which we can't even find in 5 hotels that I had stayed.Every staff ensure we are comfortable, assist us by confirming with our tour agent the pick-up the night before regardless if I make reservation through them.The light in my room was flicking. I reported when I go for breakfast. After breakfast, the work was done. The doormen and the receptionist walked us out, stopped the vehicles, carry our luggage to the car upon check-out. Even open and close the door of the car. Whenever we move in & out, without fail, they will greet us.From the doormen to the restaurant staff to the receptionist and maintenance, I would give them a 6-star award.", 'Pro- Staff always smile & greet. Even the doorbell boy faithfully smiles when he opens the door. The breakfast service staff are polite. This is one of the many hotels whose services is close to perfect.Cons- Only 1 lift. Lighting in front of the mirror in bathroom is dim, no light under the dressing mirror.', "Overall this is a good hotel with friendly staff.  It's clean and well kept. The breakfast is nice.  There is a buffet style breakfast but you can also order from a menu.  It includes pho and also some western options like eggs or pancakes.  The room itself was alright.  It had a window to the stairwell only, but the good thing about this is without a window to the outside, we did not hear the street noise at night.  Everything in the room was clean.  My biggest complaint is the shower gets too hot.  It's got a separate hot and cold valve and the hot valve gets burning hot.  It's not really safe.  Other than that, the beds were a bit hard, but that's common for Vietnam and a lot of Asia.  I'd probably stay here again for the pleasant staff and the nice breakfast.", 'Enjoyed our stay at Oriental Central Hanoi very much. The hospitality and sincere service by Mary and her team was top-notch - from our first encounter at check-in, during breakfast and when re-checking in after our trip to Halong Bay. The staff also provided a walking map around the Old Quarter and tips on where to visit/eat. We had a triple sharing room which was extremely comfortable, with nothing to fault. A local souvenir from the hotel at the end of our stay was a delight!', 'The location is convenient, walking distance to mini marts, cafe and local eateries. Room is clean and spacious. Staff are friendly and helpful, always give their best services. Tour arrangement is hassle free, they even sent staff to pick us up from bus station after we returned from SaPa.', "The hotel was the bright spark throughout our stay in hanoi. We stayed a total of 3 non consecutive nights. We could leave our luggage at the hotel when travelling to sapa and halong bay and our luggages would be brought up to the new room whenever we returned. Staff were very friendly and professional. It felt like a personal concierge service from them and they always made a conscious effort to make our stay as comfortable as possible. They would also enquire on our travel and tour details upon check in and help us call the relevant parties to ensure that all our bookings and pick up times were in place. Recommend to use the hotel's airport transfer as well. They even upgraded us to private car at the price of normal taxi. Would definitely return to oriental central if we were to go back to hanoi.", 'Customer service is 5 stars, they try their best to make their guests feel very welcomed. The rooms are nice, as per the pictures. Location is right in the middle of all touristy spots. Hotel breakfast is nice. Will definitely recommend this hotel to friends & family.', 'Everything is excellent with this hotel but in particular the thoughtfulness, kindness and customer focus of the staff. Nothing is too much trouble and they do it happily; from providing city info, eating and shopping advice to checking in on line.In the heart of the Old Quarter the hotel is in the middle of the tourist attractions, easy access to all shop, restaurants and coffee houses.']

ChÃºc khÃ¡ch sáº¡n hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng ngÃ y cÃ ng phÃ¡t triá»ƒn!', 'Hotel location is convenient to the lake and church and restaurants are nearby. The room is clean and complimentary water is a bonus. The staff are very accommodating and friendly. Enjoyed the breakfast. The hotel is highly recommended.', "Travelling to many southeast Asia before, this will be our first time in Vietnam.After landed in Hanoi in the pouring rain we are arrived in our hotel, greeted by the reception with smile and efficient check in so we could rest and clean up.We booked family connecting room, very clean and spacious, perfect for our family of 5.After first day browsing through Hanoi, I'm so glad we booked l'heritage diamond hotel, located in the more quiet part of hanoi but close enough to walk around and if you don't like to walk you can get a taxi everywhere for a few bucks.We went to Sapa for couple of days and followed by halong bay trip (booked though hotel) and they are kind enough to let us to use their shower facility and keep our luggage for couple of days.We would highly recommend this hotel to our friends and family and would book this hotel if we ever visiting Hanoi again.Special thanks to the ladies at the reception Sarah and Katherine, as well Tuyin, Hoang and the kind manager.", 'We were there with 2 kids. The staffs are very kind. They offer shower room for free for late flight time. I wish they will clean bathroom corner more and the they will serve a bit better quality of breakfast.', "We stayed 2 nights at this Hanoi L'Heritage hotel and overall feel satisfy of the quality of service that provided to us. Everything is fine except for 2 issues that would like to bring out, 1st is the construction site in front of the hotel, the construction workers worked till mid night made us quite noisy during our sleeping at night. The 2nd issue was the towel that provided to me was quite old. The hotel service was fantastic and good.", "The room and facilities may need an upgrade aesthetically as this isn't a brand new hotel as compared to contemporary new builds but it served the purpose of every guest well. I saw how staff really went out of their way to make guests comfortable. Would I come back for another stay? Definitely! When traveling, all we need is a place we can feel at home in and with the right people.", 'I was travelled alone for the first time in Hanoi and I decided to book  Hanoi Lheritage Diamond Hotel as my stay for 3nights in Hanoi to explore around.The location are good to everywhere and the staff are definitely friendly and helpful.They helped to book a tour and will assist me when I asking for the location that i wanna go.I book a room with balcony which i wish to see the busy Hanoi street.Although its located on the busy street but the soundproof are totally good,i can sleep well even in morning,afternoon or night.Totally recommended', 'I have stayed here 2 nights and have enjoyed it. The staff are fantastic, go up and beyond to help you. The Rooms are perfect the location is perfect middle of old quarter. Breakfast is perfect like a small buffer but they then also give you a menu to choose extra. I think if you ask for anything they will find away for you. Also offer trips and great prices to Sapa and Ha long bay. Totally worth your stay !!', "This hotel is in a very good location and the bed is wonderful, very comfortable. Rooms and Bathroom are very clean. Staff is like a family kind of friendly. Breakfast was also very nice! Overall is a 10/10 which there is nothing I didn't like.", 'We stayed here in June and were hosted very well by the staff. especially Martin. He is full of energy and his personality rubbed off on us. The hotel is in an excellent location and has great facilities. Room was spacious and breakfast was good. Wonderful view of Hanoi city. Would definitely stay here again.', 'Liked staying in this hotel and the location was nice as it was close to the Hanoi Lake']

Close to restaurants and shops. 5 minute walk to the night market. Staff were very accommodating and helpful. Itâ€™s a must stay if in Hanoi. Five stars all the way.', "Pros,- Location. Very close to convenience store, restaurant, tourist attraction, and Hoan Kiem Lake.- Beds are super comfy.- Easily accessible. - Breakfast is great. Not much variety but good enough.- Very friendly and helpful staff.- Hot powerful shower.Cons,- They move us to the sister hotel on the first night, but they move everything back to this hotel by themselves so it was all good.- The hotel is very small. the lobby and room. much smaller than I thought.- Only four working channels (CNN, MTV and some I can't remember).- Extremely complicated shower to operate.  - No parking space in front of the hotel since it is a very small street, so you have to hurry in and out of the cab.- A little pricy.", 'They tried to move us to their "sister" hotel , saying the rooms are full but after demanding refund instead, I got a room. I saw other guests coming to the hotel and being driven to another hotel in a taxi.Location is good but the first encounter left me a sour taste', 'Not very clean but excellent location! Lake view from breakfast area and a 1 minute walk from the major places of attraction in Old Quarters! Very affordable given the great location!', "The room is clean and comfortable. Great location next to Hoan Kiem lake and walking distance to many attractions. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Also nice view of the lake from breakfast lounge. I'd like to stay here again in the future.", 'We stayed here for 4nights.\rThe location is unbeatable it is 1min distance from Hoan Kiem Lake. We stayed in the Family room so the view was amazing and everything was really clean. Also, the breakfast was very delicious too.\r\rBesides, all hotel staff were extremely kind and always tried to help us during our stay. If I come back to Hanoi, I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend this hotel!', "We booked a deluxe double room but when we checked in the hotel, we were told the room was having some electrical problem. We were asked to wait or checked in to another of their sister hotel. The receptionist said not sure how long it would take to repair.  In addition, the receptionist said the room that we booked has no view but according to agoda's booking it has nice city view. Obviously the hotel has no room for us and tried to get us to stay in their sister hotel.\rWe had no choice so we checked in to their sister hotel, Splendid Star Boutique hotel. The  so-called upgraded family room was old and the bathroom was also very old. We were fully disappointed. The only good thing was the hotel staff were friendly.", 'Staff were really helpful - carried our bags, walked us personally two streets over to taxi and accommodated changes to our reservation when they could have easily said no', "Excellent value for money and good location.  Adequate breakfast.  Family suite was ok for us but I wouldn't call it spacious.  Hardly any space to unpack  luggage.  Toiletries provided but had to ask for top up of shower gel and housekeeping kept forgetting to give us 3 towels instead of 2.  Also had to ask for the complimentary bottled water almost every day.  Housekeeping only cleans the room only in the afternoon so don't expect a clean room if you go out in the morning and return before 2pm.   Noisy fan that shook so much that we kept it off.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Just remember that it is a 3 star hotel and don't expect too much.", 'The hotel was quite small and tight, but it more than made up for it by having helpful and accommodating staff, a decent and clean room, and a delicious breakfast with a beautiful scenery. The location was very central, it was right at the heart of the Old Quarter and the weekend night market.  I will not hesitate to come back here again.', "I chose this place based on the reviews but was a little disappointed. The room was quite small and the place not 'as nice' as the pictures. But if you don't mind all that, it's a GREAT location for central Hanoi. Also the breakfast is on the top floor where you get a terrific view of the lake!", 'The best things about this hotel are fast wifi, delicious buffet breakfast, cleanliness, friendly and helpful staff.The only thing we dont want is the massage in their spa.The 2 female massage therapists are not professional and dont know how to massage. They kept chattin the whole time during the massage which distracted us.']

TÃ´i sáº½ khÃ´ng trá»Ÿ láº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y má»™t láº§n nÃ o ná»¯a.', "I stayed at the Hanoian Lakeside Hotel with my husband and was very very happy with the accommodations. Rooms were very clean - the single had plenty of space. Fruit and complimentary water are provided every day, which is a nice touch. The Hoan Kiem walking street open until 11pm every weekend which was a bit irritating but the Gattner door helped and it didn't ruin my sleep. The breakfast was fantastic! The staff was super helpful. Location is good â€“ 1 min to Hoan Kiem Lake and about eight-ten minutes to the cathedral area. For as crazy as the street outside was, the hotel was always super quiet. I know there are cheaper places out there in Hanoi, but I'd totally come back here again.", "After a sleepless night on the train from Sapa, we arrived at the Hanoian Lakeside Hotel at 0500 hrs - yes at 5am ! The staff were terrific and checked us straight into a beautiful Honeymoon Room. Ultra plus, new and very clean, including all Gattner door seem so quiet and very expensive in my country, it was exactly what we needed after the train ride. Excellent full A La Carte breakfast on the 1st floor each day. The staff do hover (!) and can't do enough. Good area as well as it's close to Hoan Kiem Lake and shops.Apart from sailing on the junk ship in Halong Bay, this hotel has been the highlight of our accommodation in Viet Nam. We paid USD55 per night at the Hanoian Lakeside Hotel and that included breakfast and wireless Internet access. Good value by any standard.", 'We stayed twice for 1 night at the Hanoian Lakeside at the beginning and the end of our short holiday to Hanoi also Sapa and Ha Long. The hotel is recent and very comfortable. The personnel is very polite and very efficient. Check-in and check-out were done in minutes. The breakfast is fantastic, so is the service.Both times we got a room on the 9th floor and everything worked as it should. The room was also very quiet, a challenge when you know the traffic in Hanoi. This was definitely the best hotel during our 1 week in Vietnam and I only can recommend it.Thank you to all at Hanoian Lakeside for a great stay', 'We stayed in this hotel on 28 & 30 June 2019 and found that it was a new hotel, well-furnished and clean. The staff were courteous and the breakfast was sumptuous and very good. As with most areas of Hanoi, the surroundings are worn down buildings and the streets are dirty and full of motor bikes criss-crossing from every direction, but once inside this hotel, you will find it is a real gem - new, clean and tidy and well worth the money to stay here. We strongly recommend this hotel to all fellow travelers.', "We were seduced by the online photos and on arrival, we weren't disappointed! The hotel staff stated clearly that there was a walking street and night market start every Friday night until Sunday night so not easy to access by taxi or airport pick up and to consider this when booking (we didn't have an issue cause they send bellboy to pick us up). Staff were well trained and helpful. My boyfriend was suffering from a temperature and the flu and the staff were so helpful and sending up ginger tea to the room and making sure he was getting fresh orange juice at breakfast - it's these little things that really make a venue great! The cook to order breakfast was quality too. I think we may have been upgraded to the next level of room, but either way, the room was clean and well appointed, We came back to Hanoi after our Halong Bay cruise and easy to book direct at the reception, otherwise we would have stayed here again. It's smack bang in the middle of the busy part of the old quarter.", 'Myself and my wife rarely write reviews but we had to make an exception on this occasion. Customer service/staff - absolutely fantastic customer service. Nothing a problem. Greeted us every time we left and entered the hotel. Showed a lot of interest in what we were doing and gave us tips for things to do in Hanoi. Justin always here, very well respected - we could see why this is ! Location - couldnâ€™t have been better. Right in the heart of the old quarter, which means all the tours will collect you from the hotel . Room - small but perfectly formed. Great shower and lovely decor  . Breakfast - great choice of things to eat and will cook extra things at your request. All in all, a great place that I would recommend to anyone visiting Hanoi. Such good value. The hotel is brand new and my hope is that the staff stay as customer focused and continue to stand out from the crowd. Thank you Hanoian', 'Brand new hotel . Staff is extremely attentive and helpful . They constantly go above and beyond to make sure you are taken care of in every way possible. The rooms are nice and new and the location is fantastic. Also, I could not say the breakfast area is fancy but the Beef pho served at breakfast is particularly delicious, and I must have tried about 10 different places in Hanoi', 'My wife and I have been visiting Hanoi a hundred time until now. We have stayed in 5 different hotels just this year in Hanoi. We truely think the service and breakfast at Hanoian Lakeside are the BEST we have ever had in its class. Many hotels in Hanoi have very excellent services but this hotel trumps them all. From the moment you step in the hotel, you feel you are in good hand. Everyone from doorman to receptionist to manager, they all carry a smile to greet you. The hotel provides you snack and drinks while you are waiting for room key. Manager come to brief you about the hotel and help you with any issues or questions you have. You can tell they do it not because it is their job, they are proud of their services and the hotel they work for. Hotel is brand new, Only open for 1 weeks. Breakfast has awesome selections, big A La Carte menu. I highly recommend this hotel to everyone. Thank you Justin and your staff for your wonderful hospitality !', 'We are very pleased with everything this hotel offers. The service from all the staffs are beyond expectation. They will do everything to accommodate you. We booked Halong Bay tour through this hotel as well and it absolutely one of the must see in Vietnam, price offer also good. The room is very big with nice balcony. Big comfortable bed. The breakfast is super. You can order Pho as well. Hotel is close to the lake. Plenty of restaurant, cafe, spa and everything you need are within reach. Highly recommended for any tourist.', "I have visited Hanoi many time as well as Hanoian Hotel Group, this time I was invited to stay at their newest collection name Hanoian Lakeside Hotel and this hotel can't be beat for value, style, and great staff. This trip I was travelling with my fiance, and the hotel gave us the special room on level 6 which amazing Hoan Kiem Lake view and quiet. The entire reception staff, especially Cuc, were super helpful, she asked me how was my slept? How was breakfast even order Grab and made booking tours, transportation, and anything else we needed super easy. You can't beat the hotel location--just south of the more hectic old streets, 100m to the lake, easy for taxi drivers to find, great shopping and food. We'll definitely be back!"]

Staff were friendly and efficient. Didnâ€™t eat the breakfast so canâ€™t comment but it smelt good. Would stay again when back in Hanoi for a quick stop.', 'The location is very near the attraction place. Especially where the exciting night life starts.  Street side food and performances are just minutes walk away. Staff were friendly and helpful. They offered a map and pointed the places to visit. Being the first trip to Hanoi, that was a very attentive gesture and makes the trip pleasant. Room was cleaned daily. Safe in the room comes in handy to keep money. Although I didnâ€™t use the safe, the money was all intact.', 'We have booking via agoda.com and start communication direct to the hotel, on transportation, special requested on meal etc.Front Office staff her name is SUNDAY is very professional to accommodate with friendly warm welcome hospitalities services manner. It my first impression & satisfied trip to Hanoi.', "This is a very decent little hotel in the old historic center of Hanoi. It's really in the heart of the tourist area and it was quite cheap given that I booked only a couple day beforehand. I liked the breakfast and the staff were really friendly. The room and bathroom on the other hand could use some renovation. It still does the job, but I guess you get what you pay for. Not complaining given the price, it was impeccably clean, but a bit old.", 'The room is small but very clean. Staffs are very nice and helpful. They called taxi for us to the train station. Unfortunately, I have no comment with the breakfast because I did not stay overnight here.', "The staffs are really helpful for everything you need. Most of them also speak English pretty well, so we don't worry about poor communication. The hotel locates near night market and their traditional market-Dong Xuan Market. You can go there within 2-5 minutes by walking. It's pretty convenient for tourist to visit the main street around touristy zone.", 'Was there as a solo traveller. Located near a lot of local street food at night and a local 7-11 nearby. Aircon is cold enuff to hide from the humid and rainy weather. Reception was knowleadgeable on nearby sights and average price for backpack, raincoat etc. Very helpful to help me order Bahn mi to hotel in the pouring rain! Breakfast was ala carte order that arrives fresh. Overall, I will stay there again. :)', 'Awsum staff, 10 out of 10', "The rooms were spacious for one, with basic amenities all covered including toiletries and hairdryer. Located on a smaller street, you can pass it without realising. Position is awesome at night with street food and small shops selling local goodies in the day. Staff were exceptional to give me recommendation on where to go in the crazy weather, and Hanoi's signature finds. They totally made my stay enjoyable, all thanks to Anna and Alice! Thumbs up!", "Good service{Sunday} & all staff, clean room, n nice hot breakfast I like their French toast with cinnamon.. Don't eat at the duck shop opposite the hotel.. Is very expensive street food. 200k for 1 person.", 'Such a nice hotel in Old Quater, Hanoi. Just a walking distance to Dong Xuan market, night market and Hoan Kiem lake. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Clean room. Aircond, tv, hot shower etc are working well. Wifi is good.  Whatelse you need with the price they offer ? I will definitely stay in this hotel next time.', 'Trust the â€œholidayâ€ chain. They always do more than average. The facilities are little old but the hotel is very very clean. The staffs are so kind very helpful smiling all the time. With the good price such a nice hotel.', "I fell in love with the staff of Hanoi Holiday Diamond Hotel. They are very friendly, helpful, no request is too much, their service is always with a smile.You can't go wrong if you choose this hotel in your stay in Hanoi. Wished we could hung out longer. I've stayed in much higher rated hotels but the service in this hotel tops it all. Great job, you guys! Keep it up!", 'The staff here was really friendly ans even invited me for a drink with them after their shift at the hotel kitchen with other guests.  Rooms are equipped with desktops so its pretty good to do research while over there for your nexr destination.', 'Great, We stayed there 3 times over our week in Hanoi. Each time was great. Staff were very helpful each time. Rooms were always clean, We stayed in 2 room types. So great when we got back early after Sapa trip 5am with a room to go back to, Breakfast was good. Held luggage each time we went away.Location was central/']

From the room space to the consistent shower temperature to the friendly and forth-coming staff. everything was spot on! Should have been a 5 star hotel. The price is good! The location is perfect! The breakfast was hot and prepared when you ordered. Aced my expectations. Bed was comfortable. Upon arrival, they gave us drinks and fruits. The room was decorated beautifully. All the staff greeted as every time we walked past them. Everyone was full of smiles and willing to help.', "We had few nights here and liked this hotel. It's about a 10-15 minute walk to Hoan Kiem Lake and all the nightlife. The hotel is tucked away in a quiet area but this doesn't detract from the quality. The room was light,  and filled with fantastic furniture. There was a mini bar and kettle etc; the bathroom was stocked with a wide range of toiletteries and the beds were very comfortable. Breakfast was served in the dining room/bar area and was very pleasant. It is mostly geared to the VietNam tourist - breads, cold meats, fruit, eggs, bacon etc - but there was also a small selection of local dishes together with coffee and fruit juices. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and seemed genuinely pleased that we had chosen their hotel.", 'Really great hotel in a perfect location. The rooms are a good size and clean. Sáº½ quay láº¡i má»—i khi cÃ³ dá»‹p.', 'good', "The Poppy Villa is a lovely boutique hotel 5 mins walk from the Vincom Centre and 20 mins walk from the old town. There's plenty of places to eat nearby and many young Hanoian fashion designer-maker shops. There's also a lake 10 mins walk away. PhÃ²ng hÆ¡i nhá», nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh', 'Dá»‹ch vá»¥ tá»‘t gáº§n khu trung tÃ¢m mua bÃ¡n giáº£i trÃ­ vÃ  gáº§n cÃ¡c Ä‘á»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm du lá»‹ch.di chuyá»ƒn thuáº­n lá»£i', 'Vá»‹ trÃ­ thuáº­n lá»£i cho cÃ´ng viá»‡c , phÃ²ng á»‘c khÃ´ng Ä‘Ãºng nhÆ° quáº£ng cÃ¡o , tiá»‡n nghi kÃ©m , khÃ´ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c sáº¡ch sáº½ , nhÃ¢n viÃªn phá»¥c vá»¥ tá»‘t , giÃ¡ tiá»n cao so vá»›i cÃ¡c khÃ¡ch sáº¡n khÃ¡c vá»›i tiÃªu chuáº©n tá»‘t hÆ¡n', 'sach se, vi tri tot', 'Vá»‹ trÃ­ thuáº­n tiá»‡n, phÃ²ng gá»n gÃ ng sáº¡ch sáº½', 'ÄÃ¡ng Ä‘á»ƒ á»Ÿ', 'Be boi hong , phong qua nho . Gia ca ko hop li voi khach san .', "Great place, fantastic location in the old town, and such great staff, good food and a shopping mall directly opposite the front door. I'm going to stay here every time I come back on business for the next 2 years, or longer.", 'The hotel is a bit expensive compared to many hotels in the Hoan Kiem area but the free upgrade to an apartment room more than made up for that.  The hotel is in a good location for the Hai Ba Trung district, convenient to the Vin Com shopping centre and with good connections for buses and taxis.  Also lots of restaurants nearby.', 'I was on the fourth floor where there was supposed to be wifi, but the signal was poor and non existent after 11pm until about 6am the following morning. I tried running a bath but the water was luke warm at best. I tried to order from the in room dining menu only to be told that the most basic item I ordered which was the hamburger was not available.Reception staff were great though and spoke great English', 'I had another nice stay here. Yes the furniture is old fashioned but i think its meant to be, its quite comfortable and the shower was really nice and hot.Note to the owner though, what a great pool on the rooftop but its empty with plants in it. It would be awesome if it was working. Also I was my way to the airport when my taxi got a call to come back to the airport, just 5 mins away from the hotel really. So, thinking I had left something behind, we headed back to be confronted with a piece of paper to sigh. Welcome to Vietnam! The staff were great though!', "The Eden is a comfortable mid-range (I'd say 3-star) hotel, albeit with rather old-fashioned decor. My room was large and well-maintained, although a bit gloomy. Location is convenient, in a business district a little outside the main tourist area, but with many good places to eat near the hotel. Excellent Wi-Fi connection, and a room-safe large enough to take a laptop. Breakfast was OK, with fresh fruit, and they are willing to cook you fresh eggs or Vietnamese noodle soup. The staff were very obliging, and made one's stay pleasant. I would definitely go there again.", "The stay was pleasant.The hotel is not luxury but comfortable.The best thing is the location. It's just next to the main shopping centre, Vincom Centre. Lot of restaurants nearby. Taxi is easy to get.So, if you are on a business trip on a budget and want convenience, this seem to be a good choice. Price wise, compared to the hotels of the same category in the same area, this is a little more expensive.", 'The Eden hotel is a pleasnt, well-kept hotel within walking distance of the main tourist area in Ha Noi. The rooms are quiet, clean and comfortable. The staff were friendly and helpful. They kindly contacted the hotel in Hue where we previoulsy stayed and arranged for some valuables my sister had left in the safe in her room to be sent on to her in Ha Noi. A member of the front desk staff very kindly arranged a car and, on her day off, acted as a guide to take us around the sights in Ha Noi. we were very grateful to her for her kindness.']

The service was also very good. I would stay here again.', 'A great place to stay for a couple days and enjoy the beauty of Hanoi. the location is superb, near the Hoan Kiem lake, lots of places near by within walking to go eat, and the staff are so friendly and speaking very clear English. Buffet breakfast is ok, there is an omelette station, great coffee and lots of fruit, hot dishes and breads pastries.', "The hotel was in a fantastic location, hotel room was great and good breakfasts. On our last day they stored our luggage as we had a late night flight. Sorted out our taxi back to the airport and offered us a shower just before the taxi arrived so we could freshen up for our long journey home. The lady was super lovely and so caring. We would definitely stay at this hotel again if we were staying in Hanoi.", 'Good and nice location.Staff are very helpful.']

The rooms are great, beds comfortable and very clean rooms.  Breakfast in the top floor restaurant offers a great choice and the staff again are so welcoming and helpful, nothing is too much trouble and they go towards starting your day well. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting an authentic stay in Hanoi,  the spa also offers great value services, the 1 hour foot massage after a long day of sightseeing is amazing!', "The staff were SO kind! Loved the top level restaurant and breakfast - great fresh juice! The rooms were definitely dated, but that didn't bother us too much. There was a slight smell of smoke in one of our rooms as well. The showers are upgraded and nice!  Right in the old quarter, walking distance to the lake, popular places to eat authentic food, and other attractions. Loved the easy access!", 'This hotel is located in the heart of the old quarter. The staff were very attentive and did their best to make our stay comfortable. Daily fruit basket and tasty breakfast. The beef pho was amazing with the broth full of flavour. A bonus of a free afternoon tea was great also. An excellent laundry service called worldwash 2 was 2 shops down. We would recommend this hotel and would stay here again.', 'Good and convenient  location with many eating places nearby, and only a short walk to Dong Xuan wholesale market.Very friendly staff from the hotel.  Rooms are big and comfortable and remarkably clean. Great breakfast served at the 8th floor.  We could see their efforts to vary the asian part of the menu, offering different style of Asian dishes each day., while the American breakfast is quite standard though (salad, bread, bacon & ham, pancakes, butter cakes, etc.).Good massage services provided by the hotel.  Guests enjoyed 30% off the published prices which are really a good deal not to miss.Overall we enjoyed our 3 nights stay in this little gem hotel in Hanoi.', "this is an extension as ww stayed an extra night.. can't say enough nice things about this lovely hotel and its amazing staff.", 'When I checked in, the lady staff was really nice and helpful, unfortunately I forgotten her name if not I would have given her a recommendation. Because of staff like that makes the hotel a wonderful place to stay. Location is near the night market place and also walkable distance from the local market.', '8-10 mins walking distance to night market and shopping zone. Good English speaking staff and all staff are friendly and provide good knowledge of tour advise. They also provide service to arrange tour to Halong Bay or Sapa which make ur life easier.', 'Agoda give information of the price ! We booked family room which stated in Agoda good for 4 adults with 1 double bed & 1 single bed . However we will told by receptionist we have requested for extra bed since we are 4 peoples in a room and there is an extra charge for the extra bed like SGD $30 per night . So Agoda please provide correct information! The hotel staffs were very friendly and helpful , we were served with welcome juice and hot towel upon arrival. The cleanliness of the hotel was superb and the location was not as noisy as some other hotel . The breakfast buffet spread reasonable and you can order eggs and beef / chicken noodle soup . The hotel is very close to the local market and night market especially Fri to Sun . Overall we would recommend this hotel to everyone because the Font Desk Manager ( Male ) and his team ensure you will get the best service and satisfaction! Bravo to Serene Boutique Hotel & Spa for accommodating us.', 'Hotel staff were very friendly and polite. The manager Jenny even made an effort to remember my name and attended to our enquiries promptly. We loved the daily complimentary fruits and were surprised to see ear plugs provided in our rooms. The service was beyond what we expected for a boutique hotel.', "Service was superb. We had all the information we need from Jenny. The spa stayed open for us because we arrived late in Hanoi.  It's in the middle of the old quarters so a lot to see. Will come back again."]

address: 67 Hang Bo, Hoan Kiem , Hanoi, Phá»‘ Cá»•, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam, 10000
reviews: ['PhÃ²ng hÆ¡i nhá» nhÆ°ng á»Ÿ phá»‘ cá»• nÃªn ko váº¥n Ä‘á». NhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh , dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng. Lá»±a chá»n cá»§a mÃ¬nh má»—i khi vá» Hn chÆ¡i.', 'PhÃ²ng sáº¡ch sáº½. áº¤m cÃºng,tivi hiá»‡n Ä‘áº¡iGáº§n trung tÃ¢m, cÃ¡c quÃ¡n Äƒn ngon xung quanh Ä‘i bá»™ máº¥y mÃ©t lÃ  tá»›i', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n gáº§n ngay Há»“ GÆ°Æ¡m vÃ  phá»‘ cá»• thuáº­n tiá»‡n cho viá»‡c Ä‘i tham quan. KhÃ¡ hÃ i long.', "I am not very sure about this hotel. I booked a superior room in this hotel in May, 2 weeks before my actual visit on June 9.  Upon our arrival, unfortunately somehow all the room were full booked, hence we got transferred to another hotel under the same management, Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond. It was a 4 star hotel, and we got room upgrade from superior to deluxe. Oh, and the management managed our transfer from Luxury Old Quarter to Hanoi L'Heritage Diamond, so I think all were good, though I can't say anything about the services and room conditions in Luxury Old Quarter Hotel.", 'Great accoms. Located in the midst of the action at the old quarter. Hotel was clean and equipped with all the necessary amenities, including a smart TV perfect for night entertainment. Highly recommend this place!', 'We love our stay with Luxury Old Quarter Hotel. They gave us a room at the back of the hotel that has no window, but it was great because we finally had a good night of uninterrupted sleep. It can be difficult to escape from the relentless noise of traffic and people in the Old Quarter. Great service, smiles from service staff, spotless rooms, comfortable beds, high-quality sheets and duvet, good breakfast, excellent location, free wifi! Thank you!', 'The hotel is nice . Silent . The location is good. There are many local restaurants there. Hotel food is great. Yummy. There are many local shop to sit and eat there .', "The bell hop at this hotel has the biggest smile in SE Asia! What a lovely welcome from him and all the staff.  Luxury Old Quarter is tucked down one of the Old Quarter's MANY narrow winding streets.  Sidewalks are parking spaces for motorbikes, so walk carefully and keep your arms by your sides...Room was small and narrow, but very comfortable, with extra pillows and washcloths provided, as well as a big enough glass to pour a cold Sai Gon beer into.  Breakfast buffet was in the mezzanine, again, not much space, but comfortable and generous.Would recommend.", 'Thoughtful staff make a very nice Birthday Decor in our room on my request.  Very friendly staff and can speaks very good English. Love the strategic location of the hotel, just walking distance to the weekend night market. Lots of eateries around the hotel.', 'We stayed 3 nights. Small hotel but big on service! Staff was friendly, polite and helpful. Directed us to currency exchange at nearby bank for better rate than at hotel. Also patient  in giving directions. Location was central but not messily congested street -short walking distance to lake and night market. Corner room was big and clean: beds were comfortable. Everything was just GREAT.', 'Fantastic location, decent sized clean room, and staff were also great! Only the breakfast selection isnâ€™t great, and took quite a bit of time to get our orders. Otherwise good value-for-money place to stay in!', 'I booked a superior twins room but when getting confirmation, the hotel staff asked me for extra charge if I want a twins room b/c they just offerred double bed. I was unhappy with that b/c i was not informed in advance before booking. Then they offered us with an upgrade from superior to deluxe room with either twins or double bed at my discretion. Really good service. The only downside is that the aroma in the room was so strong that made me feel headache. I prefer the milder aroma.', "A most pleasant treat.  Very good, very well run, delightful hotel, at a great price, in a great location, with very good breakfast, and wonderful staff. What's not to like??Nancy, the night front desk manager/concierge was particularly amazing. Helpful, engaging, full of good recommendations, and overall tips. She made the stay particularly memorable.", 'My husband and I stayed in this hotel for just one night on the way to Halong Bay . The staff was extremely friendly, calm and helpful!  the hotel reception welcomes you at the door with a welcome tea and Vietnamese candies, and personally guides you to the room to explain all details for you. So friendly!! The room has a fresh fruit basket, and complimentary goods. The rooms: the beds are very comfortable, the rooms are quiet, the internet works great, the rooms are extremely clean and everything is new. Nice view of the streets from the room. Bathrooms are very clean. Breakfast included: the breakfast buffet is located on the fist floor. Thank you!', 'It stays in the old quarter.Easy to go around! Staffs are so friendly! The room in the old quarter -like most the hotel in there - are small but the facilities are good! I like the ways the served by the staffs!', 'Hotel staff was very accommodating and friendly. Our room was huge and absolutely beautiful. The hotel is located in a very convenient location where every restaurant and sights are from walking distance. Would recommend !', 'We booked trip to Ninh Binh that was great. Tour guide was helpful and driver was also nice. They communicated with us through phone number once we booked a room and explained us lots of useful info about that. You should contact them and book any trip in advance to get more discount for Early Booking. Thank you all !', 'The rooms here are superior to competitors in the area. I have stayed at 3 other hotels in Hanoi and this is the best. The rooms are immaculate and modern, with sumptuous design and lighting. The staff here really make all the difference. They go way out of their way to make your stay special! . I stayed here 3 nights and would definitely stay again.', 'We stay here recently for 2 nights and it was amazing . The staff couldnâ€™t be more friendly and helpful ..the rooms are clean and nicely decorated ..itâ€™s located right in the old quarter so you step out and can easily explore Hanoi The staff were the highlight of our staff and were great with helping us book various things throughout our stay Will definitely stay again', 'Staff were genuinely friendly and helpful, and would help book tours if needed. The rooms were relatively spacious with sizable beds and good amenities. Location was strategic and within walking distances to eateries and shopping in the Old Quarter.']

Äá»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng nghÃ¨o nÃ n khÃ´ng xá»©ng vá»›i KS 3 sao mÃ¬nh Ä‘Ã£ tá»«ng á»Ÿ', 'vá»‹ trÃ­ ráº¥t thuáº­n tiá»‡n Ä‘i láº¡i PhÃ²ng sáº¡ch sáº½ Nháº­n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº¡ch sáº½, nhÃ¢n viÃªn dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng, nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh.', 'The hotel is clean, friendly staff and special that location is at center... 5 munites walking to Hoan Kiem lake, nearby some visit places at Ha Noi center, easy finding the local foods around the hotel, more convenient of bus station is opposite the hotel... from here can take the bus to go directly to the airport.', 'Staff is friendly and very help full every thing. I check in at 4.30am but she still stand by on the reception. Staff from this hotel make me impressed Vietnam people. I will come back to this hotel again and recommended.All design and service is in standard. but should prepare the breakfast system or planing because is too small for buffet space.', 'Breakfast is good.', 'Breakfast is good.', 'Breakfast is good.', 'I booked 2 night stay in a deluxe suite.  The guests above wore heels and dress shoes. I could hear them walk around all night. Chatting loudly till 2am.  The staff would not do anything to help other than talk to the guests.  It did nothing, the guests continued to be loud.   I had to ask to check out and leave this hotel. I need my sleep.  I stayed at 3 other hotels in Hanoi, old quarter and never had problems.  This was a nightmare!', 'Bathroom missed a ventilation fan. Damaged switch on side bed wall need to be fixed. Missed a blanket on one of the bed spoiled images of carefulness. All the rest are GOOD.... Will definitely recommend to my friends.', 'We arrived in the early morning hours by night bus in Hanoi and could let out luggage at the hotel before the check in around lunch. We were welcomed heartly and the rooms are great and comfortable. If we come back to Hanoi we will book the Elpis grand hotel again.', "Out of the 3 hotels i've stayed at this trip, Hanoi Elpis Grand was the best stay! Room was clean and well designed! There were 2 pillows per guest which was awesome.Staff were helpful and friendly and the free breakfast was more than sufficient to start the day.", 'The hotel is new. Staff very friendlyThe room very clean. Recommended to stay.', 'Had a great stay at hanoi elpis grand hotel. The staff were very helpful in attending to our needs.', 'The staff at this hotel were the nicest. Very helpful kind and genuinely wanted to talk to you and find out more about you. They welcomed me back every time even though I had checked out and was either heading on a tour or waiting to get the night train to sapa. The hotel is clean and in a good location. During the stay other guests were very noisy and talking on their mobile phones in the corridor in the morning and late evenings mainly because wifi was weak in the rooms. The hotel is small but after all Hanoi is very busy city with alot of small hotels.', 'We absolutely loved our stay here! The hotel has just been renovated new and impressively well managed with very friendly and helpful staff (also arranging airport transfers and a great day trip to Ha Long Bay). The location is excellent (everything in walking distance), the interior design is wonderful, everything is super clean, beds are very comfortable, and we enjoyed the good breakfast with a view over Hanoi. We can definitely recommend this place and will come back!', 'We stayed for 2 nights at Hanoi Elpis Grand.Hotel has just been renovated from new team.Hotel located inside Hanoi Old quarter with good location near Hoan kiem Lake and main attractions.The room is big and super clean,we had upgraded to Big room with balcony with amazing bed .Breakfast is fresh with lot of choices.Hotel provided us tour package for a week amazing too! Highly recommend for Hanoi Elpis Grand Hotel and we will come back for sure!']

reviews: ['Arrived late, left early.Hot water pretty sparse at 10.00 pmTaxis struggled with location (same when we stayed next door at BlueBiz)Definitely better than BlueBiz.', 'Reception is very kind.', 'Suji hotel is within walking distance to the Garden and Vincom shopping mall. Hotel staff is a plus. hotel name: KhÃ¡ch Sáº¡n & Spa Alisa (Alisa Hotel & Spa)
address: SÃ´ 9, HÃ ng VÃ´i, Cáº¡nh Há»“ HoÃ n Kiáº¿m, Quáº­n HoÃ n Kiáº¿m, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam
reviews: ['KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº¡ch sáº½, nhÃ¢n viÃªn ráº¥t nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, hÆ°á»›ng dáº«n chu Ä‘Ã¡o. Gáº§n sÃ¡t ngay bá» há»“, thuáº­n lá»£i cho Ä‘i dáº¡o phá»‘ cá»•.', 'Staff and very nice and friendly. Rooms could be cleaner esp bathroom, mirrors and glass. The bathroom floor was a bit slimy. Room smells old. Lifts could be cleaner. Reception downstairs was nice. Food was good.', 'Staff and very nice and friendly. Rooms could be cleaner esp bathroom, mirrors and glass. The bathroom floor was a bit slimy. Room smells old. Lifts could be cleaner. Reception downstairs was nice. Food was good.', "My family has spent 1 night at hotel with great experience and unforget memories.The ALISA hotel and spa is located nearly Hoan Kiem lake with 3-4 mins by walk, it's a heart area of Hanoi old quarter with alot thing you should to do and enjoyable.The hotel staffs such as bell boy and receiptionist are friendly, helpful to willing to help the guest, support my family so much.One more point of that, this is one of rarely hotels in old quarter has the lift.", "Everything is perfect except for the toilet that smells. Might be something with its piping system. They put lemongrass to cover the smell but it doesn't last long. Breakfast is decent with various type of fruits, eggs and pho. The staffs at the reception are really helpful and always greet us with smiling face. They even managed to get us a 7 seaters taxi with a price cheaper than using the Grabcar app. Highly recommended this hotel for their great staffs! Will be back again!", 'From the moment we stepped in and weâ€™re ushered to the lounge to enjoy our welcome drinks, I knew we would have a great stay. Ms. Moon went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and helped with booking tours at a great rate! Would love to give more stars if possible. Would recommend this hotel to anyone!', 'Alisa Hotel is a great place and very value-for-money. John, the receptionist was very friendly and gave me a map highlighting the places I should visit. Breakfast spread was good and fresh. Staff were very friendly, including Moon, their customer service manager. Will definitely come back to visit again :)', 'From the moment i showed up at this perfectly located, pristine little hotel, i was completely taken care of.  The concierge sat in the sofa with me while i had my welcome tea and she went over my needs for the stay.  They then booked everything, and at a great rate.  This special little hotel was womderful.', 'Great location', 'Great! Location', 'Warm welcome by the staff. Around 5 to 10mins walk to old quarters. Surrounded by good foods.', "hiI wrote an email on 2 weeks ago..saying that I am unable to come to stay on one of the day and would like to move the day to future day but until now, no one bother to reply me.just need to reply me whether able to change my date or not, that's simply but no one care to reply me.", 'Price is reasonable, location is perfect, hotel is high class, room is spacious and everything you need are inside, room is also very clean, staff are all friendly. Staff help us when crossing busy road, and also prepare breakfast for all of us(13 pax) when we need to check out hotel by 6am. Super nice hotel. Highly recommended this hotel if you want to stay near to old quarters.', 'Rooms were not very clean, blanket were yellowish and air-conditioning not working well especially with weather at 38Â°c. But, staffs were friendly and helpful. Did massage twice, first time the masseuses seem to be professionals. However on the second time, the masseuses seem to be ad hoc called in to fulfill the part. Was put off by the masseuses asking for tips and giving judgemental expression upon seeing the amount given. Could be the culture of hanoi citizens. Will not recommend getting massage here.', 'I request many things to Ms. Moon who is manager of the Alisa Resort & Spa. She always responsed kindly with good suggestion. I reserved cruise tour and car rent by Ms. Moon. It is helpful and she suggested excellent offer with a amazing price. I will use Alisa Resort and Spa when I visit to hanoi afterward because of Ms. Moon.', 'good location, exceptional interior design, good breasfast, staff was very helpful to the point as if they want to carry us going to our tour bus ğŸ¤— they also arranged our tours except we booked for the room with tub, and gave us only with showers, transfer us only on our last day', 'Hotel is strategically located at  the Old Quarters area. About 5 minutes walking distance to Hoan Kiem Lake. The staffs of Alisa are warm hearted and provide good service. Look out for Miss Moon as she is very resourceful and can provide lots of recommended spots for food and shopping', 'This this a newer hotel and it was one of the few that could accommodate my family of 4 in the same room, on the mordern side, reasonably priced and close walking distance to the hustle and bustle of Hanoi. We booked our tour to Ha Long bay directly with the reception and they gave us 2  tour options to to choose from which was great. Our tour guide Tam was fantastic and we would absolutely love to take a tour with him again in the future. He made the tour a very memorable and fun experience! Overall I would recommend this hotel. Staff is very polite and soft spoken. We stayed for an extra night after our return of Sapa before flying home.', 'I liked the buffet. Good choice of options. John was great and so was  young Moon. They gave me good directions for eating and enterainment. They cleaned my room.everyday.  the only con was wifi sometimes was not great.', "worst experience in Hanoi. it should be let guests stay there! before it was renovated, towels got holes, bathroom has mold. staff to'd us not to write review because they are going to renovate the hotel! they should not accept any booking with that condition. this hotel ruins my impression with hanoi"]

Location is right at the center of the tourist area. I will DEFINITELY go back and stay again here. Kudos to the staff ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»', 'Highly recommended! Itâ€™s a nice hotel. Clean, beautiful and have the best staffs.  All the staff are friendly and always smile. Especially Ms.Jasmine, she is so kind and always helpful. I stay there for 4 nights, if I come back to Hanoi, Iâ€™ll choose Hanoi emerald waters hotel trendy again.', 'I stayed here In between 3 day excursions for a total of 7 nights. My room for the first 3 nights was smaller than I expected for a deluxe double, but it was clean, quiet and the bed was quite comfy. I was upgraded to a lovely large room on my second 3 night stay.  The staff is amazing. When I returned for my second stay they were so excited to see me you would have thought I was long lost family. Everyone from the doorman to the reception staff to the concierge and manager ALL bend over backwards to ensure you have a great stay.  They booked a Hanoi city tour with car, driver and separate English-speaking guide who offered my friend and I a separate motorbike tour of farmlands just outside the city after the first tour ended that turned out to be so much fun!  They recommended fabulous vegetarian and non vegetarian restaurants and always greeted us so warmly whenever we returned to the hotel.  The doorman even walked us to our spa appointments! I highly recommend this hotel!', 'We were upgraded to city view room. Room size is similar to the one we booked. The room can be quite noisy during day time. Toliet is a bit small. Äá»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng nghÃ¨o nÃ n khÃ´ng xá»©ng vá»›i KS 3 sao mÃ¬nh Ä‘Ã£ tá»«ng á»Ÿ', 'vá»‹ trÃ­ ráº¥t thuáº­n tiá»‡n Ä‘i láº¡i PhÃ²ng sáº¡ch sáº½ Nháº­n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº¡ch sáº½, nhÃ¢n viÃªn dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng, nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh.', 'The hotel is clean, friendly staff and special that location is at center... 5 munites walking to Hoan Kiem lake, nearby some visit places at Ha Noi center, easy finding the local foods around the hotel, more convenient of bus station is opposite the hotel... from here can take the bus to go directly to the airport.', 'Staff is friendly and very help full every thing. I check in at 4.30am but she still stand by on the reception. Staff from this hotel make me impressed Vietnam people. I will come back to this hotel again and recommended.All design and service is in standard. but should prepare the breakfast system or planing because is too small for buffet space.', 'Breakfast is good.', 'Breakfast is good.', 'Breakfast is good.', 'I booked 2 night stay in a deluxe suite.  The guests above wore heels and dress shoes. I could hear them walk around all night. Chatting loudly till 2am.  The staff would not do anything to help other than talk to the guests.  It did nothing, the guests continued to be loud.   I had to ask to check out and leave this hotel. I need my sleep.  I stayed at 3 other hotels in Hanoi, old quarter and never had problems.  This was a nightmare!', 'Bathroom missed a ventilation fan. Damaged switch on side bed wall need to be fixed. Missed a blanket on one of the bed spoiled images of carefulness. All the rest are GOOD.... Will definitely recommend to my friends.', 'We arrived in the early morning hours by night bus in Hanoi and could let out luggage at the hotel before the check in around lunch. We were welcomed heartly and the rooms are great and comfortable. If we come back to Hanoi we will book the Elpis grand hotel again.', "Out of the 3 hotels i've stayed at this trip, Hanoi Elpis Grand was the best stay! Room was clean and well designed! There were 2 pillows per guest which was awesome.Staff were helpful and friendly and the free breakfast was more than sufficient to start the day.", 'The hotel is new. Staff very friendlyThe room very clean. Recommended to stay.', 'Had a great stay at hanoi elpis grand hotel. The staff were very helpful in attending to our needs.', 'The staff at this hotel were the nicest. Very helpful kind and genuinely wanted to talk to you and find out more about you. They welcomed me back every time even though I had checked out and was either heading on a tour or waiting to get the night train to sapa. The hotel is clean and in a good location. During the stay other guests were very noisy and talking on their mobile phones in the corridor in the morning and late evenings mainly because wifi was weak in the rooms. The hotel is small but after all Hanoi is very busy city with alot of small hotels.', 'We absolutely loved our stay here! The hotel has just been renovated new and impressively well managed with very friendly and helpful staff (also arranging airport transfers and a great day trip to Ha Long Bay). The location is excellent (everything in walking distance), the interior design is wonderful, everything is super clean, beds are very comfortable, and we enjoyed the good breakfast with a view over Hanoi. We can definitely recommend this place and will come back!', 'We stayed for 2 nights at Hanoi Elpis Grand.Hotel has just been renovated from new team.Hotel located inside Hanoi Old quarter with good location near Hoan kiem Lake and main attractions.The room is big and super clean,we had upgraded to Big room with balcony with amazing bed .Breakfast is fresh with lot of choices.Hotel provided us tour package for a week amazing too! Highly recommend for Hanoi Elpis Grand Hotel and we will come back for sure!']
