Hehe', 'The hotel replace my booking room with bad room. There is not clean,no tissue soap shampoo etc...And wrote a mail to me said they will upgrade my room,but got nothing.When i complain to Agoda,the hotel said I had check the room mean I accept it.But the true is they wrote me the letter and not answer my question till midnight.Must be carefull for this hotel.', 'The hotel (split across 3 buildings a few meters from each other) is in an ideal location for the old town and Hoan Keim lake, so that you are only a couple of minutes walk away from plenty of restaurants, tourist sites etc.Our "Superior room" was clean, had plenty of space, desk, good internet connection and a decent bathroom. The only comment I would make is that if you find stairs difficult, check with the hotel in advance to see if a room on a lower floor is available.Although our only dealings with the staff were on arrival/departure, the staff were helpful and friendly, with reasonable English.We would be more than happy to use this hotel again on any future visit to Hanoi.', 'Especen is a great place to start your journey in Vietnam. â€œYour home in Hanoiâ€ is their catch phrase. I pre booked my airport transport and all tours on line with Thanh. When I arrived â€œMr Einâ€ took me to the local shop to arrange a local SIM and 3G internet. A secure hotel in a central location. Good English skills ensuring no problems. But learn a few Vietnam words with the Especen staff. Iâ€™m coming back....... Yes I did have a great time.', 'No elevator in several buildings.  Check if the rooms have windows', 'Very accessible!', 'Bad location and dirty', 'We stayed in three different hotels and this place was super noisy. It is kitty corner to the church which dings every half hour. The walls and windows are also paper thin. However the staff was amazing and super accomodating. They also have bike rentals which is nice.', 'This is a somewhat charmless hotel, but nonetheless a good value.  Everything was clean - staff is very helpful and basic comforts are met.  Nice location on a side street, so a tad quieter than the normal Hanoi location.', "We had a great stay at the hotel.the room was simple but clean,as the bathroom.we had plenty of warm water. The staff was really helpful and gave great tips. The location is central with makes it easy to get to the main interesting parts of the city.it's easy to visit by foot from there.the neighboorhood is safe.we can recommend this hotel.", 'A good choice to stay, all rooms were clean and equipped with air-con and fan. The staff was very friendly. The hotel is located near to the centre of Hanoi, you can reach most sights and great restaurants afoot.', 'Front reception make me feel unreliable', 'Good', 'The room is very spacious and the beds very comfortable. Lovely hotel!! Close to restaurants.', "good location as it's near the joseph's church. no lift but the staff will help you to carry your luggage. it looks like old room but room is still very clean", 'after being in many hotels in southeast asia i can say this is one of the best relation price and quality, good location and service.']

reviews: ['PhÃ²ng má»›i, sáº¡ch, tiá»‡n nghi, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh', 'Sáº¡ch sáº½, nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, phÃ²ng ráº¥t lÃ  tá»‘t', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n má»›i vÃ  sáº¡ch sáº½ láº¯m', 'cho hoa Ä‘iá»ƒm 10 cho cÃ´ quáº£n lÃ½ . Dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng, thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh. KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº¡ch , Ä‘á»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm ngay trung tÃ¢m , thuáº­n tiá»‡n. Sáº½ tiáº¿p tá»¥c quay láº¡i Ä‘Ã¢u vÃ o dá»‹p tá»›i.', 'Location is perfect. Staff was indeed very polite and helpful, especially Harry, thanks! Rooms are clean! Everything was great.', "We have enjoyed staying at Trang Trang Boutique Hotel. We booked connecting family suite through Agoda however when we arrived in Hotel the room was using by someone else so we have to stay a room with two double bed. I have talked to hotel manager and he said Agoda keep lowing their room rate but whatever happened between hotel and Agoda they should honor our booking. On next day we were able to move our original booking room. Overall we enjoyed our stay there. Just facility wise the ceiling is low if someone taller than 180cm they might bang their head on some part of hotel. Bathroom is small without towel rack, no soap dish but full amenities were provided(including dental kit, comb, cotton bud). Staff were very friendly and helpful. Breakfast buffet wasn't able due to corona virus. We were able to choose between sticky rice or egg ban mi and fruit. But compare with buffet it was smaller portion and simplified.", "If you book at Trang Trang Boutique, make sure upon arrival that is where they put you. I was put in the Trang Trang Luxury across the road - furthest thing from luxury I've ever seen. Had I not noticed 48 hrs later, they would not have even told me the hotel I booked and prepaid for was not the one I was housed. Even once I noticed and questioned it, they still made up some rubbish just to end the conversation. The lack of care was staggering. So I was in a very substandard room with initially no hot water, a booked King bed which was a double at best and a restaurant for included bfast that didnt exist. When I asked about the bed size they said as I'm Australian, the bed just appears small. 3 nights into a 7 night stay, I checked out never to return. Woeful.", 'Staff very friendly, breakfast is wonderful and good location in Hanoi Old Quarter. Thank you TrangTrang to serve me everytime', 'Excellent service would surely recommend this hotel as the rooms are clean and service exceptional. Tracy spent over 30 minutes with agoda on the phone clarifying the hitch in my booking and Hung actually drove me back on his scooter when I was unable to get a carb back to the hotel what more can a hotel or its staff do. A big thumbs up .', 'We had a great experience here! When we arrived at the hotel the receptionist was so helpful and really nice he was really chatty and pleasant! He also gave us some background info on the hotel ! He got our laundry done for us over night even though we were a little late in giving them in ! The rooms were lovely with Netflix on the tv ! Only down side is the bathroom smelled a bit because of the sewage which is normal in Vietnam I guess breakfast was also lovely', 'nice place to stay. address: 104 Ma May, Hoang Kiem, Phá»‘ Cá»•, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam, 100000
reviews: ['PhÃ²ng má»›i, sáº¡ch, tiá»‡n nghi, nhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh', 'Sáº¡ch sáº½, nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, phÃ²ng ráº¥t lÃ  tá»‘t', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n má»›i vÃ  sáº¡ch sáº½ láº¯m', 'cho hoa Ä‘iá»ƒm 10 cho cÃ´ quáº£n lÃ½ . Dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng, thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh. KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº¡ch , Ä‘á»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm ngay trung tÃ¢m , thuáº­n tiá»‡n. Sáº½ tiáº¿p tá»¥c quay láº¡i Ä‘Ã¢u vÃ o dá»‹p tá»›i.', 'Location is perfect. Staff was indeed very polite and helpful, especially Harry, thanks! Rooms are clean! Everything was great.', "We have enjoyed staying at Trang Trang Boutique Hotel. We booked connecting family suite through Agoda however when we arrived in Hotel the room was using by someone else so we have to stay a room with two double bed. I have talked to hotel manager and he said Agoda keep lowing their room rate but whatever happened between hotel and Agoda they should honor our booking. On next day we were able to move our original booking room. Overall we enjoyed our stay there. Just facility wise the ceiling is low if someone taller than 180cm they might bang their head on some part of hotel. Bathroom is small without towel rack, no soap dish but full amenities were provided(including dental kit, comb, cotton bud). Staff were very friendly and helpful. Breakfast buffet wasn't able due to corona virus. We were able to choose between sticky rice or egg ban mi and fruit. But compare with buffet it was smaller portion and simplified.", "If you book at Trang Trang Boutique, make sure upon arrival that is where they put you. I was put in the Trang Trang Luxury across the road - furthest thing from luxury I've ever seen. Had I not noticed 48 hrs later, they would not have even told me the hotel I booked and prepaid for was not the one I was housed. Even once I noticed and questioned it, they still made up some rubbish just to end the conversation. The lack of care was staggering. So I was in a very substandard room with initially no hot water, a booked King bed which was a double at best and a restaurant for included bfast that didnt exist. When I asked about the bed size they said as I'm Australian, the bed just appears small. 3 nights into a 7 night stay, I checked out never to return. Woeful.", 'Staff very friendly, breakfast is wonderful and good location in Hanoi Old Quarter. Thank you TrangTrang to serve me everytime', 'Excellent service would surely recommend this hotel as the rooms are clean and service exceptional. Tracy spent over 30 minutes with agoda on the phone clarifying the hitch in my booking and Hung actually drove me back on his scooter when I was unable to get a carb back to the hotel what more can a hotel or its staff do. A big thumbs up .', 'We had a great experience here! When we arrived at the hotel the receptionist was so helpful and really nice he was really chatty and pleasant! He also gave us some background info on the hotel ! He got our laundry done for us over night even though we were a little late in giving them in ! The rooms were lovely with Netflix on the tv ! Only down side is the bathroom smelled a bit because of the sewage which is normal in Vietnam I guess breakfast was also lovely', 'nice place to stay. Clean room, good breakfast, helpful staff', 'No complaint', 'All is perfect, staff is helpful, location is strategically located at old town', 'No complaint, good location and important is the cleanliness and the services provided by staff', 'Location: It is strategically located within old town centre, can find many restaurant and street shopping;Cleanliness: Room although is small but is clean, I believe most of the hotels there are equally size;Staff: Mark, Harry and other staff are helpful and nice arrangement of our tourWill come back again for my next visit', 'Super Lage und sehr freundliches Personal.Top!']

Nice size comfortable room.', 'This is my 4th stay with this hotel in Hanoi, the location is perfect, the staff and in particular Anna and Emily are fantastic nothing is a problem and always have a smile, rooms are bright, clean and large, bathroom is clean and spacious with great water pressure - fantastic hotel, fantastic service', 'My wife and I were very Happy with this hotel and its very nice, kind and proffesional staff. It is very conveniently located, two minutes walking from Kiem Park, and literally surrounded by places where to eat traditional Vietnamese food', 'I really love this hotel, great value for money! If I go back to Hanoi, this will be my go-to hotel. Staff were very friendly and helpful especially Anna who welcomed us and gave us all the information we needed, with maps and events and a list of recommended restaurants.  The building and facilities are fairly new and very very clean. I really love the decor! Breakfast was also excellent with a huge selection of dishes (compared to the other hotels we stayed in)There are 2 Bella Rosas, this one which is the newer and bigger one; and Bella Rosa Hotel which is just 2 buildings away. Definitely go for this one. We had a midnight flight so we checked out at noon, left our luggage and walked around the City. When we came back they asked if we wanted to take a shower and offered us use of their facilities which was sweet.My most favorite though, would be the fact that this is VERY VERY near Hoan Kiem Lake which is the center of the City, literally 1 turn away and a 3-5 min walk', 'Satisfy with everything. The service is excellent. I am going to Halong Bay and Sapa, within this period our luggage are keep by this hotel. I am sure will recommend for my friends when they come Hanoi.', 'Room big and near from every spot in old quarter city. Would like to stay here again someday.... Thanks', 'Wifi speed must be upgraded, otherwise everything is good: friendly staff with helpful support, good location to the Lake, food places and center areas.']

Äá»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng ngon.', 'NhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, phÃ²ng sáº¡ch, gáº§n há»“ GÆ°Æ¡m.', 'NhÃ¢n viÃªn ráº¥t dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng Vá»‹ trÃ­ khu trung tÃ¢m , thuáº­n tiá»‡n Ä‘i láº¡iÄ‚n sÃ¡ng ngon, Ä‘a dáº¡ng', 'PhÃ²ng Ä‘áº¹p nhÆ°ng nhá» so vá»›i giÃ¡ tiá»n thÃ¬ chÆ°a oke, nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, wifi khÃ´ng dÃ¹ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c bÃ¡o lá»… tÃ¢n nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng cÃ³ ai giáº£i quyáº¿t Ä‘Æ°á»£c.', 'NhÃ¢n viÃªn lá»‹ch sá»±, vui váº»', 'TÃ´i Ä‘Ã¡nh giÃ¡ 5 sao', 'GiÆ°á»ng ngá»§ ráº¥t thoáº£i mÃ¡i vá»›i Ä‘á»™ cao vÃ  Ä‘á»™ cá»©ng vá»«a pháº£i, bá»¯a sÃ¡ng phong phÃº, nhÃ¢n viÃªn tuyá»‡t vá»i. Gia Ä‘Ã¬nh tÃ´i hoÃ n toÃ n hÃ i lÃ²ng vá»›i giÃ¡ tiá»n pháº£i bá» ra.', 'NhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, phÃ²g á»‘c sáº¡ch sáº½ thoáº£i mÃ¡i. láº§n sau cÃ³ Ä‘i HN láº¡i tiáº¿p tá»¥c chá»n á»Ÿ Ksan nÃ y', 'Thank you Lana and Alan (The Front Reception Manager) also the Guest Service (I am sorry for not able to recall her name) for your great hospitality. Although we have experienced a very minor issue during our stay in this hotel, but the staffs were very willing to provide second option in order to make us feel comfortable. The location is strategically located nearby to Hoan Kiem Lake. And no worries about communication problem, they are absolutely doing well on it. Really enjoy the stay. So much appreciated.', 'We enjoyed our short stay at the Babylon. Good location near restaurants, the lake, etc. and around the corner from the SaPa Express Bus office/stop. Comfortable, clean, quiet rooms and helpful staff. Recommended.', 'We stayed four nights at this wonderful place right in the heart of Hanoi.   We had my 75 year old parents in one room, and our teenage daughters and my wife and myself in the family connecting room and we all loved this place.  It was always a pleasure entering the lobby where you were treated like you were old friends.   Great information on the surrounding areas and wonderful insider tips on things to do.   The spa connected had great massages and we all had different treatments.   Breakfast was a huge spread of fresh foods of all different types from sweet to savory, and their made to order food was a nice addition.   Everything was spot on with this hotel.  We all would pick this one to return to.', "The hotel, room dÃ©cor, furniture, and overall facility needs an update from its 80's splendor.  The room while having a window - the window did not open to nothing but a publicly accessed stairwell.  The room was however clean and had all working parts.The location of the property is in the old quarter, while good for most sites to see, it may also be too noisy for some travelers and I am sure they would be able to find a better value on Airbnb.Service of the hotel was good but somewhat pushy in terms of selling spa services and tour packages.  A massage service was purchased but was not completed in the timed paid for (time was shorted; should've began as soon as the masseuse's hands touch the clients body)   There is also a fee for using credit cards for any purchases unlike many other properties. Breakfast was good but I could see how some untraveled westerners may feel the breakfast lacking western food.", 'Staff are all nice and accommodating. i like that the food during breakfast has a lot of fruits.. Only thing is the busted fridge in my room but the staff made up for it by offering to put my drinks in the kitchen fridge. THANK YOU for the wonderful birthday surprise in the hotel and for extending another surprise in the boat while im on cruise with Jade sails. you made my day special! :)', 'We loved our stay at the Hanoi Babylon Garden Hotel & Spa. The staff are helpful (very), going out of there way to make your stay pleasant, the buffet breakfast is fantastic, the location is prime - providing easy access to the old quarters, markets and sights. Would happily stay again.', 'This is a wonderful 3+ star hotel. The staff were incredibly helpful, doing all they can to help make your stay a pleasure and ensuring you get the most out of your time in Hanoi. The overall cleanliness of the hotel is very good, with standard wear for a hotel of this age. The buffet breakfast was a huge plus. Plenty of options and the ability to order eggs to your preference. Would happily stay here again.', "The hotel's hospitality, especially the manager, Jason, was five star service. Jason spoke perfect English and was extremely helpful and thorough in providing detailed information about the neighborhood and travel tips. The 2 doormen were very nice and promptly opened and closed the front doors and greeted every guest, every time. The check-in prices was delightful and personal. Upon arrival, we were escorted to a 2nd floor which appeared to be a waiting area with stylish, comfortable lounge chairs and sofas. They brought each of us fresh squeezed passion fruit drinks and a plateful of fresh cut local fruits while the front desk was photocopying our passports and completing the check-in process. We had the family penthouse suite on the top floor and it was quite spacious and perfect for our family of 4 with 2 older teen kids. The free buffet breakfast was exceptional as was the service. Although it was a buffet, a server took our orders for eggs, pancakes, pho and drinks.  Perfect!", 'Definitely the best hotel in Hanoi. I travel a lots for both leisure and business. Never experienced such a warm and genuine service till met Hanoi Babylon Garden Hotel & Spa. Special thanks to the customer service department Lana HoÃ ng, and all the staffs. I would say, Hanoi Babylon Garden Hotel & Spa is and will be my only choice for staying in Hanoi.', 'I have stayed in tenth of hotels at Hanoi. The Babylon hotel is getting a perfect 100% score for service.\r\rI consider it to at the top 2 at Hanoi, Service quality and at the top 3 in all Vietnam (again for service)']

Náº¿u ghÃ© Hn thÃ¬ tÃ´i sáº½ á»Ÿ Ä‘Ã¢y 1 láº§n ná»¯a.', 'khach san va phong oc duoc thiet ke kha de thuong va an tuong, hinh anh dang giong phong that. chat luong dich vu luon duoc dat len hang dau. neu co co hoi quay tro lai Hanoi, minh se quay lai de o.', 'Perfect location in the centre of the old quarter.  Very helpful and welcoming owners.  Small but lovely room with beautiful little balcony.  Very well maintained and decorated.  Stylish.  Comfortable.  Only negative was a flimsy shower head fitting.  Would have no hesitation recommending and look forward to staying agian myself', 'Loved the room interior design and harmonious colors. Nice balcony. The stuff were quite helpful and arranged pick up services for me and my friend even though my flight was at 4 AM and was delayed to 5 AM .', 'Upon our arrival to Centraltique, we were greeted with open arms by one of our hostess, Hannah.She pulled out a map and noted the â€œmust see and must eatâ€ places for us as we were in town for a mere 3 Days.Not only that, she even planned out a day trip for us to Ninh Binh which was brilliant! The rooms were cozy, exceptionally clean and the balcony was definitely a good place to unwind after a long day. On the following days,we also met our other hostess and host; Anne and Tony, which weâ€™re also exceptionally warm and extremely helpful along our trip, ensuring our stay was of its best and evermore. Centraltiqueâ€™s a family run homestay and they definitely made us feel like a part of their family during our time there. Highly recommend this place! Definitely my go to place when I visit Hanoi again the next time!', 'Stayed here for 2 nights, staff were very welcoming and friendly. Room was very clean, air-con was good, bed was comfy, good value for money. Everything you need is local,  Food, bars and market was about 5min walk. Street food right outside the hotel at night. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.', 'We stayed in this hotel 1 night. The area feels not as busy as the rest of Hanoi. Itâ€™s a pretty building and the rooms are really nice (with a small kitchen). Tony our host was super friendly!! We would come back again!']

hotel name: KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n Boutique Hanoi Chic (Hanoi Chic Boutique Hotel)
address: 51 - 53 BÃ¡t Sá»©, Phá»‘ Cá»•, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam, 0000
reviews: ['Nhan vien than thien, khach san o muc kha', "The best things about this hotel are definitely the location and the staff.  Since it's located right in the Old Quarter,  you'll hear the noises from the street in the morning and late at night, but nothing too crazy.  On the flip side, it's so easy to walk anywhere. The staff always made us feel welcome and they were ready to help. The room was what you'd expect from a standard hotel - the toiletries, hot water and everything is there, but the inside of the hotel doesn't look put-together. The floor in some parts of the hotel are just wooden boards, and the bathroom walls are just glass panels. It's clear that the owners had built the hotel on what is a very small piece of land, and tried maybe a little too hard to make it work/carve out as many rooms as they could.", "The service was really incredible and the location is great.  You can walk to and from many places central to Hanoi center.  I would stay there again.  The only negative would be the room for breakfast and timing.  Most people leave for tours early (between 7 and 7:30 am) but the kitchen doesn't open until 7:00 am.  There was a people jam a few times.  But if you wait a little while, there should be no problem.", 'The staff here were great and really helpful. The hotel seemed a bit older and could use some updating but was overall nice. We loved the location and it was really convenient. The breakfast was ok and the staff are so kind that it makes the place worth it!', 'This is an elegant hotel that make my trip more pleasure & convenience by staying at Hanoi Chic. Cleanliness and all facilities that required are all set in room. Especially elevators! Selections of breakfast are served. Hotels staff also very nice & helpful information. Included a very convenient location help us make an easily decision for staying here for the next visit. Highly recommended for tourists who want to stay in the center of the Old Quarter.', "This hotel looks elegant, with the bed also very big and comfortable! The bathroom comes with massage shower head though it is not very strong. I love the room very much!Second i love is the breakfast. It has a lot of varieties, besides the normal vietnam hotel's breakfast, we can have pancake, french toast, sandwich, and beef/chicken noodles upon order. There is yogurt, passion fruit, cakes n etc. I love it!", 'We had a lovely balcony which overlooked the street, great for people watching. The staff are very kind and helpful. Amazing value for money. Nice to be able to get a fresh omelette at breakfast. Cafe with great coffee next door if you are fussy like we are. 10 min walk to the lake. 5 min walk to Beer Street. 10 mins to Hanoi Train Street. Rose petals on our bed when we got there. Wonderful shower and lovely bed. Would definitely recommend to anyone.', 'Nice little hotel in the Old Town of Hanoi. Stuff is very friendly and helpful. They can organise any kind of excursion for you. They allowed us to stay longer in the hotel room to have a shower before going to the train and even accompanied us to the train station. Highly recommended!', 'It was great! Paid extra for room with balcony i wasnâ€™t in the room as much as I thought because it was so convenient and there was so much to explore but I am glad I had it but maybe wouldnâ€™t pay more again. It was the best location the beds were comfortable and great by SEA standards. Seriously you can walk EVERYWHERE from here. Breakfast was limited but still good! I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! I would recommend to anyone!', 'Near to lots of places in the Old Quater. Super friendly staff. Breakfast was ok only. But would definitely comeback.', 'My first visit to Vietnam was such a great time as being with Chic crew. They were sweet and fun to be around with. BF is definitely tasty with  lots of option given. And the room was clean and neat :) loved moments being at there. See you someday soon and hope you the best!', 'Had a really good stay for the few days we were in Hanoi. Staff were super friendly and helpful. The room was a perfect size with a great view over looking the city streets and had a nice balcony as well.', 'Photos online are really nice.. But we were welcomed by two tired men wearing casual clothes. No lady in AoDai like on the hotel photos.Rooms were just OK. for the price paid, I expected better. Stayed in cheaper hotels in old quarter of HaNoi before that were much better...Breakfast was a total let down.There was no "disaster" but we wont be back as Hanoi has much better hotels in that price range.', 'Nothing negative to say. Friendly, attentive and very helpful staff always available if you need something. The rooms are clean and nicely furnished and are good value for money. The breakfast is great. It is partly buffet and cooked dishes available on order. We liked the place and would stay there again at any time.', 'We arrived at the wrong Chic Hotel but were directed to the other location via friendly staff and their map. When we arrived the hotel staff was smiling and very chatty. We were then taken to our room, only to discover there was someone still inside. The porter then took us down to the lobby and upgraded our room. The room was excellent, but the bathroom needs an upgrade. While showering the water spilled out of the bathtub and all over the floor. The room was facing the road, but it was still of average sound. The road isnâ€™t a busy through way. There are also excellent coffee and local food shops around. We easily walked to St Josephâ€™s Cathedral and the Lake in the Old District. We would stay again.', 'Had been there for the second time. Everything was as expected. Very friendly and helpful staff which helped us to book our next trip within very short time. Great Job. We recommend the room in the second Floor with the balcony to the streets.', "Location is central in Old Quarters with close proximity to great local food. If you are looking for old world charm, this is the place. For a bit more I've got myself an excellent room with window over looking the main street. The staff are all very helpful.", 'Excellent shower, really comfortable beds, kettle in room. Staff speak excellent English and are very friendly. Great breakfast with both a buffet and a la carte menu. Good, stable Wi-Fi. The hotel is in the Old Quarter, within easy walking distance of main attractions, including Ho Chi Minhâ€™s mausoleum and Hoan Kiem lake. Thereâ€™s a Circle K convenience store just down the road.', 'Really lovely place.  Clean, bright and comfortable.  Staff were very helpful.  Sorted our train tickets for us and got a better deal than booking on line.  We were also escorted by the porter (he was on a motorbike and we were in a taxi) and he made sure we were on the right train and the right carriage.Breakfast was amazing.  So much food and all really tasty.  I would recommend this place to any traveller - holiday or business.', 'I had a fantastic time. My first visit to Vietnam and I was very impressed with the customer service, the cleanliness of room and delicious food, with huge variety in the breakfast menu.The staff were very helpful in organising an overnight trip in Halong bay for me. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hanoi.']

The room was what you'd expect from a standard hotel - the toiletries, hot water and everything is there, but the inside of the hotel doesn't look put-together. The floor in some parts of the hotel are just wooden boards, and the bathroom walls are just glass panels. It's clear that the owners had built the hotel on what is a very small piece of land, and tried maybe a little too hard to make it work/carve out as many rooms as they could.", "The service was really incredible and the location is great.  You can walk to and from many places central to Hanoi center.  I would stay there again.  The only negative would be the room for breakfast and timing.  Most people leave for tours early (between 7 and 7:30 am) but the kitchen doesn't open until 7:00 am.  There was a people jam a few times.  But if you wait a little while, there should be no problem.", 'The staff here were great and really helpful. The hotel seemed a bit older and could use some updating but was overall nice. We loved the location and it was really convenient. The breakfast was ok and the staff are so kind that it makes the place worth it!', 'This is an elegant hotel that make my trip more pleasure & convenience by staying at Hanoi Chic. Cleanliness and all facilities that required are all set in room. Especially elevators! Selections of breakfast are served. Hotels staff also very nice & helpful information. Included a very convenient location help us make an easily decision for staying here for the next visit. Highly recommended for tourists who want to stay in the center of the Old Quarter.', "This hotel looks elegant, with the bed also very big and comfortable! The bathroom comes with massage shower head though it is not very strong. I love the room very much!Second i love is the breakfast. It has a lot of varieties, besides the normal vietnam hotel's breakfast, we can have pancake, french toast, sandwich, and beef/chicken noodles upon order. There is yogurt, passion fruit, cakes n etc. I love it!", 'We had a lovely balcony which overlooked the street, great for people watching. The staff are very kind and helpful. Amazing value for money. Nice to be able to get a fresh omelette at breakfast. Cafe with great coffee next door if you are fussy like we are. 10 min walk to the lake. 5 min walk to Beer Street. 10 mins to Hanoi Train Street. Rose petals on our bed when we got there. Wonderful shower and lovely bed. Would definitely recommend to anyone.', 'Nice little hotel in the Old Town of Hanoi. Stuff is very friendly and helpful. They can organise any kind of excursion for you. They allowed us to stay longer in the hotel room to have a shower before going to the train and even accompanied us to the train station. Highly recommended!', 'It was great! Paid extra for room with balcony i wasnâ€™t in the room as much as I thought because it was so convenient and there was so much to explore but I am glad I had it but maybe wouldnâ€™t pay more again. It was the best location the beds were comfortable and great by SEA standards. Seriously you can walk EVERYWHERE from here. Breakfast was limited but still good! I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! I would recommend to anyone!', 'Near to lots of places in the Old Quater. Super friendly staff. Breakfast was ok only. But would definitely comeback.', 'My first visit to Vietnam was such a great time as being with Chic crew. They were sweet and fun to be around with. BF is definitely tasty with  lots of option given. And the room was clean and neat :) loved moments being at there. See you someday soon and hope you the best!', 'Had a really good stay for the few days we were in Hanoi. Staff were super friendly and helpful. The room was a perfect size with a great view over looking the city streets and had a nice balcony as well.', 'Photos online are really nice.. But we were welcomed by two tired men wearing casual clothes. No lady in AoDai like on the hotel photos.Rooms were just OK. for the price paid, I expected better. Stayed in cheaper hotels in old quarter of HaNoi before that were much better...Breakfast was a total let down.There was no "disaster" but we wont be back as Hanoi has much better hotels in that price range.', 'Nothing negative to say. Friendly, attentive and very helpful staff always available if you need something. The rooms are clean and nicely furnished and are good value for money. The breakfast is great. It is partly buffet and cooked dishes available on order. We liked the place and would stay there again at any time.', 'We arrived at the wrong Chic Hotel but were directed to the other location via friendly staff and their map. When we arrived the hotel staff was smiling and very chatty. We were then taken to our room, only to discover there was someone still inside. The porter then took us down to the lobby and upgraded our room. The room was excellent, but the bathroom needs an upgrade. While showering the water spilled out of the bathtub and all over the floor. The room was facing the road, but it was still of average sound. The road isnâ€™t a busy through way. There are also excellent coffee and local food shops around. We easily walked to St Josephâ€™s Cathedral and the Lake in the Old District. We would stay again.', 'Had been there for the second time. Everything was as expected. Very friendly and helpful staff which helped us to book our next trip within very short time. Great Job. We recommend the room in the second Floor with the balcony to the streets.', "Location is central in Old Quarters with close proximity to great local food. If you are looking for old world charm, this is the place. For a bit more I've got myself an excellent room with window over looking the main street. The staff are all very helpful.", 'Excellent shower, really comfortable beds, kettle in room. Staff speak excellent English and are very friendly. Great breakfast with both a buffet and a la carte menu. Good, stable Wi-Fi. The hotel is in the Old Quarter, within easy walking distance of main attractions, including Ho Chi Minhâ€™s mausoleum and Hoan Kiem lake. Thereâ€™s a Circle K convenience store just down the road.', 'Really lovely place.  Clean, bright and comfortable.  Staff were very helpful.  Sorted our train tickets for us and got a better deal than booking on line.  We were also escorted by the porter (he was on a motorbike and we were in a taxi) and he made sure we were on the right train and the right carriage.Breakfast was amazing.  So much food and all really tasty.  I would recommend this place to any traveller - holiday or business.', 'I had a fantastic time. My first visit to Vietnam and I was very impressed with the customer service, the cleanliness of room and delicious food, with huge variety in the breakfast menu.The staff were very helpful in organising an overnight trip in Halong bay for me. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Hanoi.']

KhÄƒn cá»§ vÃ  rÃ¡ch. NhÃ¢n viÃªn nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh. KhÃ´ng thá»ƒ xem Ä‘Ã¢y lÃ  khÃ¡ch sáº¡n 3 sao Ä‘Æ°á»£c. KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n chá»‰ cÃ³ 20 phÃ²ng ngá»§ vÃ  tiá»‡n nghi nghÃ¨o.', 'Best staff I ever saw!Great hotel for this price!', 'I stayed for 3 nights at this hotel and really enjoyed my stay there. The staff was absolutely amazing and helpful. The value for what you pay is a steal. The buffet breakfast is varied and well stocked. They offer a lot of food. There is great air conditioning in each room especially in hot and humid Hanoi. The hotel is about a 10 minute walk from the lake. In fact, Hanoi old quarter is so easy to walk around in.  I would stay here again.', 'We enjoyed our stay in this hotel. The staff very friendly and helpful, especially their front office, lana and kate helped us to book tickets  for the show and the tour to ha long bay. We will stay in this hotel again if we come back to hanoi.', 'Top Quality people, very responsive with Clean rooms, not new, but traditional style and great price for your money.', 'room is clean, plenty of choices for breakfast and the staff are super helpful to make your travel a breeze..prime location near old quarter and for muslim travelers, this hotel just a block away from Al Noor Mosque..', 'We had a great experience with our twenty-something sons at Hanoi Little Town.  First the pros:  the staff is very friendly and very helpful.  Communication prior to our arriving in Hanoi was excellent.  Once there, our itinerary had us leaving for one night and coming back.  They kept our luggage for us and arranged transportation.  Also, breakfast is really good with both Asian and Western choices.  Our first room was huge although not my favorite.  Room 601 is a  bit strange as their is a door that opens to the outside area which always remains open.  You can still lock the actual room but it was weird.  We were only there one night.  When we came back, we were places in 501 which is an fabulous room!  The decor, style, features - all great.  The boys were in a basic twin which was very clean and nicely appointed at first.  Second time around , they got the family suite (it was the only one open) and they were in heaven!  Great views! Overall, I would go back in a heartbeat!', 'Rooms are interesting, big and clean. Nice hot shower. Bit dark in the room we were in as the window seemed to not really let that much light  In. Helpful staff, was a bit worried after other reviews of a pushy man trying to sell travel packages. We did not experience this thankfully. Helpful with booking the night train as the website does not take non Vietnamese cards/ Atleast not ours anyway. Nice location close to the action.', 'Staff were so helpful, room was very nice as advertised and we had a very comfortable stay. We also had the best breakfast of anywhere in our travels in Asia: akin to a 4* or above hotel. The only issue was the ?neighbouring hotel lift was donging constantly from about 5am and this kept waking me up, it has the same tone as most doorbells - ding dong. The Hanoi little town hotel lift was not noisy so I think it was the building next door, such a shame as otherwise this would have been a perfect stay.', "Excellent location, right in the old city but you can't hear a thing at night. The staff are excellent -- this is the reason we are coming back for a night. Rooms are huge, breakfast is wonderful and you can do anything and book everything from this hotel. Literally could not rate it higher.", 'It wasnâ€™t a terrible accommodation but our room (the very first room when you walk up the stairs)  smelt like mold the entire time and also the sink leaked from the bottom whenever we would use it. Other than that, we were able to sleep rather well (it wasnâ€™t noisy at night) after our long flight to get to Hanoi so that was a bonus and the free breakfast was decent.', 'This hotel is the best low budget hotel we have stayed in. Book a rooftop room and get a private open balcony. Staff were excellent Location is good if you want to be within walking distance of the centre but in a quite neighbourhood', 'The staff is first class, friendly helpful and everything you want is a host when traveling. The facilities are from the past which has its charm but if you are a four and five star hotel person you would be disappointed. I love it personally. It is my go to residence when in Hanoi. Old school charm, great service / great people at a  great price.']

reviews: ['KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n má»›i, sáº¡ch Ä‘áº¹p ngay trung tÃ¢m phá»‘ Ä‘i bá»™, nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n vÃ  nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh. Há»‡ thá»‘ng nuá»›c máº¡nh, láº§n sau tÃ´i sáº½ quay láº¡i Ä‘Ã¢y náº¿u cÃ³ dá»‹p ra HÃ  Ná»™i..', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n tuyá»‡t vá»i, vá»‹ trÃ­ xuáº¥t sáº¯c, nhÃ¢n viÃªn thÃ¢n thiá»‡n, nhiá»‡t tÃ¬nh, nhÆ°ng Äƒn sÃ¡ng hÆ¡i sÆ¡ sÃ i', 'Äá»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm tá»‘t & ráº¥t sáº¡ch sáº½', 'Bá»¯a sÃ¡ng tháº­t lÃ  tá»‡', 'Táº¥t cáº£ Ä‘á»i tá»‘t, tuy nhiÃªn phÃ²ng hÆ¡i cháº­t', 'Tot', 'KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n má»›i, sáº¡ch sáº½ Ä‘á»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng ngon Ä‘áº·c biá»‡t nhÃ¢n viÃªn dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng vÃ  thÃ¢n thiá»‡n... cháº¯c cháº¯n sáº½ lÃ  lá»±a chá» hÃ ng Ä‘áº§u má»—i khi Ä‘i ra HÃ  ná»™i.', 'Hotel is good', 'The front desk helper are very polite,helpful and friendly.. the room is clean... the location is quite strategic and they offer a good breakfast buffet... but during night time our room will hear some noise from outside... overall is good..', 'We originally booked this hotel for one night while in Hanoi.  Ended up liking it so stayed an extra night.  The room was a good size.  Nice water pressure and hot water!  Breakfast was decent.  The staff was amazing.  They booked us for a private tour of the city, booked our water puppet tickets,  and arranged out Halong Bay tour.  Everytime we walked in the lobby they were asking how we are and were able to help us with all of our needs.   Great hotel and literally in the heart of the Old Quarters.', "We stayed here for 4 nights - we booked one night for two single beds, extended it another night in another room class with one single q one double-bed, then upgraded to a two double-bed room. I think we pretty much tried most of the rooms!Rooms were clean, bathrooms were excellent - they appear to have their own water pressure pump, and the toilet systems are new, so no toilet smells as there is no need to bin your toilet paper separately.The rooms are varied in size and shape - the room with one single and one double bed (rm 306) did not have either bed facing the tv, which caused some consternation for those who usually watch tv to sleep.The staff were excellent - breakfast was small but served well; they were very helpful with food recommendations, and also helped book our Halong Bay cruise.Internet was fast and available on all levels and rooms.Really great experience - a bit pricier on the Hanoi backpacker budget, but well worth the creature comforts you'll get.", 'PRO: The rooms in Old Quarter are always small like Scandinavian hotel, but the facilities are very new and nice. Location cannot be better, if you cross the Circle K the convenience store on the other side of the street, it takes literally 30 second to the Hoan Kiem Lake. The windows are noise-isolated very well to avoid the loud life of Old Quarter.CONS: I feel there are two houses making one hotel, if you go to the "left" house, the rooms are very narrow just fitting one double bed, but the "right" house, the rooms are bigger. So the images on internet is flattering, not that big. The WC is separate which I found good but most people dont like it.', 'I would say to anybody contemplating a stay at Maron The hotel is lovely , I found staff to be really welcoming and good sense of humor the food was excellent and  The room was well equipped, clean and nicely decorated.', "I was lucky to find this hotel before leaving Hanoi. \rPerfect location. Near by Hoan Kiem Lake only few steps.  It's surrounded by convenience stores,restaurants and street foods. \rQuiet room and soft bed made me sleep well. \rAlmost everything is new in this hotel. \rFriendly and helpful staffs. \rWorth to stay there again!", 'Maro Hotel is located to looking around the old quarter very good.Maro Hotel does not have clean/comforble rooms only, but also the staffs are so kind.Especailly, I recommend Maro Hotel to someone who visit Hanoi at first, or who want to look around the old quarter.', 'Very poor customer services.', "Maro Hotel is a beautiful, stylish space conveniently located in the heart of Hanoi's Old Quarter and only minutes' walk from Ho Kiem lake. We were very warmly welcomed on arrival, and staff were helpful and friendly throughout our stay. We stayed in the City View Suite, which was stunning - exactly as pictured! It was quite loud throughout the night though as Cau Go is a busy central area, so would recommend earplugs. Overall though, would highly recommend Maro Hotel for anyone staying in Hanoi - beautiful, convenient, and friendly. Thank you!", 'Great location. Very near to the Lake. Monica and everyone in the hotel, up to the bellboy, are very friendly and accomodating. I extended my stay for another two nights, considering the proximity of the place and the toilet.', 'Decent choice for an overnight stay, right in the heart of the city centre and a short walk to loads of local amenities. Booked a suite, looked exactly the same as online image but that was all about this hotel.  The room was not fully sound proof while the staff should always remain cautious and do their cleaning routine more carefully.', 'We arrived at early morning and the staff let us checked in early at 10:00am. Monica is extremely helpful! Room is clean and at good location. The side of our room is without lift but the staff hep us to carry our luggage. Recommended!']

Vá»‹ trÃ­ khÃ¡ch sáº¡n thÃ¬ tiá»‡n, cÃ¡ch NhÃ  Thá» Lá»›n chá»‰ 5p Ä‘i bá»™ thÃ´i nhÆ°ng láº¡i thÃ­ch há»£p Ä‘á»ƒ nghá»‰ ngÆ¡i, khÃ´ng á»“n Ã o, káº¹t xe nhiá»u nhÆ° cÃ¡c nÆ¡i khÃ¡c táº¡i Phá»‘ Cá»•.Nháº¥t Ä‘á»‹nh khi quay láº¡i HÃ  Ná»™i, tÃ´i váº«n sáº½ quay láº¡i khÃ¡ch sáº¡n vÃ  mong Ä‘á»™i ngÅ© nhÃ¢n viÃªn khÃ¡ch sáº¡n sáº½ mÃ£i giá»¯ vá»¯ng vÃ  phÃ¡t huy Ä‘Æ°á»£c nhá»¯ng gÃ¬ tá»‘t Ä‘áº¹p nÃ y.', 'My hubby and I were borned the same date,when we came back in our hotel from our  whole day tours...we were greeted birthday greetings by the male receptionist....that was a surprised to us because we never told them that day....and when we returned from our dinner outside the hotel...the male receptionist gave us a birthday cake in our room...it was a pleasant surprise...as their motto â€œ Arrive as our guest, Leave as our familyâ€....This hotel will make you feel at home...personally takes care all your tours...the location is good because it is not in the main street so you will get a quite side of Old Quarter St., and a lot nearby restaurants and stores to shop...buffet breakfast are good!', 'You can rest assured that you will be taken care of by the staffs here. They are all very friendly and polite. Always greets you, smile to you, giving you tips and informations that are useful for your trip in Hanoi. Breakfast was wonderful. But. And thats a big BUT. Facilitiy is very lacking. Room is kind of old, the lift broke down 2-3 times during our two night stay.. Bathroom is not the greatest either.', 'Firstly, from the moment I stepped into reception I was greeted with a wonderful welcome. Sarah was outstanding and made me feel at home immediately. I had room 901 with a huge wrap around verandah. The room was clean and very comfortable. The next morning I was greeted by Anna who was just as lovely as Sarah. These two ladies are very special! I only had a short stay but I really felt valued and welcome by the staff who bent over backwards at every opportunity. The hotel is really well located - a 5-10 minute walk to the lake and surrounded by excellent restaurants (Madame Hien across the street is a must do!). Iâ€™d recommend family and friends to this hotel and will definitely return whenever Iâ€™m in Hanoi. A really lovely stay in a nice hotel in an excellent neighbourhood. The staff are phenomenal and made it extra special.', 'It was the best hotel in my family. Sarah welcomed us with a bright smile every morning.He kindly showed me the way. Henry was so kind and helpful and worried about us. The hotel here is not big, but the location was so good, especially the breakfast was so delicious.  The best food for me in Hanoi was breakfast. If I visit Hanoi again next time, I will stay here again. I have been to many countries, but it is a very kind and nice hotel.-wonil-   :)', 'Only the room are small &  the bathroom bidet is the same height with the toilet paper.After using the bidet the paper also get wet because the dripping of the water.The water not flowing smoothly after the shower too.The door of the room also very stiff when closing.Need to be improved', 'good service.  friendly steps.', 'Lots of things about this hotel are good: Excellent location, friendly staff, comfortable bed, pretty good breakfast. But the rooms are very small, and my "balcony" did not even have room for two people to stand, unless they were willing to get very, very cozy.', 'A cozy hotel well located in the old quarter. The service provided by the staff especially Anna & Sarah are warm, friendly and  excellent. Breakfast is great with changes in their main menu daily. They even pre-packed breakfast for us on the last day as we have to check-out at 6.30 amThank you to Anna & Sarah for the exceptional service provided by your team.', 'I checked in to the room that wasnâ€™t my choice. For personal preference, I opted a demote to Deluxe King though was offered with Family Suite initially without additional cost. Anna was the leader in charge the next day during my check out. She patiently explained the situation to me with sincere apology and then offered an immediate refund at a fair rate which I was happy about it. I felt her sincerity and effort putting in to make sure I was well compensated. She was then offering me a free airport transfer after knowing that I was heading off to airport to catch my flight home without much hesitation. I saw her big smiles in her face which makes me feel like coming back for the Junior Suite room that I havenâ€™t gotten a chance to stay in yet. She even assisted me to resolve an urgent situation I faced in the airport which i was truly grateful for her hands came just right in time. Highly recommend this hotel. Comfy bed, good breakfast, polite staffs as well as strategic location.', "It's located at the center of interesting places. Easy to find the convenience shop, nightmarket and restuarant. Staffs are friendly and always serves us the perfect service. Breakfast is fresh and delicious.", 'We had a great stay at this hotel 15-19 April.  The family room was a good size for our family of four, and the location makes most of  the things we wanted to see within easy walking distance.  Breakfast was particularly good.   Big thanks to Anna and the entire team at Golden Legend Diamond Hotel for a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.', 'I just stayed one night but I was satisfied with this good hotel.first, all staffs of hotel are kind and polite. especially Anna is best.she explains about hanoi city and give many tips for tourist kindly.I will recommend this hotel to my friends and others. thank you', 'The hosts, Tony, Anna and Lana as well as the staff were so friendly and helpful. Room was clean and breakfast was good. The location is very convenient and near to food places, shopping areas and supermarket. The arrangement made by hotel to Halong Bay and Sapa went smoothly and both tours were enjoyable.', 'This hotel was too good to her true. They answered all our questions and gave suggested when necessary about our travel plans, such as the best way to get to da nang, as well as ha long bay. The staff were very accommodating. At check in they realized we were on our honeymoon so they gave us a free upgrade to the honeymoon suite. They also prepared vegetarian food for us at breakfast. All the hotel staff we came in contact with were very friendly and helpful. Special thank you to Mr. Tony.', 'Golden Legend Diamond Hotel provided the best hospitality I so far experienced when my family and I traveled to Hanoi at the end of December 2017 for a 4 nights stay. Despite the small team they have, they provided everything they could to us telling us all the must visit places and best food in Hanoi. On the other hand, location of this hotel is excellent whereby famous attraction spots in Hanoi are only just a stone throw distance from here. Wind, one of the staff in Golden Legend Diamond Hotel, even taught us some simple Vietnamese! Anyways, if I were to travel back to Hanoi in the future, this would be my choice of stay as I feel like Iâ€™m at home when I was staying here. A big applause to the team, especially Wind, for their kind hospitality. Thank you.', 'All good, main selling point here is the staffs are extremely friendly, made me felt like home!Breakfast is standard, location is okayCons:- Maybe you should upgrade the door locks with key cards- Have 24hour lobby, the lobby here locks the main door with shutter after certain hours for security']

ÄÃ¢y cháº¯c cháº¯n sáº½ lÃ  Ä‘iá»ƒm quay láº¡i láº§n sau khi tá»›i HÃ  Ná»™i!', 'Itâ€™s a good hostel just like your home. They always welcome the backpackers ,same as your family. If you have some problems, they always give you the best suggestions. They also provide a lot of services like booking the ticket for bus and train, tour information for Halong Bay, Ninh Bing, Ha Giang, Mai Chou,etc. You also can watch Netflix here! Here is the best choice if you want to stay in Hanoi!', "The staff here were awesome! So sweet and funny. The spaces were nice, the bathrooms clean, and the rooftop hangout room was so nice! So great to have a communal space to relax and do some work or meet people. All in all, I really enjoyed my stay here.However, I was staying in the Nem room on the second floor, and I'm pretty sure the AC literally did nothing. Sometimes I'd walk outside the room, and it would be cooler in the non-air-conditioned hallway than in the room. It was a fucking hotbox in there. There's a fan in the beds, which was the only saving grace, but those bed cubbies are like little hotboxes. If the AC in this room worked properly, I would have stayed much longer, but literally I'd wake up sweating balls in the middle of every night. That said, I'm sure the AC worked fine in other rooms! Would still recommend Backy. Thanks for having me!  =)", "Everything is great here!  Experience first in the dormitory!  All comfort will not be like a high-class hotel but it's hard to find places with enthusiastic and friendly staff!  I greatly appreciate the staff!  I really like this place!  And if i have a chance to come back, i will definitely come back to this place!"]

ÄÃ¢y cháº¯c cháº¯n sáº½ lÃ  Ä‘iá»ƒm quay láº¡i láº§n sau khi tá»›i HÃ  Ná»™i!', 'Itâ€™s a good hostel just like your home. They always welcome the backpackers ,same as your family. If you have some problems, they always give you the best suggestions. They also provide a lot of services like booking the ticket for bus and train, tour information for Halong Bay, Ninh Bing, Ha Giang, Mai Chou,etc. You also can watch Netflix here! Here is the best choice if you want to stay in Hanoi!', "The staff here were awesome! So sweet and funny. The spaces were nice, the bathrooms clean, and the rooftop hangout room was so nice! So great to have a communal space to relax and do some work or meet people. All in all, I really enjoyed my stay here.However, I was staying in the Nem room on the second floor, and I'm pretty sure the AC literally did nothing. Sometimes I'd walk outside the room, and it would be cooler in the non-air-conditioned hallway than in the room. It was a fucking hotbox in there. There's a fan in the beds, which was the only saving grace, but those bed cubbies are like little hotboxes. If the AC in this room worked properly, I would have stayed much longer, but literally I'd wake up sweating balls in the middle of every night. That said, I'm sure the AC worked fine in other rooms! Would still recommend Backy. Thanks for having me!  =)", "Everything is great here!  Experience first in the dormitory!  All comfort will not be like a high-class hotel but it's hard to find places with enthusiastic and friendly staff!  I greatly appreciate the staff!  I really like this place!  And if i have a chance to come back, i will definitely come back to this place!"]

Äi bá»™ ra Há»“ GÆ°Æ¡m, chá»£ Äá»“ng XuÃ¢n Ä‘á»u tiá»‡n', 'Good location situated in the old quaters,  very near to the night market , beer street and shopping areas, as well as the  West lake. Staff are very friendly especially from reception.  Breakfast limited choice,', 'Everything you need is in walking distance. The room was very big, compared with other hotels in Old Quarter and surprisingly, the rate is very reasonable. Would for sure come back to this hotel in my next trip in Hanoi', 'was there for about 5 days, got the know the staff well ,was traveling with my 3 yr.old daughter,single father, the staff went out off their way to make her feel comfortable . gave me advise on where to visit and eat as economically as possible . i would say the hotel was a strong 3 but not yet 4 star but the staff 5 ....carl from california', 'Very enjoy as stuffs there are very friendly. Simple but nice breakfast provided. Very near to local attractions. Highly recommend this hotel as it is really really really a high satisfaction stay. Surrounded with chilling spots at the night.', 'Location is at the Old quarters which is bustling with activities. Food & shopping are easily available right at the doorstep. The rooms are small but clean and nicely furnished. There is free internet connection although the connection in my room was very slow. The food served at the restaurant was decent. All the staff were friendly and polite and greeted me with a smile each time I walked in and out of the hotel.', "This is another value for money hotel in the Old Quarter of Hanoi.  For less than USD$70, you get a new 3 star hotel, the room size is decent, furniture is in good condition, the room is clean and bathroom is adequate.  I've no complaints about this place.  It even has a free shoe polishing machine on the ground floor.  The staff is helpful and the rooms are quiet. Its about 5 minutes walk from the Sword Lake.  There's nothing much on the street where the hotel is, but its near enough to many other places within the Old quarter.", 'The room was quite dusty when we first entered. Time for the water heater to be upgraded! Shower water turned cold after 5 mins shower. Next user will have to wait for a good 10mins again before entering into the shower room to get a hot shower.', 'The bed was comfortable and the the room clean and well maintained. What makes this hotel special is an absolutely wonderful staff.  They are friendly, helpful, professional and efficient but most importantly genuinely caring towards the guests.  A lovely young woman working in the restaurant at breakfast my first morning assumed I must be lonely.  She asked if I would like her to take me around on her motorbike so see some of the city sites that evening.  That was the start of a marvelous adventure.  Over the next 8 days we visited sites, ate at great little local spots, spent time with some of her student friends and where at times joined by other staff members.  So I spent my time in Hanoi with people 1/3 my age and had a blast. And they asked for nothing in return.  I love these kids and would never stay anywhere else when I visited Hanoi.', 'Great location in the Old Quarters. Not too near the pub areas which can be noisy in the weekends, but within walking distance to restaurants, pubs and the night market. Staff can speak English and are very helpful.', 'I enjoyed my stay in this hotel. It was a good place to come back to after a hectic day in the old city of Hanoi. Friendly staff and good value for money.Tip - Be aware of taxi drivers with dodgy taxi-meters!', 'Friendly and accomodating staff. Excellent location. Good size rooms. Street is packed full of motorbikes so if your not used to it it may take a while before you can safely navigate yourself around the pushbikes, cars, scooters and motorbikes. The lack of traffic lights compared to the west is refreshing as is the minimal advertising, if anything experience this while you can and it lasts. Food in the area is great and the people are nice. Watch out for taxi drivers who set the meter at a high speed and try to coerce you into paying exhorbitand fees. Quick trip round the city getting from one place to the other should only cost a few dollars, get the guys number or plates and report to hotel, they should be able to have him tracked down for you and sorted. Otherwise I had lots of people offer me 1hr bike ride around hanoi for $15, great way to see the city turned into 90min and she negatiated a new pair of shoes for her instead, so realise what you could be getting into and how your overall fee may rise, it was still fun and enjoyable.Minor quibble,  room could have been much better lit.']

ÄÃ¢y cháº¯c cháº¯n sáº½ lÃ  Ä‘iá»ƒm quay láº¡i láº§n sau khi tá»›i HÃ  Ná»™i!', 'Itâ€™s a good hostel just like your home. They always welcome the backpackers ,same as your family. If you have some problems, they always give you the best suggestions. They also provide a lot of services like booking the ticket for bus and train, tour information for Halong Bay, Ninh Bing, Ha Giang, Mai Chou,etc. You also can watch Netflix here! Here is the best choice if you want to stay in Hanoi!', "The staff here were awesome! So sweet and funny. The spaces were nice, the bathrooms clean, and the rooftop hangout room was so nice! So great to have a communal space to relax and do some work or meet people. All in all, I really enjoyed my stay here.However, I was staying in the Nem room on the second floor, and I'm pretty sure the AC literally did nothing. Sometimes I'd walk outside the room, and it would be cooler in the non-air-conditioned hallway than in the room. It was a fucking hotbox in there. There's a fan in the beds, which was the only saving grace, but those bed cubbies are like little hotboxes. If the AC in this room worked properly, I would have stayed much longer, but literally I'd wake up sweating balls in the middle of every night. That said, I'm sure the AC worked fine in other rooms! Would still recommend Backy. Thanks for having me!  =)", "Everything is great here!  Experience first in the dormitory!  All comfort will not be like a high-class hotel but it's hard to find places with enthusiastic and friendly staff!  I greatly appreciate the staff!  I really like this place!  And if i have a chance to come back, i will definitely come back to this place!"]

Äi bá»™ ra Há»“ GÆ°Æ¡m, chá»£ Äá»“ng XuÃ¢n Ä‘á»u tiá»‡n', 'Good location situated in the old quaters,  very near to the night market , beer street and shopping areas, as well as the  West lake. Staff are very friendly especially from reception.  Breakfast limited choice,', 'Everything you need is in walking distance. The room was very big, compared with other hotels in Old Quarter and surprisingly, the rate is very reasonable. Would for sure come back to this hotel in my next trip in Hanoi', 'was there for about 5 days, got the know the staff well ,was traveling with my 3 yr.old daughter,single father, the staff went out off their way to make her feel comfortable . gave me advise on where to visit and eat as economically as possible . i would say the hotel was a strong 3 but not yet 4 star but the staff 5 ....carl from california', 'Very enjoy as stuffs there are very friendly. Simple but nice breakfast provided. Very near to local attractions. Highly recommend this hotel as it is really really really a high satisfaction stay. Surrounded with chilling spots at the night.', 'Location is at the Old quarters which is bustling with activities. Food & shopping are easily available right at the doorstep. The rooms are small but clean and nicely furnished. There is free internet connection although the connection in my room was very slow. The food served at the restaurant was decent. All the staff were friendly and polite and greeted me with a smile each time I walked in and out of the hotel.', "This is another value for money hotel in the Old Quarter of Hanoi.  For less than USD$70, you get a new 3 star hotel, the room size is decent, furniture is in good condition, the room is clean and bathroom is adequate.  I've no complaints about this place.  It even has a free shoe polishing machine on the ground floor.  The staff is helpful and the rooms are quiet. Its about 5 minutes walk from the Sword Lake.  There's nothing much on the street where the hotel is, but its near enough to many other places within the Old quarter.", 'The room was quite dusty when we first entered. Time for the water heater to be upgraded! Shower water turned cold after 5 mins shower. Next user will have to wait for a good 10mins again before entering into the shower room to get a hot shower.', 'The bed was comfortable and the the room clean and well maintained. What makes this hotel special is an absolutely wonderful staff.  They are friendly, helpful, professional and efficient but most importantly genuinely caring towards the guests.  A lovely young woman working in the restaurant at breakfast my first morning assumed I must be lonely.  She asked if I would like her to take me around on her motorbike so see some of the city sites that evening.  That was the start of a marvelous adventure.  Over the next 8 days we visited sites, ate at great little local spots, spent time with some of her student friends and where at times joined by other staff members.  So I spent my time in Hanoi with people 1/3 my age and had a blast. And they asked for nothing in return.  I love these kids and would never stay anywhere else when I visited Hanoi.', 'Great location in the Old Quarters. Not too near the pub areas which can be noisy in the weekends, but within walking distance to restaurants, pubs and the night market. Staff can speak English and are very helpful.', 'I enjoyed my stay in this hotel. It was a good place to come back to after a hectic day in the old city of Hanoi. Friendly staff and good value for money.Tip - Be aware of taxi drivers with dodgy taxi-meters!', 'Friendly and accomodating staff. Excellent location. Good size rooms. Street is packed full of motorbikes so if your not used to it it may take a while before you can safely navigate yourself around the pushbikes, cars, scooters and motorbikes. The lack of traffic lights compared to the west is refreshing as is the minimal advertising, if anything experience this while you can and it lasts. Food in the area is great and the people are nice. Watch out for taxi drivers who set the meter at a high speed and try to coerce you into paying exhorbitand fees. Quick trip round the city getting from one place to the other should only cost a few dollars, get the guys number or plates and report to hotel, they should be able to have him tracked down for you and sorted. Otherwise I had lots of people offer me 1hr bike ride around hanoi for $15, great way to see the city turned into 90min and she negatiated a new pair of shoes for her instead, so realise what you could be getting into and how your overall fee may rise, it was still fun and enjoyable.Minor quibble,  room could have been much better lit.']

Very good location juts walk distance to  all restaurant, market and  tourist objects.Hotel is located at small road but it is very easy access to traveller as hotel has a good coordination with all tour agent. We are reminded in advance subject to tour schedule accordingly. Our families are very happy with this trip as everything has been well organized by hotel. They provide Us with airport car transfer for free.I would like to recommend this hotel to all traveller who wants to get a balance of money to quality.', 'I know thereâ€™s lots of choices for Hanoi old town, it was hard to make a decision. Iâ€™m glad to stay with S Central Hotel . Although it is same group with Splendid Grand Star Hotel. But I strongly prefer stay at S Central Hotel. Receptionist ( specially the beautiful young lady with pony tail) was super friendly and thoughtful. She speak good English and gave us some good advice about food and coffee. I definitely wanna come back S Central in future. Brand new room with balcony. Nothing to complain about that, all I can do is tell my friends stay at S central if they are going to Hanoi.', 'Pros: Staff was very friendly (Thank you Nha  and Chris!) The room was spacious and clean. The location is close to attractions, local street vendors and restaurants. Cons: The location is not accessible for cars, so the staff walks you to your taxi on the main road which is down a small alley.  The lobby and breakfast area is a little small and can get tight. Overall: Good value for your money and we enjoyed our stay here.', 'Nice place, location, and staff. Big room. We enjoyed the stay there although only one night.', "Overall service was excellent. Front desk people were very helpful and spoke excellent English. Room was clean and good size. Breakfast area was pretty small but we didn't have to wait for breakfast since the hotel was fairly small hotel. Front desk was very helpful with town info and excersion info and bookings. No views at the balcony on the 5th floor which I stayed. Breakfast menu was limited so got a bit tired of the same menu every morning since our family stayed for 6 nights. Overall pretty good for the money.", 'Very friendly staff, close to everywhere']

Láº¥y lÃ½ do agoda nháº§m láº«n!', "We (2 children and 2 adults) had a great stay at , we booked 2 rooms The hotel is a stone's throw from the Cathedral. Hotel manager John ensured we had a good stay and our day trip to HaLong Bay was looked after, despite an initial hiccup. The breakfast is basic but the hotel is very centrally located and close to many cafes/restaurants. Try and book the rooms with the balcony.", "A rather new hotel in an incredibly convenient location. The staff are great - they can't go out of their way enough to help you, whether that means booking tours, giving helpful suggestions to get around, or introducing you to the area. Definitely swing for one of the balcony rooms if you can afford it; the view is wonderful, and as the side street is pretty quiet, there's no real traffic noise either. I loved how it was literally steps from some of the main streets and attractions like St. Joseph's Cathedral, and it was incredibly easy to get around.", 'Rooms are very clean and quite new. Not so big nor too small just right. Staff were excellent! John always replies to my messages and queries very quickly. Although there were glitches on my booking the first night, they were resolved immediately. Breakfast was simple but generous amount. Overall My experience was excellent and will recommend Galliot.Note: Only downside is the noise from the street and construction noise next building. So i suggest if sensitive to noise, get the inner rooms( no window) instead of city view (withwindow).', 'WiFi - good, breakfast are awesome (pho bo or scrambled eggs). Owner can help with everything: rent bike or get excursions. We checked other hotels on this street, this is hotel are renovated, other no.', 'Our family stayed 4days for holiday, location is perfect for traveller. Nearby restaurants,  convenience store, coffee shop and only 10mins walk to Hoan Kiem lakes lots of tourist attraction. Staff english is not enough to communicate but they try to their best sort it out and very kindly service. Beer steet or night market walk 15 mins or 30,000Don use Grap taxi app or normal taxi 40,000Don. Absolutely good value for money and we enjoyed stay the hotel.Only breakfast little bit improved further but good start pho in the morning. Cheap local restaurant few steps away such as Banmi and Pho, and famous Pho 10 & Bun bo Nam Bo within 8 mins.  Once again, good location, nice people and enjoyed the stay.  Most important thing in the hotel, no bike noise at night time.', 'Like it', 'The staff are lovely and accommodating, room was clean and you get water and fresh towels daily. Just a bit of feedback for the staff - The breakfast could be improved. Overall would stay again!', 'In advance to our stay John the manager arranged a cruise in Halong Bay for us. This was very nice to get it planned and to be sure that everything worked. He have chosen Athena Cruises for us what we can recommend-it was a beautiful trip! We were waremly welcomed and the staff arranged a early check-in for us because we were there early in the morning. The hotel is in old quarter and close to french quarter - a must see when you stay in Hanoi! For breakfast you can choose one dish fromthe menue and you have a small buffet with cereals, coffee, tee and some fresh fruits. The only thing we didnâ€˜t like too much was the room without window but for one night we had a really nice room with city view. For christmas there was a little party with food and music in the lobby and we celebrated a bit with local people. All in all a good located hotel to visit Hanoi! Thank you, John and all hotel staff for our stay!', 'not recommend', 'very good location', 'Staffs are helpful', 'Affordable price but the service was really nice. Near from tourist destination. We were happy to stay here especially the staff are very helpful']

hotel name: KhÃ¡ch sáº¡n Bella Rosa HÃ  Ná»™i (Hanoi Bella Rosa Trendy Hotel)
address: 11 Luong Ngoc Quyen, Hang Buom, Phá»‘ Cá»•, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam, 10000
reviews: ['Ks má»›i. NhÃ¢n viÃªn dá»… thÆ°Æ¡ng. Sáº¡ch sáº½. ÄÃ¡ng giÃ¡ tiá»n bá» ra.', 'I booked this hotel via agoda and got the feedback from hotel manager later. He is kind, polite and willing to do the best service for you. So, after contacted with him directly via whatsApp, I also booked the one day tour for "Halong Bay" and "Hoa Lu". It was really fun and awesome.  Breakfast is good and room is clean. Sure, I will recommend this hotel to you.', 'Definitely will came back to this hotel if I back to Hanoi. Everything was perfect. Staff reallyyyyy humble and have a good english, they will explain to you about good restaurant.Thank you to everything', 'Me and my hubby stayed in Bella rosa trendy hotel for a night and we so enjoyed! Janifer and other staffs are super friendly and helpful during the staying. The room is big enough for two and so clean. Location is even phenomenal!!! (take 30sec to Ta hien st). Also the breakfast, oh I have to say it was the best pho I ever had in Vietnam and Iâ€™m not joking! Really appreciate I stayed in this hotel and will highly recommend to stay!', 'All of staffs were extremely nice and great! I had an issue when i was coming from airport but Jessica who is manager in the hotel she made everything safe really quick. And also room was really clean. Shower and toilet might be abit small but it wasnt big issue. Thank you for everything!!', 'Stay 2 nights at this hotel, warm welcome by the hotel staffs , we arrived early and the staff allow us early check in . Good service provided by all the staffs . Good breakfast served by the hotel, you can order what ever you wants in the menu . Location is good , short walk to lake and can shop around the hotel .A lot of local food shop nearby . Hotel room is clean , Will definitely stay here again next trip . Thanks for the hospitality .', 'Definitely will go back to this hotel again if I go to Hanoi. Great location which is within the happening old quarter. I had met the friendliest hotel staff. Breakfast was fantastic and you can order anything you want. Just a small flaw that I encountered was there was quite noisy in the morning as I was woken up by the noise. I believe is the staff preparing breakfast for hotel guest. Perhaps I will get higher floor next time. Overall itâ€™s a good hotel to stay.', 'Enjoyed our overall stay.  The room was quiet and very clean.  The included breakfast was one of the best Iâ€™ve had at a hotel.  The breakfast menu includes many choices.  There was a problem with the central AC unit the night we stayed.  The room wouldnâ€™t get cool enough.  The staff apologized for that.  Overall, Iâ€™d recommend it.', 'Nice rooms, good sound proofing, great staff, great location in the middle of the action of the old quarter.', 'We stayed 3 nights at Bella Rosa Trendy. We had some issues with our room on our 1st night and Jessica settled it promptly for us and we were very happy with our stay for the next 2 nights. Hotel location is excellent. The breakfast provided by the hotel was very good. We could order anything we want from the menu. On our last day, we booked an airport transfer from the hotel and the driver arrived on time. Overall, it was a good stay and we will stay here again if we visit Hanoi in future.', 'Nothing negative to say. We stayed in 402 and then 401 with balcony. Big rooms that were super comfortable and the hotel is in the perfect location; walking distance to everything. Bank machine located right next door, which is super convenient. Staff was extremely helpful. Thanks to Mabel and Jessica who took great care of us. Would definitely stay again.', 'We booked a family room(4 persons). Room is big enough to accommodate us. The two big beds are so comfortable. It is clean too. We definitely had a good sleep even it is just for 1 night. Another plus point about the hotel are the staffs. They are friendly, accommodating and helpful. They even prepared breakfast for the 4 of us as we had to check-out in the early morning to catch our flight. Overall, definitely will stay here if we come back to Hanoi!', 'Location is good if you want to be near the drinking area. Personally, I found the area too noisy for my liking as we are not pubbers. If you are light sleepers like us, please request for non-city view rooms. We spent 6 nights there and had to stay in a city facing room for first 3 nights as the hotel was full. I found it too noisy and had to use ear plugs. Service of the staff at the hotel is excellent. Rooms are very clean. Breakfast is also good.', 'Staff very helpful. We stayed for 2 nights then went on overnight cruise and returned to hotel next day for another 2 nights. We were able leave suitcases there and they were already in our room when we returned. Breakfast was a la carte and plenty to eat. Would definitely stay there again David and Margaret MacDonald', 'We stayed at Hanoi Bella Rosa Trendy Hotel for 2 nights. Nested right in the action of the Old Quarters yet away from the noise and crowd. The location was so convenient, we could head back to the hotel once during the day to put down our shopping stuff before heading out for dinner. All the places we wanted to go were within walking distances.Staff are friendly and very helpful. The room with balcony was the best where you get to enjoy the Hanoi Old Quarters vibe from 4 floors up. Love it!', 'I highly commend the staff of this hotel for being helpful. They were very nice and attentive to my needs. I also like that I was given a quiet room as I requested. For breakfast you can order whatever there is on the list, so if you are in a rush, better to head down early as the food will be prepared as you order. The food was good so find time for breakfast.', 'Ms. Jessica Nguyen is the best. She helped coordinate everything from our hotel transfer to our 3d2n trip to Ha Long and other day trips. She was on top of everything and every tour we took was offered at a better price than anywhere else. The service from Ms. Nguyen and the other staff is on par with any 5 star hotel.', "Everything is great!! , location (Very good for people who like to stay near nightlife, just 1 min walk to Ta Hien), service, cleanliness. Except for the pointers below for your information.1) Bathroom tiles are too slippery for young children, So I had to use the floor mat to anti-slip it. For adult is fine2) Tv position is awkward not facing the bed, but not important, most of the time we were out. 3) Good security on the main door, it closes after 0000hrs. But don't get drunk else you can't find your way back! Just ring the bell and staff will open for you 24hrs.", 'clean room, good location just beside the nightlife street, easy access to main roads and the staff really helpful and so nice.', 'The staff were very friendly and helpful, even offering us the use of shower facilities after we had already checked out.']

Rooms are clean and the hotel is in the Old Quarter.", 'Pros: reception can speak english very well.Cons: breakfast can only order one food, no lift provided, the room is too small for three people', 'The hostel is located in a good location where is walking to distance to many place, yet still not noisy during the night.
