VÃ  thá»±c sá»± ráº¥t á»“n cho Ä‘áº¿n gáº§n sÃ¡ng vÃ¬ máº¥y quÃ¡n bar bÃªn cáº¡nh Ä‘Ã³.', "Manager Lilly and all the team did everything to make us happy.  They help us booking our trip to Halong Bay,  calling our cabs,  printing a document and even offer me a birthday cake for by birthday. That was super kind! Breakfast Ã€ la carte all you can eat are amazing and coffee super good. Rooms are big and clean with good bed. The down point is something the hotel as no control.  There is many clubs in this area and it seems there's no regulations with noise permitted. (doors can be opened and they can be opened all night some days). If you're young and want to party very late I suppose it's cool but if you want to sleep well it's problematic). Lily explained us the hotels and community asked the government for some rules).  I sincerely wish them good luck to get some improvements. Thanks again to all the team you were fantastic with us.", 'Hanoi Space Hotel is located in a lively area within the Old Quarters. Seconds away from bars, restaurants and nightlife. A bit noisy so ask for a room not facing the main road. The "A La Carte Buffet" breakfast is awesome....got to experience it...no words to describe it.......', 'Hanoi Space Hotel is located in a lively area within the Old Quarters. Seconds away from bars, restaurants and nightlife. A bit noisy so ask for a room not facing the main road. The "A La Carte Buffet" breakfast is awesome....got to experience it...no words to describe it.......', 'Hanoi Space Hotel is located in a lively area within the Old Quarters. Seconds away from bars, restaurants and nightlife. A bit noisy so ask for a room not facing the main road. The "A La Carte Buffet" breakfast is awesome....got to experience it...no words to describe it.......', "I'm totally satisfied with facilities and service here. Location is convenient, takes less than 10 mins to walk to Hoan Kiem Lake, staff are very nice and let customer feel comfortable. I will recommend my friends to stay here if they travel to Ha Noi.", 'Good hotel right in the middle of Ma May. Great breakfast and super friendly staff. Tour desk is a bit expensive compared to the competition though.', "Nice little hotel at the prime location of old quarters. Rooms are bit small for that price but it's well compensated by the helpful staff and awesome location. Just in front of the hotel , there is an array of street foods to devour . Staff is so courteous , started with welcome drink , provided details of places to visit with a handout map ( which is common for hotels over here). They even packed our breakfast for our journey to Halong bay. Breakfast is less in option but great in taste. We stayed for one day . Highly recommend. But do opt for a bigger room.", 'Me and my frens had a nice breakfast every morning, well done chef! In additional, they also provide variety of choices for breakfast and not in buffet style but short order cook.Highly recommend this hotel if you can stand/sleep under noise pollution at night as the pub just next to the hotel', 'The welcome you get at this place is exceptional. Lovely drink and fruit on arrival. Bags carried up to your room. The staff couldnâ€™t be more helpful with organising trips etc for you. The breakfast was the best we had in Hanoi. You pay a little bit extra than the basic hotel in Asia but the service makes it worth it. Only problem I had was the marble bathroom tiles were very slippery when wet and I did fall and hurt my arm but nothing serious. Would definitely recommend this place to couples wanting a nice hotel in Hanoi.', 'Breakfast was really good.Location is good.Staff are friendly.', 'The hotel and staff are good except the noise pollution. Disco till 3 am life from your room, very busy pedestrian street during weekends. Not a place if you plan to rest or intend to sleep before 3 am.', 'We stayed on Friday night.  The street outside the hotel was bustling with activities.  The noise from the band playing along the roadside was very noisy at night and can be heard loudly in the room.  But we were too tired to care after return from Halong Bay', 'Staff i.e. Crystal, Kelly & Tom were very kind and obliging.  They assisted in every way i.e. book Grab, breakfast reorder of another helping as well as carrying luggage bag, press the lift.Convenient location with plenty of food and little shops though road is narrow', '1. The location is strategically located to many of the local eateries, the beautiful lake, convenient store and not far from mall.2. Staff always greet and make you feel welcome! English is ok. Sometimes a little difficult to communicate though, but still consider OK.3. Could have improved on their ice provision service. Sometimes they ran out of ice which I have to go out and buy my own ice. But this is very minimal issue, still, could improved on this.Overall it is value for money, staff is good and the breakfast is awesome! We love the pho (Vietnam beef noodle).Well, it is a little bit noisy at night, but it is actually bearable. I had trouble getting to sleep on my first night, after that it was all OK.', 'Room was clean & bed comfortable Breakfast was good and substantial consisting of local food, eggs and pancakes. One thing which deserves special mention was that I saw a customer coming in early and though canâ€™t check in yet breakfast was offered to him. This is good service!', 'I travel for work and vacation quite often and this is one of the friendliest hotels Iâ€™ve ever stayed at. The staff takes care of everything from transportation to luggage. They helped me book bus  tickets to go to the Ha Giang region. And the breakfast is excellent, as good as or better than all the tasty food in the area.', 'I m using a wheelchair and the front of this hotel has three little steps but there were always someone helping me and soon you inside the hotel there were no problem because they have elevator. The room was incredible andthe breakfas was fantastic. The thing that make this place deserved more than 10 stars are the staff, Han the manager always make sure we got everything that we need and Ling the reception also very helpful and gave us lots of tips and information about Vietnam and the amazing Kelly was superb all the time. We also exchanged our money here and the rate was very good .definitely will come back to this hotel if we ever visit Hanoi again']

address: 5 áº¤u Triá»‡u, Quáº­n HoÃ n Kiáº¿m, Quáº­n HoÃ n Kiáº¿m, HÃ  Ná»™i, Viá»‡t Nam
reviews: ['Brilliant location right in the middle of the old quarter, lovely staff, great breakfast, great price.', 'Clean, well-appointed room with mini-fridge, comfortable bed, large flat screen TV, small but charming balcony overlooking street ideal for sunset drink.  Good shelf space in bathroom made up for leaky sink/toilet/shower door. Staff were absolutely lovely; very good English, helpful and hospitable - they greeted us with fresh, cold watermelon juice when we arrived!  Delicious banana pancakes, fresh fruit and strong vietnamese coffee for breakfast.  Excellent value. Recommended and would stay there again. BTW, now called Iris Hotel, not Joseph Hotel.', 'Small quaint hotel in a beautiful setting near Cathedral.Excellent value friendly clean and  no problem with Airport car service.Excellent Laundry service  42 Kg.', 'Everything was so great. Kind staff, clean and spacious room, well equipped with balcony. Breakfast was just like a home food. Definitely come back!', "The staff were incredibly helpful and obliging and the owner, Brian, was able to advise us on everything we asked about, never having visited Vietnam before. Only slight negative for us was that the front rooms with balcony looking over the street can't fit another bed so we had to take a back room without any view. But everything else was outstanding including the breakfasts!", 'Very helpful staff', "The staff are very friendly and will help with any need or problem, from arranging a tour or train reservation to making a doctors appt.  The facility is clean and very functional.  The location couldn't be better to do things in the Old Quarter.  This is my second stay at the Joseph and I'll continue coming back!.", 'Clean, safe, ancient located, lovely', 'This is my home hotel', 'The hotel is in good location, clean, staffs are nice, breakfast is small but good. This is my favourite hotel', 'Nice concept and decoration. Friendly staff. Clean and comfortable.', 'Located right in the heart of the Old City.  Room is tiny - nearly no space to move around.  Two people with 2 suitcases and you have to do some acrobatics to move about.  However, good tea and coffee and ample breakfast selection.  Staff are very friendly and helpful in all aspects.', 'Very nice and clean hotel. Close to everything you would want to see in the Old Quarter. Great breakfast and coffee!', 'The breakfast and the very helpful makes the difference', 'Clean and central located. Very helpful staff.', 'The breakfast is superb and the staff super helpful', 'The breakfast was great and the staff very helpful to arrange all sorts of tours and transport.', "I was very impressed with the hotel. It is in a really good location. The staff where very polite and helpful from when I was picked up at the airport to when they organised a taxi for me to my next location. The room and all other facilities where clean. Breakfast was really good - one of the best omelettes I've had in South East Asia ğŸ‘â˜º", './.', 'A wonderful location, friendly and helpful staff, great breakfast, very clean and spacious rooms - we are very happy with our stay at Josephs Hotel.']

Äá»“ Äƒn sÃ¡ng khÃ´ng phong phÃº.', 'NhÃ¢n viÃªn khÃ´ng quÃ¡ thÃ¢n thiá»‡n vui váº», toÃ n khÃ¡ch hÃ n vÃ  trung quá»‘c, Äƒn sÃ¡ng ko quÃ¡ Ä‘a dáº¡ng vÃ  khÃ¡ lá»™n xá»™n. Bá»ƒ bÆ¡i láº¡nh cáº£ ngÃ y dÃ¹ trá»i náº¯ng, nhÃ¢n viá»‡n dá»n phÃ²ng vÃ  vá»‡ sinh cháº­m.', 'I stayed across 5 different hotels during my stay in Vietnam this time. Rosamia was by far the best one out of them all. Itâ€™s a new hotel (built in 2018 I believe), so all the facilities were close to brand new when I was there. The pool was just fabulous - must try. The service was also up to the standard. Fresh cookies and fruits served upon my arrival. The only downside is the room being a little smaller than expected and only came with a shower. That said, still highly recommend anyone to stay at Rosamia when visiting Da Nang.', 'Pros: close to both city center and my khe beach, beautiful beach view, clean facilities. The shuttle bus is equipped with massage chairs. Cons: need to call every night to replenish toiletries, gym equipment is of low quality, and staff is not flexible on checkout time despiting seemly low occupancy. The location of the hotel is key but the facilities are not as grand typical big hoteliers as Sheration, Conrad, Meridien, or Ritz Carlton.', 'Pros: close to both city center and my khe beach, beautiful beach view, clean facilities. The shuttle bus is equipped with massage chairs.Cons: need to call every night to replenish toiletries, gym equipment is of low quality, and staff is not flexible on checkout time despiting seemly low occupancy. The location of the hotel is key but the facilities are not as grand typical big hoteliers as Sheration, Conrad, Meridien, or Ritz Carlton.', 'The masseur at the Spa Service were friendly.However, if they are sick,  please ensure that they wear a mask before staring the session.  At the sky bar restaurant,  more staff could be proficient with at least basic English and if drinks like coffee and tea are ordered they should provide spoon,  sugar and milk without being asked.  Apart from that,  truly enjoyed my stayed with my friends.  Room service was very efficient. Pick up and drop off service was great too. Thank you.', 'An amazing place. Services as always. Everybody being nice and friendly. I think itâ€™s the place to stay when you had bad mood. But after all you will have a good emotion. Good in-room service for foods delivery.', 'Everything are good', "We were not happy with the air-conditioning of the first room. Luckily we were given another one quickly.There was no air-conditioning in the corridors too.The beds smelled.Not many staff could understand/speak English. They did try hard to help us.The hotel looked like a 3-star one in China in the 80's.But the car driving us to the airport was new and comfortable.We stayed in three hotels in this Danang trip (TMS and Hilton). This one was overall the worst.", 'This is the best hotel i ever stay in! And I travel alot! The personal was amazing and look after me like I was a friend! I will come back! :)', "Everything at Rosamia was perfect right from the start.  The complementary shuttle was a limousine with massage chairs.  We arrived early so it was understandable that our room wasn't ready.  The staff took care of our belongings referred us to the best ever breakfast place (urban ?).  When we got back our room was ready.  The location is on the beautiful My Khe beach and has an incredible view from the top floor pool area.  The hotel has everything you could possibly want for its complementary breakfast including some great coffees.  The thing that really stood out was how caring the staff was.  When we arrived I had flu symptoms that got worse as the day went on.  The front desk staff checked on me on brought me hot lemon drinks and then fresh ginger.  They continued to check to check on me and advised me to see a doctor which when I eventually did I found that I had the influenza A and dengue fever.  I had to stay in the room and rest.  The care of the staff was priceless.", 'Kinda perfection.', 'The hotel is located next to the beach with good view of the seaand cool wind outside.The rooms are big, clean and comfortable.Breakfast is substantial with a good spread. The attending staffat the restaurant (particularly Tay Thi, Duc Cuong and Tuyet Hnung)were most helpful and courteous.The reception staff were efficient and professional.The hotel is situated some distance from the older and morerobust part of the city.Overall this is a good place to stay.', 'Perfect location in Da Nang (thanks for the free ocean-view upgrade!), very friendly and helpful staff, great breakfast and room service (24/7).Will be back!']

They even picked me up at the airport for free.', 'Room was very spacious and clean,  unfortunately very dark (there are a lot of huge hotels next to each other) and there was humidity in the room. Breakfast is great, staff is very nice and helpfull, rooftop bar and swiming pool are amazing. Gym is very well equiped. In overall we had a very nice stay there, decided to stay for one more night.', 'Great staff,good location.Good breakfast.', 'Our vacation has been perfect so far thanks to Maximilan hotel. The staff here are so friendly and welcoming. Facilities, location, the room, food are amazing. Definitely I will come back this hotel if I am in Danang.', 'We stayed in a 2-bedroom penthouse 2 king suite room for 5 nights. The penthouse was very spacious and clean with great sea view.  The receptionists and bell boys were really friendly and courteous.  The beach is just across the road and thereâ€™s a whole row of seafood restaurants just metres away from the beach (canâ€™t remember the name but the Japanese restaurant along the stretch is pretty good).  There are convenience stores within walking distance too.  We ordered room service on a few occasions while we were there and the food was nice.  Only improvement needed will be the attitude of the service staff in the restaurant.  While the buffet breakfast is alright, the restaurant staff are neither friendly nor attentive.  On the first morning, we stood waiting at the counter (after coming out from the lift) for someone to help us get a seat but all the staff just went past and ignored us. Waited for at least a few minutes before we decided to find our own seats. The staff did not bother to set up the tables properly too.  While some tables were nicely setup with serviettes, cutlery etc, others are either empty or have some stuff missing. We thought it was as due to the crowd that morning (the whole place was full of Korean tourists) but apparently it wasnâ€™t as the same thing repeated itself over the next few days (even on those days when itâ€˜s not crowded).Overall, itâ€™s still a great stay at Maximilan and weâ€™ll probably stay at Maximilan again should we decide to visit Da Nang.', "We stayed here for four nights and were pleased with our decision to stay here. The room was spacious and comfortable. You can't beat the location  with the beach right across the street.  The pool was small and the music around it quite loud but those are minor details.  I would stay here again on future visits.", 'The room was very clean and the bed was really big and comfortable. Superb', 'The staff very friendly and helpful The room very clean with nice view This hotel is new close to the beach I made wrong booking but they very helpful nothing to complain for this hotel I will stay here again for sure ..itâ€™s worth it!!!', 'We love the hotel Swimming pool and the sea view. One of the staff actually told me that I can watch sunrise from their rooftop bar. However, the rooftop was locked when I wanted to watch sunrise there. Other than that, everything was good']

As for room cleaning, kindly post the time so we can expect what time we can come back after the work is done.', 'The hotel overlooks the beach, it is in a good location, taxis always at the ready out front, nice rooftop pool and bar, good breakfast, friendly staff, and really nice rooms with great beds and pillows.', 'Good location and clean', 'Near the beach, easy to go anywhere. Convienient.Others are normal, not special.', 'Nice place close to beach and restaurants (including 2 Indian). Very few veg options in BF. Courteous staff.', 'I bought one box of cigarettes in Korea and there were 10 packs inside of the box. I left 8 packs in my room and went out from the hotel with friends one o\'clock. When I get inside the room at 3, I realized 8 packs were missing. I went downstairs and told a receptionist that I lost my cigarettes. She said she didn\'t know anything about it and there was nothing she could do. I asked her to ask the cleaning guy about my cigarettes and the answer was "We don\'t know." We were so furious and show us CCTV.  In the video, we saw the cleaning guy throwing away garbage and there were LOTTE bags with cigarettes!!! Before watching the video, they kept doubting us and did nothing. Pavilion is one of the big hotels in Da Nang and we are so disappointed at how they cope with this situation. They are irresponsible. The reason I wrote this review is to let people know how irresponsible this hotel is and not to recommend here to travelers who are planning to stay the hotel.', 'I bought one box of cigarettes in Korea and there were 10 packs inside of the box. They even picked me up at the airport for free.', 'Room was very spacious and clean,  unfortunately very dark (there are a lot of huge hotels next to each other) and there was humidity in the room. Breakfast is great, staff is very nice and helpfull, rooftop bar and swiming pool are amazing. Gym is very well equiped. In overall we had a very nice stay there, decided to stay for one more night.', 'Great staff,good location.Good breakfast.', 'Our vacation has been perfect so far thanks to Maximilan hotel. The staff here are so friendly and welcoming. Facilities, location, the room, food are amazing. Definitely I will come back this hotel if I am in Danang.', 'We stayed in a 2-bedroom penthouse 2 king suite room for 5 nights. The penthouse was very spacious and clean with great sea view.  The receptionists and bell boys were really friendly and courteous.  The beach is just across the road and thereâ€™s a whole row of seafood restaurants just metres away from the beach (canâ€™t remember the name but the Japanese restaurant along the stretch is pretty good).  There are convenience stores within walking distance too.  We ordered room service on a few occasions while we were there and the food was nice.  Only improvement needed will be the attitude of the service staff in the restaurant.  While the buffet breakfast is alright, the restaurant staff are neither friendly nor attentive.  On the first morning, we stood waiting at the counter (after coming out from the lift) for someone to help us get a seat but all the staff just went past and ignored us. Waited for at least a few minutes before we decided to find our own seats. The staff did not bother to set up the tables properly too.  While some tables were nicely setup with serviettes, cutlery etc, others are either empty or have some stuff missing. We thought it was as due to the crowd that morning (the whole place was full of Korean tourists) but apparently it wasnâ€™t as the same thing repeated itself over the next few days (even on those days when itâ€˜s not crowded).Overall, itâ€™s still a great stay at Maximilan and weâ€™ll probably stay at Maximilan again should we decide to visit Da Nang.', "We stayed here for four nights and were pleased with our decision to stay here. The room was spacious and comfortable. You can't beat the location  with the beach right across the street.  The pool was small and the music around it quite loud but those are minor details.  I would stay here again on future visits.", 'The room was very clean and the bed was really big and comfortable. Superb', 'The staff very friendly and helpful The room very clean with nice view This hotel is new close to the beach I made wrong booking but they very helpful nothing to complain for this hotel I will stay here again for sure ..itâ€™s worth it!!!', 'We love the hotel Swimming pool and the sea view. One of the staff actually told me that I can watch sunrise from their rooftop bar. However, the rooftop was locked when I wanted to watch sunrise there. Other than that, everything was good']

From the moment that we arrived the service and hospitality was First Class and we loved the room, the 22nd Floor Pool, the Sky Bar and the excellent Breakfast, serving food from The West and The East..... yummy!!!Our room was comfortable, clean and with everything that one could wish for with really good shower, tea/coffee equipment, good aircon and lovely big soft bed.The location right by the beach is perfect and we would definitely stay here again if we come back to Danang. The Manager, Mr Tran Quoc Dung, runs a very good hotel!!!', 'Location and hotel service was great ! Excellent Breakfast !', 'I spent two  nights here in room 507, the service was flawless, however, there were two times I got myself waking up in the middle of my nap due to excessive noise from karaoke. (No walking path on the bridge), but was satisfied to catch the splendous of it by twilight. It is for the explorer visitors to find all kind of shops around, can never go hungry, By kind courtesy of the front desk I was given a very nice room for 3 nights, spacious, with windows on 3 sides, except double curtains were quite thin, and dawn at 5.00am. Pool is on the roof top with nice view. Breakfast is also good and has adequate selection considering itâ€™s a boutique hotel.The staff are attentive and very helpful and would help you arrange transport to places on interest. Located centrally and convenient to walk or taxi to the beach or night market.Overall. A very pleasant and enjoyable stay!', 'Great stay despite a few run ins- we rented motorbikes through the hotel. Mid way through the trip, one of the bikes broke down. I reached out to hotel and spoke with hotel manager. She advised us someone would be on the way to service the bike for us. Instead of going home after her work day- She stayed back at the hotel until we returned to make sure we were okay. Pool area is absolutely stunning particularly around sunset. However, towels only available upon request. After swimming I looked for both towels and phone, I ended up taking elevator down to reception desk to request towels. Although they brought them up to us, the towels they provided were more like floor mats (extremely small).I also left my phone at reception desk by accident, when I realized this the staff helped me look for it. Turns out a guest walked out with it moments after leaving it- needless to say, my phone was retrieved', 'Booked a Superior Double Room for a one night stay. Room was small but comfortable. Unlike many hotels in Da Nang at the same price level, the hotel is very quiet and you can hardly hear noise from the street. Staff was friendly and helpful, spa was good for the price. However, water pressure was quite low during my stay. Everything else was good. Would recommend!', 'New hotel. Good location. Reasonable price. Beautiful pool at the 9/F. \rClean room. Breakfast has lots of selection and items change everyday. Spa with 40% discount. Very good services by staff who arranged decent decoration to my room for celebration of our wedding anniversary. There is door hinge problem and door needs to be closed with force and making noise and soundproofing can be improved. Anyway a very good choice for budget traveler.', 'It is convenient as you can find supermarket and stores nearby. The staff are very nice. We woke up late to airport so we donâ€™t have time to enjoy the breakfast. The receptionist asked us whether we wanted sandwiches to take away. They made it immediately. That was so delicious!', 'Penthouse as nice as the website showing large and tidy, location is convenient, breakfast was fine. Spa was cheaper than the other hotels. Staffs were nice and willing to help especially Miss Lang\r\rOverall, it was a good experience with this hotel and hope to stay again soon', "I think it is a good choice because the hotel is clear and have a nice breakfast .Although it have not a kind of choice in breakfast , the quality of food is higher .The toilet is very clear and the staff service is good .Disappointedly , we  bought a ticket from the hotel , but it appeared the accident,so we waste a lot of time  .We could not get the ticket smoothly , so our plan was broken.Luckily, the hotel's manager help us to solve the problems.", 'Great place to stay.  The location is good and convenient for easy travel.  Rooms are clean and well equipped.  Breakfast is good with Vietnamese choices.  Staff are friendly and helpful especially Lan who is so helpful.Nice hotel.  We really enjoyed our stay here.', 'OK for one night. Downstairs good coffee and shakes and around some decent restaurants. Not too far from the airport.', 'Great location, friendly staff.', "Room is basic but clean and comfortable. Good location. Can be a bit noisy in outdoor corridor, but wasn't really a bother for our stay. Pool on rooftop looked good for a dip on a hot day.", 'Lovely hotel, great location, good breakfast and helpful staff what more could you want.', 'Front office staff are always helpful and courteous during our 4 days 3 night stay. Good services rendered. Our rooms are clean and the spa is good as well. Value for money! Thumbs up!', "I've stayed in this hotel for two nights. The hotel is location in the center of Danang city. It has lots of small shops and restaurants around. Beds are clean, room is big, but bathroom is small and does not fit the level of hotel. Breakfast is just enough for travelers. No comfortable chair in the room just a stool, and no power jack set for desk, so the room is not friendly for guests who have to work or use laptop in the room.", 'Location is a bit fat from river area but itâ€™s ok because i use private van everyday. Breakfast area is small and layout tables and chairs are not good']

I do think the buffet breakfast could be better but the cooked breakfast items are very good', 'Clean room with all the facilities.  The spa soothing experience. Overall awesome and valued  for what we paid .Will come again and highly recommend for others', "The location is excellent. We wanted to be close to the beach, but did not want to stay in a skyscraper. It's just not a vietnamese feeling about that. So we chose Condotel Babylon Garden right behind them. The street is ADORABLE, and genuine vietnamese style. People actually live here, and kids are playing around. The hotel property is quite modern and feels fresh to arrive to. And it is super easy to go to the beautiful beach from here. You get to bring towels from the hotel.If the breakfast is important to you, I would not recommend this hotel. In my opinion, it is just not good enough for a hotel in this price range. Another strange thing about this hotel, is that there is no glass in the window in the bathroom. I do think the buffet breakfast could be better but the cooked breakfast items are very good', 'Clean room with all the facilities.  The spa soothing experience. Overall awesome and valued  for what we paid .Will come again and highly recommend for others', "The location is excellent. We wanted to be close to the beach, but did not want to stay in a skyscraper. It's just not a vietnamese feeling about that. So we chose Condotel Babylon Garden right behind them. The street is ADORABLE, and genuine vietnamese style. People actually live here, and kids are playing around. The hotel property is quite modern and feels fresh to arrive to. And it is super easy to go to the beautiful beach from here. You get to bring towels from the hotel.If the breakfast is important to you, I would not recommend this hotel. In my opinion, it is just not good enough for a hotel in this price range. Another strange thing about this hotel, is that there is no glass in the window in the bathroom.  So the air, temperature and sounds in the bathroom is the same as outside. I learned to like it though. Bed is a bit hard for us . It is not to far from the restaurants or cafes . We didnâ€™t have time to have breakfast so couldnâ€™t say anything about it . This is the best hotel for my 16 days holiday as from nha trang, dalat, hoi an and finally danang. Amy another nice girls meet in this hotel. Ivy even arrange a complement transport to drop us to AirPort while we depart danang to home . Lam also very nice Service , always help to manage our luaggage and others . Thank you So much', '1. Friendly and attentive staff ready to provide assistance at all times throughout my stay!2. Ordered for room service - chicken noodle soup, hawaiian pizza and mixed fruits smoothies. The pizza need to be improved in terms of its appearance, texture and taste but overall it was good!3. You may want to pay extra attention on the name of the Hotel when u call for a grab or to be drop off because there is another Fivitel Hotel (in orange) within the vicinity (5 mins by car) while this 4 **** Hotel is in bright yellow.', 'Always smiling, kind and helpful', "The hotel staff is very nice and helpful. I think they upgrade the room for us, they didn't say the word about upgrading but I definitely sure that we have been upgrade. The location is very nice and quiet. but walking distant to Danang Cathedral and Han Market. but you can use Grab also (super cheap). There are Cha ga and Bahn mi restaurant nearby which it's super local but super tasty. We probably gonna stay here again for our next trip. Recommended.", 'We really enjoy our stay in the hotel. The room was very big with nice views of the dragon bridge. Everything was clean and brand new. The staff was very helpful and they also booked a driver for Marble Mountains and Hoi An. If I come back to Da Nang I would definitely stay here again. The location is very good with restaurants and bars quite close', 'Having travelled in Vietnam a few times, this establishment did reach the top for value for money. Actually, probably more than the accommodations, the staff made my 3-day stay more than enjoyable. Lily, Neymar, Rich, and Amy, as well as the spa staff were just excellent!', "Room which have bridge view quite small if u want larger room u must to book room opposite side(can't see dragon bridge) the room which we booked floor was dirty (sticky when u walk) however staff very nice service.", 'I was in this hotel just only one night and got updraded to deluxe room. The room is nice and clean. The view from the room is great  and swimming pool on 18th floor is a great highlight of the building. Service and staff are excellent, all requires are met. I also got free drop off car to the airport. Definetely will come back here if i visit Da Nang again.', 'A good hotel with friendly staff. Well experience. Although the hotel is old building but is well keep. Everything look fine with a good value price.', 'Location near of dragon bridges, just 6 minutes walking.', '5minutes walk to the town and same time to the dragon bridge.Puffet and alacarte breakfast was vietnamis. Restaurant staff did not have the greatest english skills but they were very friendly and helpfull.2 restaurants but the other was just an empty hall. No staff at the pool area.', "the staffs are nice, the breakfast is fine. the room is a bit hot, it should be the air con's problem.", 'Nice big rooms, better than expected breakfast (enough cold and hot dishes), located near the Dragon bridge, easy to access most tourist attractions at walking distance.', 'Lily is one of the friendly receptionists at the hotel.  I will definitely come back. Thank you.']

Náº¿u cÃ³ dá»‹p quay láº¡i ÄÃ  Náºµng mÃ¬nh sáº½ tiáº¿p tá»¥c lá»±a chá»n.', "I booked this place for a short stay before I went to the airport.I booked a room for four, but the reception is now under electric work, so she said she would provide a room for twelve. If that had happened, they shouldn't have been booked for four.I had arrived an hour earlier than check-in time, and I would have been satisfied if they had only allowed the early check-in.But I didn't get into the room until 2 p.m. as per their regulations.But I don't complain about this. This is a rule. But in such a rule-conscious accommodation, why would you offer a room for twelve to a guest who has reserved a room for four? I don't understand.The shower room didn't work, and the bed was very narrow. Just the receptionist was kind to me.", "Topnotch location!! It's walking distance to Han Market, the river and dragon bridge. There's also a nice and inexpensive local resto beside the hostel, which I highly recommend. The staff were very friendly and helpful too. The bathroom though can use some thorough cleaning and maintenance.", 'I love City Hostel. When I live here, I feel it like my home. So comfortable. Everyone is so kind, friendly and cute.', 'The rooms were comfy and the staff were all really nice and spoke good English. AC and wifi worked well, pretty central location too. Only con would be the bathrooms, they werenâ€™t very clean and they lacked amenities (no shampoo, soap). Also no common area to hang out in.', 'good location and super nice and friendly staff. they will help you anything you need. super cheap and nice bed and laundry service is very good. you can walk to bar and restaurant easy. if I go to danang again, definitely stay here!! Miss Danang!!', 'Have been here for 2 days before Christmas. Everything is very clean and tidy. The only one minus is that I have to change the dorm due to the big group and they could not finished cleaning up on time, so when we checked in that room the locker is still a bit smell, but when we left it open for about 1 hour it was fine. Since I cannot stand the cold, the blanket is super warm even when you touch it it is a little bit thin. Great bonus!Staff were super friendly and helpful, all were very nice. Location near Dragon bridge and in the city center, close to the church and Han market. Valued for money.', 'Place is cozy and amazing', 'Itâ€™s right in the city so donâ€™t expect to get much sleep.  The bunks are connected too so expect much noise. reviews: ['Äá»‹a Ä‘iá»ƒm Ä‘áº¹p. dá»‹ch vá»¥ tá»‘t trong táº§m giÃ¡ tiá»n.', 'PhÃ²ng á»‘c sáº¡ch sáº½, tiá»‡n nghi, mÃ¬nh ráº¥t Æ°ng, chá»‰ duy nháº¥t lÃ  k cÃ³ thang mÃ¡y khiáº¿n viá»‡c di chuyá»ƒn hÃ nh lÃ½ khÃ¡ váº¥t váº£...', 'I like this hostel even there is no lift, many mosquitoes!Thatâ€™s only  you have to up steps and bring something against mosquitoes.Staffs are very  nice and very cute.Walk to beach 2min, nice restaurants around there.', 'Had a great stay here and the Staff ARE EXCELLENT and very friendly and will do everything to make you feel comfortable. They are always available to give you suggestions for things to do and see.  Situated in a good location 3-4 mins walk to the beach with an ATM and 24h K-mart and the top of the road with lots of food, coffee, social options around.I stayed in the Studio Room which was great but could have been better cleaned. It was a little dusty in some places but not a problem as this can be easily corrected. Water pressure in the shower room was good, bed was firm but comfortable and the breakfast is good. The Chill out area is nice and you are able to rent bikes, scooters and book tours too. The one thing I love about this hostel is that it was calm and peaceful and other guests were respectful  - If youâ€™re looking for a loud and busy backpacker hostel this is not for you. THANKS GUYS for a great stay!!', "great location right by the beach. breakfast choice are mostly traditional Vietnamese food but it was good. the staff are really helpful and friendly.the beds are super hard, very uncomfortable and there is alot of building work happening on the same Street and they start working very early sometimes was woken up at 5am by the noise. the aircon is only on between 5pm and 8am but there were a couple of days staff turned it off around 7 instead. overall a really nice place with helpful staff but unfortunately didn't have great sleep which is kind of what you need for a hostel", 'We enjoyed our short stay here! For starters, it is well located. Not too far from the airport (cost us around 6 USD to get there), 5 min walk to the beach and surrounded by cool bars and restaurants.The included breakfast is great with a lot of options to order from and the common areas are nice. The staff makes extra efforts to make you feel welcome and at home, even asking you what type of music youâ€™d like to hear while youâ€™re there! We rented a private room which was very big and comfortable. Only thing weâ€™d have to say about it is that it smelled a bit at first because it was so humid but we quickly got used to it and running the AC for a little while helped.All in all, we had a great stay and were satisfied with our choice.', 'Atmosphere is the best part of the hostel..5 minutes walk to the beach. 10 kinds of breakfast for free. Friendly and lovely staff..A electronic keyboard and guitar is there if you love music.Anyway .If you are travel alone,This is a Good place to Make friends..ğŸ‘', 'Atmosphere is the best part of the hostel..5 minutes walk to the beach. 10 kinds of breakfast for free. Friendly and lovely staff..A electronic keyboard and guitar is there if you love music.Anyway .If you are travel alone,This is a Good place to Make friends..ğŸ‘', 'I enjoyed my stay here and the breakfast was really nice. lots of options to choose from. the staff are really friendly. the dog not so much but he is cute. the biggest thing I would complain about are the quality of the mattresses. you can feel the springs which is uncomfortable. when they get new mattresses this place will be amazing! overall good place to stay though.', 'I enjoyed my stay here and the breakfast was really nice. lots of options to choose from. the staff are really friendly. the dog not so much but he is cute. the biggest thing I would complain about are the quality of the mattresses. they are worn out and you can feel the springs which is uncomfortable. but overall nice place to stay. I think they are in the process of changing the mattresses and if so the place will be great to stay at!', 'I enjoyed my stay here and the breakfast was really nice. lots of options to choose from. the staff are really friendly. the dog not so much but he is cute. the biggest thing I would complain about are the quality of the mattresses. they are worn out and you can feel the springs which is uncomfortable.', 'Itâ€™s hard to forget the few days I stayed here. I was planning to go to other cities to play, but I didnâ€™t want to leave when I stayed here. I stayed in this youth hostel for 6 days, the environment is very good, the floor is very clean, and you can cook on the kitchen. U can display your Art, and talent. The staff at the youth hostel are very nice and beautiful. Anyway ,Thanks for this day helping me have a good time', 'Clean and comfortable room. Friendly staff witch is very helpful and makes you feel at being home', 'Itâ€™s so sweet hostel. The best staff have I ever meet. The delicious breakfast.', 'You pay for air conditioning, but you are not allowed to run it from 0800 to 1700. You must pay each time you cook your own food in the kitchen (10,000 VND each). You must pay to use the clothes dryer (15,000 each). The entire facility (dorm, bathroom, common area, kitchen, laundry) is covered in mosquitoes with no mosquitoe netting. Over 12 hours after I returned it, they attempted to bill me for damage to a motorbike I rented, but I had video proof to refute the claim. This place appears attractive because of the low rates, but it is scam to draw you in and take advantage of you. Absolutely do not stay here unless all you do is sleep and shower.', "We booked two months ago, but still when we arrived they said over-booking. We were arranged to stay at non-balcony room. And my last night was cancelled so I have to find somewhere else at last minute. Although the location is close to beach, and many shops and restaurants are nearby, I would NOT suggest here if we don't get our service right.", 'The stuff is friendly and gives us a lot of help on local trips and also transportation. The breakfast of local snack and food is consider good. They even prepare early packing food for us when we have early flight to leave. Location is very good with good restaurant nearby. The only problem is no lift is provided. The room is ready with all the facilities that u need, good. But my roomâ€™s kitchen sink is leaking. Overall is excellent. We are happy to stay here.', 'Staff r warm n helpful, but there r many bugs in the bed, room is smelly n humid, bedsheets looks not clean, breakfast tasteless, bathroom looks poor, with same price there r far more better choices within 10 minutes walk nearby, most disappointed hostel ever tried.', 'apartment/studio was very big and a good deal for the price, but there were too many mosquitos in the room when i came in and caused a bad night sleep. besides mosquitos no issues. its probably caused from them leaving door open during cleaning.', 'staffs were very kind and good at english.   Tung took us to a live bar which was cool and also we went motobike riding together for lady budda temple to see the sunrise. we had really good time and would like stay again next time.']

address: 94 Ly Tu Trong St, Trung tÃ¢m ÄÃ  Láº¡t, ÄÃ  Láº¡t, Viá»‡t Nam, â€‹â€‹66000
reviews: ['Beautifully renovated and updated French colonial style house and adjoining buildings in a fantastic location.  If you want to stay in the center of town but still be in a relatively quiet green oasis, this is definitely the location. Just a 12 minute walk down the hill to the Central Market. We were disappointed though to turn up and be told there was a) construction going on at the hotel and b) we would be moved to another room.  The hotel would deserve a four star rating if it had communicated this at the time of booking, or at least prior to our arrival so we could decide if we still wanted to stay there.Rooms were very lovely and well appointed but a little too small for our family or 5.  If you are a solo traveler or couple (or couple with a baby) or group of friends in multiple rooms this place would be perfect. There is a communal living space adjoining rooms which is a great spot to hang out in and meet other travelers. Adjacent restaurant not open during our stay.', 'When we stayed in this hotel, itâ€™s really like travel somewhere in the countryside of France. The owner has good taste and carefully deco the room, hall, restaurant and garden. However, this hotel also has cons, even though the location is in the alley, we still heard horns all day and the hot water in the shower is limited- we couldnâ€™t  take a hot shower over 15 mins and is hard to turn to comfortable temperature when takin a shower.']
